

Genesis 1
1:1 in·beginning he-created Elohim » the·heavens and·» the·earth 
1:2 and·the·earth she-became chaos and·vacancy and·darkness over sur faces-of abyss and·spirit-of Elohim m vibrating over sur faces-of the·waters 
1:3 and·he-is-saying Elohim he-shall-become light and·he-is-becoming light 
1:4 and·he-is-seeing Elohim » the·light that good and·he-is- c separating Elohim between the·light and·between the·darkness 
1:5 and·he-is-calling Elohim to· the ·light day and·to· the ·darkness he-calls night and·he-is-becoming evening and·he-is-becoming morning day one 
1:6 and·he-is-saying Elohim he-shall-become atmosphere in·midst-of the·waters and·he-shall-become c separating between waters to·waters 
1:7 and·he-is-making do Elohim » the·atmosphere and·he-is- c separating between the·waters which from·under to· the ·atmosphere and·between the·waters which from·on to· the ·atmosphere and·he-is-becoming so 
1:8 and·he-is-calling Elohim to· the ·atmosphere heavens and·he-is-becoming evening and·he-is-becoming morning day second 
1:9 and·he-is-saying Elohim they-shall-be-flown-together the·waters from·under the·heavens to place ri one and·she-shall-be-seen the·dry and·he-is-becoming so 
1:10 and·he-is-calling Elohim to· the ·dry land and·to·confluence-of the·waters he-called seas and·he-is-seeing Elohim that good 
1:11 and·he-is-saying Elohim she-shall-cause- to -vegetate the·land vegetation herbage c sowing seed tree-of fruit making do fruit to·species-of·him which seed-of·him in·him on the·land and·he-is-becoming so 
1:12 and·she-is- c bring ing - forth the·land vegetation herbage c sowing seed to·species-of·him and·tree making do fruit which seed-of·him in·him to·species-of·him and·he-is-seeing Elohim that good 
1:13 and·he-is-becoming evening and·he-is-becoming morning day third 
1:14 and·he-is-saying Elohim he-shall-become luminaries in·atmosphere-of the·heavens to·to- c separate-of between the·day and·between the·night and·they-become for·signs and·for·appointments and·for·days and·years 
1:15 and·they-become for·luminaries in·atmosphere-of the·heavens to·to- c give -light-of on the·earth and·he-is-becoming so 
1:16 and·he-is-making do Elohim » two-of the·luminaries the·great-ones » the·luminary the·great to·ruling-of the·day and·» the·luminary the·small to·ruling-of the·night and·» the·stars 
1:17 and·he-is-giving »·them Elohim in·atmosphere-of the·heavens to·to- c give -light-of on the·earth 
1:18 and·to·to-rule-of in· the ·day and·in· the ·night and·to·to- c separate-of between the·light and·between the·darkness and·he-is-seeing Elohim that good 
1:19 and·he-is-becoming evening and·he-is-becoming morning day fourth 
1:20 and·he-is-saying Elohim they-shall-roam the·waters roamer-of soul living and·flyer he-shall- m fly over the·earth on faces-of atmosphere-of the·heavens 
1:21 and·he-is-creating Elohim » the·monsters the·great-ones and·» every-of soul the·living the·moving which they-roam the·waters to·species-of·them and·» every-of flyer-of wing to·species-of·him and·he-is-seeing Elohim that good 
1:22 and·he-is- m blessing »·them Elohim to·to-say-of be- fruitful-you (p)  ! and·increase-you (p)  ! and·fill-you (p)  ! » the·waters in· the ·seas and·the·flyer he-shall-increase in· the ·earth 
1:23 and·he-is-becoming evening and·he-is-becoming morning day fifth 
1:24 and·he-is-saying Elohim she-shall- c bring -forth the·earth soul living to·species-of·her beast and·moving -animal and·animal-of·him land to·species-of·her and·he-is-becoming so 
1:25 and·he-is-making do Elohim » animal-of the·land to·species-of·her and·» the·beast to·species-of·her and·» every-of moving -animal -of the·ground to·species-of·him and·he-is-seeing Elohim that good 
1:26 and·he-is-saying Elohim we-shall-make do human in·image-of·us as·likeness-of·us and·they-shall-sway in·fish-of the·sea and·in·flyer-of the·heavens and·in· the ·beast and·in·all-of the·earth and·in·every-of the·moving -animal the·one-moving on the·land 
1:27 and·he-is-creating Elohim » the·human in·image-of·him in·image-of Elohim he-created »·him male and·female he-created »·them 
1:28 and·he-is- m blessing »·them Elohim and·he-is-saying to·them Elohim be- fruitful-you (p)  ! and·increase-you (p)  ! and·fill-you (p)  ! » the·earth and·subdue-you (p) ·her ! and·sway-you (p)  ! in·fish-of the·sea and·in·flyer-of the·heavens and·in·every-of animal the·one-moving on the·land 
1:29 and·he-is-saying Elohim behold ! I-give to·you (p) » every-of herbage seeding seed which on sur faces-of all-of the·earth and·» every-of the·tree which in·him fruit-of tree seeding seed for·you (p) he-is-becoming for·food 
1:30 and·for·every-of animal-of the·land and·for·every-of flyer-of the·heavens and·for·every-of moving -animal on the·land which in·him soul living » every-of green herbage for·food and·he-is-becoming so 
1:31 and·he-is-seeing Elohim » all-of which he-made do and·behold ! good very and·he-is-becoming evening and·he-is-becoming morning day-of the·sixth 

Genesis 2
2:1 and·they-are-being- m finished the·heavens and·the·earth and·all-of host-of·them 
2:2 and·he-is- m finishing Elohim in· the ·day the·seventh work-of·him which he-did and·he-is-ceasing in· the ·day the·seventh from·all-of work-of·him which he-did 
2:3 and·he-is- m blessing Elohim » day-of the·seventh and·he-is-making-holy »·him that in·him he-ceased from·all-of work-of·him which he-created Elohim to·to-do-of 
2:4 these genealogical-annals-of the·heavens and·the·earth in·to-be-created-of·them in·day-of to-make do -of Yahweh Elohim earth and·heavens 
2:5 and·any-of shrub-of the·field ere he-is-becoming in· the ·earth and·any-of herbage-of the·field ere he-is-sprouting that not he-caused- to -rain Yahweh Elohim on the·earth and·human there -is-no to·to-serve-of » the·ground 
2:6 and·humidity he-is-ascending from the·earth and·he- c irrigated » all-of sur faces-of the·ground 
2:7 and·he-is-forming Yahweh Elohim » the·human soil from the·ground and·he-is-blowing in·nostrils-of·him breath-of lives and·he-is-becoming the·human to·soul living 
2:8 and·he-is-planting Yahweh Elohim garden in·Eden from·east and·he-is-placing there » the·human whom he-formed 
2:9 and·he-is-causing- to -sprout Yahweh Elohim from the·ground every-of tree being-coveted to·sight and·good for·food and·tree-of the·lives in·midst-of the·garden and·tree-of the·knowledge-of good and·evil 
2:10 and·stream go ing-forth from·Eden to·to- c irrigate-of » the·garden and·from·there he-is-being-parted and·he-became to·four heads 
2:11 name-of the·one Pison he the·one-surrounding » all-of land-of the·Havilah which there the·gold 
2:12 and·gold-of the·land the· s he good there the·pearl and·stone-of the·onyx 
2:13 and·name-of the·stream the·second Gihon he the·one-surrounding » all-of land-of Cush 
2:14 and·name-of the·stream the·third Hiddekel he the·one-going east-of Asshur and·the·stream the·fourth he Euphrates 
2:15 and·he-is-taking Yahweh Elohim » the·human and·he-is- c leaving·him in·garden-of Eden to·to-serve-of·her and·to·to-keep-of·her 
2:16 and·he-is- m instructing Yahweh Elohim on the·human to·to-say-of from·any-of tree-of the·garden to-eat you-shall-eat 
2:17 and·from·tree-of the·knowledge-of good and·evil not you-shall-eat from·him that in·day-of to-eat-of·you from·him to-die you-shall-die 
2:18 and·he-is-saying Yahweh Elohim not good to-be bc -of the·human to·alone-of·him I-shall-make for·him helper as·in-front-of·him 
2:19 and·he-is-forming Yahweh Elohim from the·ground every-of animal-of the·field and·» every-of flyer-of the·heavens and·he-is- c bringing to the·human to·to-see-of what ? he-shall-call to·him and·all which he-is-calling to·him the·human soul living he name-of·him 
2:20 and·he-is-calling the·human names to·all-of the·beast and·to·flyer-of the·heavens and·to·every-of animal-of the·field and·for·Adam not he-found helper as·in-front-of·him 
2:21 and·he-is-causing- to -fall Yahweh Elohim stupor on the·human and·he-is-sleeping and·he-is-taking one from·angular- organ s-of·him and·he-is-closing flesh under·her 
2:22 and·he-is-building Yahweh Elohim » the·angular -organ which he-took from the·human to·woman and·he-is- c bringing·her to the·human 
2:23 and·he-is-saying the·human this-one (f) the·once bone from·bones-of·me and·flesh from·flesh-of·me to·this-one (f) he-shall-be-called woman that from·man she-was-taken this-one (f) 
2:24 on·so he-is-leaving man » father-of·him and·» mother-of·him and·he-clings in·woman-of·him and·they-become to·flesh one 
2:25 and·they-were bc two-of·them naked-ones the·human and·woman-of·him and·not they-are- c shaming- them selves 

Genesis 3
3:1 and·the·serpent he-became crafty from·all-of animal-of the·field which he-made do Yahweh Elohim and·he-is-saying to the·woman indeed that he-said Elohim not you (p) -shall-eat from·any-of tree-of the·garden 
3:2 and·she-is-saying the·woman to the·serpent from·fruit-of tree-of the·garden we-are-eating 
3:3 and·from·fruit-of the·tree which in·midst-of the·garden he-said Elohim not you (p) -shall-eat from·him and·not you (p) -shall-touch in·him lest you (p) -shall-die 
3:4 and·he-is-saying the·serpent to the·woman not to-die you (p) -shall-die 
3:5 that one-knowing Elohim that in·day-of to-eat-of·you (p) from·him and·they-are-unclosed eyes-of·you (p) and·you (p) -become as·Elohim ones-knowing-of good and·evil 
3:6 and·she-is-seeing the·woman that good the·tree for·food and·that yearning he to· the ·eyes and·being-coveted the·tree to·to- c make -intelligent-of and·she-is-taking from·fruit-of·him and·she-is-eating and·she-is-giving moreover to·man-of·her with·her and·he-is-eating 
3:7 and·they-are-being-unclosed eyes-of two-of·them and·they-are-knowing that naked-ones they and·they-are-sewing leaf-of fig- tree and·they-are-making do for·them selves girdle- skirt s 
3:8 and·they-are-hearing » sound-of Yahweh Elohim s walking in· the ·garden to·wind-of the·day and·he-is-hiding- him self the·human and·woman-of·him from·faces-of Yahweh Elohim in·midst-of tree-of the·garden 
3:9 and·he-is-calling Yahweh Elohim to the·human and·he-is-saying to·him where·you ? 
3:10 and·he-is-saying » sound-of·you I-heard in· the ·garden and·I-am-fearing that naked I and·I-am- n hiding 
3:11 and·he-is-saying who ? he- c told to·you that naked you ?·from the·tree which I- m instructed·you to·so-as-not to-eat-of from·him you-ate 
3:12 and·he-is-saying the·human the·woman whom you-gave with·me s he she-gave to·me from the·tree and·I-am-eating 
3:13 and·he-is-saying Yahweh Elohim to· the ·woman what ? this you-did and·she-is-saying the·woman the·serpent he- c lured·me and·I-am-eating 
3:14 and·he-is-saying Yahweh Elohim to the·serpent that you-did this being-cursed you from·all-of the·beast and·from·all-of animal-of the·field on torso-of·you you-shall-go and·soil you-shall-eat all-of days-of lives-of·you 
3:15 and·enmity I-am-setting between·you and·between the·woman and·between seed-of·you and·between seed-of·her he he-shall-hurt·you head and·you you-shall-hurt·him heel 
3:16 to the·woman he-said to- c increase I-am- c increasing grief-of·you and·pregnancy-of·you in·grief you-shall- give- birth sons and·to man-of·you impulse-of·you and·he he-shall-rule in·you 
3:17 and·to·Adam he-said that you-listened to·voice-of woman-of·you and·you-are-eating from the·tree which I- m instructed·you to·to-say-of not you-shall-eat from·him being-cursed the·ground in·sake-of·you in·grief you-shall-eat·her all-of days-of lives-of·you 
3:18 and·thorn and·weed she-shall- c sprout for·you and·you-eat » herbage-of the·field 
3:19 in·sweat-of nostrils-of·you you-shall-eat bread until to-return-of·you to the·ground that from·her you-were-taken that soil you and·to soil you-shall-return 
3:20 and·he-is-calling the·human name-of woman-of·him Eve that s he she-becomes mother-of all-of living-one 
3:21 and·he-is-making do Yahweh Elohim for·Adam and·for·woman-of·him tunics-of skin and·he-is- c clothing·them 
3:22 and·he-is-saying Yahweh Elohim behold ! the·human he-became as·one from·us to·to-know-of good and·evil and·now lest he-is-stretching- forth hand-of·him and·he-takes moreover from·tree-of the·lives and·he-eats and·he-lives for·eon 
3:23 and·he-is- m sending- away ·him Yahweh Elohim from·garden-of Eden to·to-serve-of » the·ground which he-was-taken from·there

Genesis 4
4:1 and·the·human he-knew » Eve woman-of·him and·she-is- becom ing-pregnant and·she-is- giv ing-birth » Cain and·she-is-saying I-acquired man with Yahweh 
4:2 and·she-is- c proceeding to·to- give -birth-of » brother-of·him » Abel and·he-is-becoming Abel shepherding-of flock and·Cain he-became serving-of ground 
4:3 and·he-is-becoming from·end-of days and·he-is- c bringing Cain from·fruit-of the·ground present- offering to·Yahweh 
4:4 and·Abel he- c brings moreover he from·firstlings-of flock-of·him and·from·fat-of·them (f) and·he-is- giv ing-heed Yahweh to Abel and·to present- offering -of·him 
4:5 and·to Cain and·to present- offering -of·him not he- gave -heed and·he-is- be ing-hot to·Cain very and·they-are-falling faces-of·him 
4:6 and·he-is-saying Yahweh to Cain to·what ? he- is -hot to·you and·to·what ? they- are -downcast faces-of·you 
4:7 ?·not if you-are- c do ing-good to-lift -up -of and·if not you-are- c do ing-good to· the ·portal sin- offering reclining and·to·you impulse-of·him and·you you-are-ruling in·him 
4:8 and·he-is-saying Cain to Abel brother-of·him and·he-is-becoming in·to-become-of·them in· the ·field and·he-is-rising Cain to Abel brother-of·him and·he-is-killing·him 
4:9 and·he-is-saying Yahweh to Cain where ? Abel brother-of·you and·he-is-saying not I-know ?·one-keeping brother-of·me I 
4:10 and·he-is-saying what ? you-did voice-of bloods-of brother-of·you ones-crying to·me from the·ground 
4:11 and·now being-cursed you from the·ground which she-opened-wide » mouth-of·her to ·to-take-of » bloods-of brother-of·you from·hand-of·you 
4:12 that you-are-serving » the·ground not she-shall- c proceed to-give-of vigor-of·her to·you one-roving and·one-wandering you-shall-become in· the ·earth 
4:13 and·he-is-saying Cain to Yahweh great depravity-of·me from·to-bear-of 
4:14 behold ! you- m drive-out »·me the·day from·on faces-of the·ground and·from·faces-of·you I-shall-be-concealed and·I-become one-roving and·one-wandering in· the ·earth and·he-becomes every-of one-finding-of·me he-shall-kill·me 
4:15 and·he-is-saying to·him Yahweh therefore every-of one-killing-of Cain sevenfold he-shall-be- c avenged and·he-is-placing Yahweh for·Cain sign to·so-as-not to- c smite-of »·him every-of one-finding-of·him 
4:16 and·he-is- go ing-forth Cain from·to·faces-of Yahweh and·he-is-dwelling in·land-of Nod east-of Eden 
4:17 and·he-is-knowing Cain » woman-of·him and·she-is- becom ing-pregnant and·she-is- giv ing-birth » Enoch and·he-was bc building city and·he-is-calling name-of the·city as·name-of son-of·him Enoch 
4:18 and·he-is-being-born to·Enoch » Irad and·Irad he-generated » Mehujael and·Mehujael he-generated » Methusael and·Methusael he-generated » Lamech 
4:19 and·he-is-taking for·him Lamech two-of women name-of the·one Adah and·name-of the·second Zillah 
4:20 and·she-is- giv ing-birth Adah » Jabal he he-became father-of one-dwelling-of tent and·cattle man 
4:21 and·name-of brother-of·him Jubal he he-became father-of every-of one-handling-of harp and·shepherd's-pipe 
4:22 and·Zillah moreover s he she- gave- birth » Tubal~Cain one-forging-of every-of one-tooling-of copper and·iron and·sister-of Tubal-Cain Naamah 
4:23 and·he-is-saying Lamech to·women-of·him Adah and·Zillah listen-you (p)  ! voice-of·me women-of Lamech c give -ear-you (p)  ! saying-of·me that man I-killed for·injury-of·me and·boy for·welt-of·me 
4:24 that sevenfold he-is-being- c avenged Cain and·Lamech seventy and·seven 
4:25 and·he-is-knowing Adam further » woman-of·him and·she-is- giv ing-birth son and·she-is-calling » name-of·him Seth that he-set for·me Elohim seed another instead-of Abel that he-killed·him Cain 
4:26 and·to·Seth moreover he he-was-born son and·he-is-calling » name-of·him Enosh then he-is- c started to·to-call-of in·name-of Yahweh

Genesis 6
6:1 and·he-is-becoming that he- c started the·human to·to- be -multitudinous-of on faces-of the·ground and·daughters they-were-born to·them 
6:2 and·they-are-seeing sons-of the·Elohim » daughters-of the·human that good-ones they (f) and·they-are-taking for·them women from·all whom they-chose 
6:3 and·he-is-saying Yahweh not he-shall-adjudicate spirit-of·me in· the ·human for·eon in·which·moreover he flesh and·they-become days-of·him hundred and·twenty year 
6:4 the·ones-distinguished they-became in· the ·earth in· the ·days the·those and·moreover after so which they-are-coming sons-of the·Elohim to daughters-of the·human and·they- gave -birth for·them they the·masterful- men who from·eon mortals-of the·name 
6:5 and·he-is-seeing Yahweh that much evil-of the·human in· the ·earth and·every-of form-of devices-of heart-of·him but evil all-of the·day

Exodus 9
9:1 and·he-is-saying Yahweh to Moses enter-you ! to Pharaoh and·you- m speak to·him thus he-says Yahweh Elohim-of the·Hebrews m dismiss-you ! » people-of·me and·they-shall-serve·me

9:4 and·he- c distinguishes Yahweh between cattle-of Israel and·between cattle-of Egypt and·not he-shall-die from·any-of to·sons-of Israel thing 
9:5 and·he-is-placing Yahweh appointment to·to-say-of to morrow he-shall-do Yahweh the·thing the·this in· the ·land

17:11 and·he-became as·which he-is- c rais ing-high Moses hand-of·him and·he-had -the -mastery Israel and·as·which he-is- c giv ing-rest hand-of·him and·he-had -the -mastery Amalek

Exodus 22
22:1 that he-is-stealing man bull or flockling and·he-slaughters·him or he-sells·him five ox he-shall- m repay instead-of the·bull and·four flock instead-of the·flockling 
22:2 if in· the ·burrowing he-is-being-found the·thief and·he-is- c smitten and·he-dies there -is-no to·him bloods 
22:3 if she-rose the·sun on·him bloods to·him to- m repay he-shall- m repay if there -is-no to·him and·he-is-sold in·theft-of·him 
22:4 if to-be-found she-is-being-found in·hand-of·him the·theft from·bull unto donkey unto flockling alive-ones two he-shall- m repay 
22:5 that he-is-causing- to -graze-down man field or vineyard and·he- m lets -go- loose » livestock-of·her livestock-of·him and·he- m grazes-down in·field-of another best-of field-of·him and·best-of vineyard-of·him he-shall- m repay 
22:6 that she-is- go ing-forth fire and·she-finds thorns and·he-is-devoured shock or the·raised- grain or the·field to- m repay he-shall- m repay the·one-causing- to -consume » the·consum ing-fire 
22:7 that he-is-giving man to associate-of·him silver or articles to·to-keep-of and·he-is- m stolen from·house-of the·man if he-is-being-found the·thief he-shall- m repay two 
22:8 if not he-is-being-found the·thief and·he-is- c brought -near possessor-of the·house to the·Elohim if not he-put- forth hand-of·him in·work-of associate-of·him 
22:9 on every-of matter-of transgression over bull over donkey over flockling over raiment over every-of lost- thing which he-is-saying that he this unto the·Elohim he-shall-come word-of two-of·them whom they-shall- c condemn Elohim he-shall- m repay two to·associate-of·him 
22:10 that he-is-giving man to associate-of·him donkey or bull or flockling and·any-of beast to·to-keep-of and·he-dies or he-is-broken or he-is-captured without one-seeing 
22:11 oath-of Yahweh she-shall-become between two-of·them if not he-put- forth hand-of·him in·work-of associate-of·him and·he-takes possessors-of·him and·not he-shall- m repay 
22:12 and·if to- be -stol en he-is-being-stolen from·with·him he-shall- m repay to·possessors-of·him 
22:13 if to- be -torn-to-pieces he-is-being-torn-to-pieces he-shall- c bring·him testimony-of the· thing -torn-to-pieces not he-shall- m repay 
22:14 and·that he-is-asking man from·with associate-of·him and·he-is-broken or he-dies possessors-of·him there -is-no with·him to- m repay he-shall- m repay 
22:15 if possessors-of·him with·him not he-shall- m repay if hired he he-comes in·hire-of·him

30:38 man who he-is-making do like·her to·to- c smell-of in·her and·he-is-cut- off from·peoples-of·him

Exodus 40
40:1 and·he-is- m speaking Yahweh to Moses to·to-say-of 
40:2 in·day-of the·month the·first in·one to· the ·month you-shall- c set-up » tabernacle-of tent-of appointment 
40:3 and·you-place there » coffer-of the·testimony and·you-screen on the·coffer with the·curtain 
40:4 and·you- c bring -in » the·table and·you-arrange » array-of·him and·you- c bring -in » the·lampstand and·you- c set -up » lamps-of·her 
40:5 and·you-give » altar-of the·gold for·incense to·faces-of coffer-of the·testimony and·you-place » portiere-of the·portal to· the ·tabernacle 
40:6 and·you-give » altar-of the·ascent- offering to·faces-of portal-of tabernacle-of tent-of appointment 
40:7 and·you-give » the·laver between tent-of appointment and·between the·altar and·you-give there waters 
40:8 and·you-place » the·court round-about and·you-give » portiere-of gate-of the·court 
40:9 and·you-take » oil-of the·anointing and·you-anoint » the·tabernacle and·» all-of which in·him and·you- m hallow »·him and·» all-of furnishings-of·him and·he-becomes holiness 
40:10 and·you-anoint » altar-of the·ascent- offering and·» all-of furnishings-of·him and·you- m hallow » the·altar and·he-becomes the·altar holiness-of holinesses 
40:11 and·you-anoint » the·laver and·» post-of·him and·you- m hallow »·him 
40:12 and·you- c bring -near » Aaron and·» sons-of·him to portal-of tent-of appointment and·you-wash »·them in· the ·waters 
40:13 and·you- c put-on » Aaron » garments-of the·holiness and·you-anoint »·him and·you- m hallow »·him and·he- m serv es- as -priest for·me 
40:14 and·» sons-of·him you-shall- c bring -near and·you- c put-on »·them tunics 
40:15 and·you-anoint »·them as·which you-anointed » father-of·them and·they- m serve-as -priests for·me and·she-becomes to·to-become-of to·them anointing-of·them to·priesthood-of eon for·generations-of·them 
40:16 and·he-is-doing Moses as·all which he- m instructed Yahweh »·him so he-did 
40:17 and·he-is-becoming in· the ·month the·first in· the ·year the·second in·one to· the ·month he-was- c set-up the·tabernacle

40:19 and·he-is-spreading » the·tent over the·tabernacle and·he-is-placing » cover-of the·tent over·him from·to·up·ward as·which he- m instructed Yahweh » Moses

40:22 and·he-is-giving » the·table in·tent-of appointment on flank-of the·tabernacle north·ward from·outside to· the ·curtain 
40:23 and·he-is-arranging on·him array-of bread to·faces-of Yahweh as·which he- m instructed Yahweh » Moses 
40:24 and·he-is-placing » the·lampstand in·tent-of appointment opposite the·table on flank-of the·tabernacle Negev·ward 
40:25 and·he-is- c sett ing-up the·lamps to·faces-of Yahweh as·which he- m instructed Yahweh » Moses

40:28 and·he-is-placing » portiere-of the·portal to· the ·tabernacle 
40:29 and·» altar-of the·ascent- offering he-placed portal-of tabernacle-of tent-of appointment and·he-is- c offer ing-up on·him » the·ascent- offering and·» the·present- offering as·which he- m instructed Yahweh » Moses 
40:30 and·he-is-placing » the·laver between tent-of appointment and·between the·altar and·he-is-giving there·ward waters to·to-wash-of

Leviticus 1
1:1 and·he-is-calling to Moses and·he-is- m speaking Yahweh to·him from·tent-of appointment to·to-say-of 
1:2 m speak-you ! to sons-of Israel and·you-say to·them human that he-is- c bring ing-near from·you (p) approach- present to·Yahweh from the·beast from the·herd and·from the·flock you (p) -shall- c bring -near » approach- present -of·you (p) 
1:3 if ascent- offering approach- present -of·him from the·herd male flawless he-shall- c bring -near·him to opening-of tent-of appointment he-shall- c bring -near »·him for·acceptance-of·him to·faces-of Yahweh

1:6 and·he- c strips- off » the·ascent- offering and·he- m cut s -to- pieces »·her to·pieces-of·her 
1:7 and·they-give sons-of Aaron the·priest fire on the·altar and·they-arrange woods on the·fire

Leviticus 5

Leviticus 16

16:2 and·he-is-saying Yahweh to Moses m speak-you ! to Aaron brother-of·you and·must-not -be he-is-coming in·any-of time to the·sanctuary from·inside-of to· the ·curtain to faces-of the· propitiatory -shelter which on the·coffer and·not he-shall-die that in· the ·cloud I-shall- n appear over the· propitiatory -shelter

Leviticus 17
17:1 and·he-is- m speaking Yahweh to Moses to·to-say-of 
17:2 m speak-you ! to Aaron and·to sons-of·him and·to all-of sons-of Israel and·you-say to·them this the·thing which he- m instructed Yahweh to·to-say-of 
17:3 man man from·house-of Israel who he-is-slaying bull or sheep or goat in· the ·camp or who he-is-slaying from·outside-of to· the ·camp 
17:4 and·to opening-of tent-of appointment not he- c brings·him to·to- c bring -near-of approach- present to·Yahweh to·faces-of tabernacle-of Yahweh blood shed he-shall-be-accounted to· the ·man the·he blood he-shed and·he-is-cut- off the·man the·he from·within-of people-of·him 
17:5 so-that which they-shall- c bring sons-of Israel » sacrifices-of·them which they ones-sacrificing on sur faces-of the·field and·they- c bring·them to·Yahweh to opening-of tent-of appointment to the·priest and·they-sacrifice sacrifices-of peace- offering s to·Yahweh »·them 
17:6 and·he-sprinkles the·priest » the·blood on altar-of Yahweh opening-of tent-of appointment and·he-causes- to -fume the·fat to·smell-of restful -fragrance to·Yahweh 
17:7 and·not they-shall-sacrifice further » sacrifices-of·them to· the ·hairy- goat-idol s which they ones-prostituting after·them statute-of eon she-shall-become this for·them for·generations-of·them 
17:8 and·to·them you-shall-say man man from·house-of Israel and·from the·sojourner who he-is-sojourning in·midst-of·them who he-shall- c offer -up ascent- offering or sacrifice 
17:9 and·to opening-of tent-of appointment not he-shall- c bring·him to·to-do-of »·him to·Yahweh and·he-is-cut- off the·man the·he from·peoples-of·him 
17:10 and·man man from·house-of Israel and·from the·sojourner the·one-sojourning in·midst-of·them who he-shall-eat any-of blood and·I-give faces-of·me in· the ·soul the·one-eating » the·blood and·I- c cut- off »·her from·within-of people-of·her 
17:11 that soul-of the·flesh in· the ·blood s he and·I I-gave·him to·you (p) on the·altar to·to-make- propitiatory -shelter-of over souls-of·you (p) that the·blood he in· the ·soul he-is-making- propitiatory -shelter 
17:12 on·so I-say to·sons-of Israel any-of soul from·you (p) not she-shall-eat blood and·the·sojourner the·one-sojourning in·midst-of·you (p) not he-shall-eat blood 
17:13 and·man man from·sons-of Israel and·from the·sojourner the·one-sojourning in·midst-of·them who he-is-hunting game-of animal or flyer which he-shall-be-eaten and·he-pours-out » blood-of·him and·he- m covers·him in· the ·soil 
17:14 that soul-of all-of flesh blood-of·him in·soul-of·him he and·I-am-saying to·sons-of Israel blood-of any-of flesh not you (p) -shall-eat that soul-of all-of flesh blood-of·him s he all-of ones-eating-of·him he-shall-be-cut- off 
17:15 and·any-of soul who she-is-eating carcass and· animal -torn-to-pieces in· the ·native and·in· the ·sojourner and·he- m rinses garments-of·him and·he-washes in· the ·waters and·he- is -unclean until the·evening and·he- is -clean 
17:16 and·if not he-is- m rinsing and·flesh-of·him not he-is-washing and·he-bears depravity-of·him 

Leviticus 18
18:1 and·he-is- m speaking Yahweh to Moses to·to-say-of 
18:2 m speak-you ! to sons-of Israel and·you-say to·them I Yahweh Elohim-of·you (p)

18:4 » judgments-of·me you (p) -shall-do and·» statutes-of·me you (p) -shall-observe to·to-walk-of in·them I Yahweh Elohim-of·you (p) 
18:5 and·you (p) -observe » statutes-of·me and·» judgments-of·me who he-is-doing »·them the·human and·he-lives in·them I Yahweh

18:10 nakedness-of daughter-of son-of·you or daughter-of daughter-of·you not you-shall- m expose nakedness-of·them that nakedness-of·you they (f) 
18:11 nakedness-of daughter-of woman-of father-of·you kindred-of father-of·you sister-of·you s he not you-shall- m expose nakedness-of·her 
18:12 nakedness-of sister-of father-of·you not you-shall- m expose kin-of father-of·you s he 
18:13 nakedness-of sister-of mother-of·you not you-shall- m expose that kin-of mother-of·you s he 
18:14 nakedness-of brother-of father-of·you not you-shall- m expose to woman-of·him not you-shall-approach aunt-of·you s he 
18:15 nakedness-of daughter-in-law-of·you not you-shall- m expose woman-of son-of·you s he not you-shall- m expose nakedness-of·her 
18:16 nakedness-of woman-of brother-of·you not you-shall- m expose nakedness-of brother-of·you s he

18:19 and·to woman in·isolation-of uncleanness-of·her not you-shall-approach to·to- m expose-of nakedness-of·her 
18:20 and·to woman-of companion-of·you not you-shall-give emission-of·you to·seed to·to- be -unclean-of in·her 
18:21 and·from·seed-of·you not you-shall-give to·to- c make -pass-of to· the ·Moloch and·not you-shall- m profane » name-of Elohim-of·you I Yahweh 
18:22 and· with male not you-shall-lie- down beds-of woman abhorrence s he

18:24 must-not -be you (p) -are-defiling- your selves in·any-of these that in·all-of these they-are-defiled the·nations which I m dismissing from·faces-of·you (p) 
18:25 and·she-is- be ing-unclean the·land and·I-shall-visit depravity-of·her on·her and·she-shall- c vomit- out the·land » ones-dwelling-of·her

18:29 that any one who he-shall-do from·any-of the·abhorrences the·these and·they-are-cut- off the·souls the·ones-doing from·within-of people-of·them

Leviticus 19

Leviticus 20
20:1 and·he-is- m speaking Yahweh to Moses to·to-say-of 
20:2 and·to sons-of Israel you-shall-say man man from·sons-of Israel and·from the·sojourner the·one-sojourning in·Israel who he-shall-give from·seed-of·him to· the ·Moloch to- be-put-to -death he-shall-be- c put-to -death people-of the·land they-shall-pelt·him in· the ·stone 
20:3 and·I I-shall-give » faces-of·me in· the ·man the·he and·I- c cut- off »·him from·within-of people-of·him that from·seed-of·him he-gave to· the ·Moloch so-that to- m defile-of » sanctuary-of·me and·to·to- m profane-of » name-of holiness-of·me 
20:4 and·if to- c obscure they-are- c obscuring people-of the·land » eyes-of·them from the·man the·he in·to-give-of·him from·seed-of·him to· the ·Moloch to·so-as-not to- c put-to -death-of »·him 
20:5 and·I-place I » faces-of·me in· the ·man the·he and·in·family-of·him and·I- c cut- off »·him and·» all-of the·ones-prostituting after·him to·to-prostitute-of after the·Moloch from·within-of people-of·them 
20:6 and·the·soul who she-is-facing- about to the·mediums and·to the·wizards to·to-prostitute-of after·them and·I-give » faces-of·me in· the ·soul the· s he and·I- c cut- off »·him from·within-of people-of·him

Numbers 36
36:1 and·they-are- com ing-near heads-of the·fathers to·family-of sons-of Gilead son-of Machir son-of Manasseh from·families-of sons-of Joseph and·they-are- m speaking to·faces-of Moses and·to·faces-of the·princes heads-of fathers to·sons-of Israel 
36:2 and·they-are-saying » lord-of·me he- m instructed Yahweh to·to-give-of » the·land in·allotment in·lot to·sons-of Israel and·lord-of·me he-was- m instructed in·Yahweh to·to-give-of » allotment-of Zelophehad brother-of·us to·daughters-of·him 
36:3 and·they-become to·one from·sons-of tribes-of sons-of Israel for·women and·she-is-diminished allotment-of·them from·allotment-of fathers-of·us and·he-is-added on allotment-of the·stock which they-shall-become to·them and·from·lot-of allotment-of·us he-shall-be-diminished 
36:4 and·if he-is-becoming the·jubilee for·sons-of Israel and·she-is-added allotment-of·them on allotment-of the·stock which they-are-becoming to·them and·from·allotment-of stock-of fathers-of·us he-shall-be-diminished allotment-of·them 
36:5 and·he-is- m instructing Moses » sons-of Israel on bidding-of Yahweh to·to-say-of so stock-of sons-of Joseph ones-speaking 
36:6 this the·word which he- m instructed Yahweh to·daughters-of Zelophehad to·to-say-of to· the ·good-one in·eyes-of·them they-shall-become to·women yea to·family-of stock-of father-of·them they-shall-become to·women 
36:7 and·not she-shall- go -around allotment to·sons-of Israel from·stock to stock that man in·allotment-of stock-of fathers-of·him they-shall-cling sons-of Israel 
36:8 and·every-of daughter tenanting allotment from·stocks-of sons-of Israel to·one from·family-of stock-of father-of·her she-shall-become to·woman so-that they-shall-tenant sons-of Israel man allotment-of fathers-of·him 
36:9 and·not she-shall- go -around allotment from·stock to·stock another that man in·allotment-of·him they-shall-cling stocks-of sons-of Israel 
36:10 as·which he- m instructed Yahweh » Moses so they-did daughters-of Zelophehad 
36:11 and·they-are-becoming Mahlah Tirzah and·Hoglah and·Milcah and·Noah daughters-of Zelophehad to·sons-of uncles-of·them to·women 
36:12 from·families-of sons-of Manasseh son-of Joseph they-became to·women and·she-is-becoming allotment-of·them on stock-of family-of father-of·them 
36:13 these the·instructions and·the·judgments which he- m instructed Yahweh in·hand-of Moses to sons-of Israel in·gorges-of Moab on Jordan-of Jericho 

Deuteronomy 1
1:1 these the·words which he- m spoke Moses to all-of Israel in·across-of the·Jordan in· the ·wilderness in· the ·gorge opposite Suph between Paran and·between Tophel and·Laban and·Hazeroth and·Di~Zahab 
1:2 one-of ten day from·Horeb way-of mountain-of Seir unto Kadesh~Barnea 
1:3 and·he-is-becoming in·forty year in·one-of ten month in·one to· the ·month he- m spoke Moses to sons-of Israel as·all which he- m instructed Yahweh »·him to·them 
1:4 after to- c smite-of·him » Sihon king-of the·Amorite who dwelling in·Heshbon and·» Og king-of the·Bashan who dwelling in·Ashteroth in·Edrei 
1:5 in·across-of the·Jordan in·land-of Moab he- c was -disposed Moses he-made-plain » the·law the·this to·to-say-of 
1:6 Yahweh Elohim-of·us he- m spoke to·us in·Horeb to·to-say-of much to·you (p) to-dwell-of in· the ·mountain the·this 
1:7 face- about- you (p)  ! and·journey-you (p)  ! for·you (p) and·come-you (p)  ! mountain-of the·Amorite and·to all-of neighbors-of·him in· the ·gorge in· the ·mountain and·in· the ·low- foothill and·in· the ·Negev and·in·port-of the·sea land-of the·Canaanite and·the·Lebanon as-far-as the·stream the·great stream-of Euphrates 
1:8 see-you ! I-gave to·faces-of·you (p) » the·land enter-you (p)  ! and·tenant-you (p)  ! » the·land which he- n swore Yahweh to·fathers-of·you (p) to·Abraham to·Isaac and·to·Jacob to·to-give-of to·them and·to·seed-of·them after·them 
1:9 and·I-am-saying to·you (p) in· the ·time the· s he to·to-say-of not I-am- be ing-able to·alone-of·me to-bear-of »·you (p) 
1:10 Yahweh Elohim-of·you (p) he- c increased »·you (p) and·behold·you (p)  ! the·day as·stars-of the·heavens for·multitude 
1:11 Yahweh Elohim-of fathers-of·you (p) he-shall- c add on·you (p) as·you (p) thousand-of times and·he-shall- m bless »·you (p) as·which he- m spoke to·you (p) 
1:12 how ? I-shall-bear to·alone-of·me encumbrance-of·you (p) and·load-of·you (p) and·contention-of·you (p) 
1:13 grant-you (p)  ! to·you (p) mortals wise-ones and·ones- n understanding and·ones-being-known to·tribes-of·you (p) and·I-shall-place·them in·heads-of·you (p) 
1:14 and·you (p) -are-answering »·me and·you (p) -are-saying good the·word which you- m speak to·to-do-of 
1:15 and·I-am-taking » heads-of tribes-of·you (p) mortals wise-ones and·ones-being-known and·I-am-giving »·them heads over·you (p) chiefs-of thousands and·chiefs-of hundreds and·chiefs-of fifties and·chiefs-of tens and·superintendents for·tribes-of·you (p) 
1:16 and·I-am- m instructing » ones-judging-of·you (p) in· the ·time the· s he to·to-say-of to-hear between brothers-of·you (p) and·you (p) -judge righteousness between man and·between brother-of·him and·between sojourner-of·him 
1:17 not you (p) -shall- c recognize faces in· the ·judgment as· the ·small as· the ·great you (p) -shall-hear not you (p) -shall-shrink- away from·faces-of man that the·judgment to·Elohim he and·the·matter which he-is- be ing-hard from·you (p) you (p) -shall- c bring -near to·me and·I-hear·him 
1:18 and·I-am- m instructing »·you (p) in· the ·time the· s he » all-of the·things which you (p) -shall-do 
1:19 and·we-are-journeying from·Horeb and·we-are-going » all-of the·wilderness the·great and·the·being-feared the·he which you (p) -saw way-of mountain-of the·Amorite as·which he- m instructed Yahweh Elohim-of·us »·us and·we-are-coming as-far-as Kadesh~Barnea 
1:20 and·I-am-saying to·you (p) you (p) -came as-far-as mountain-of the·Amorite which Yahweh Elohim-of·us giving to·us 
1:21 see-you ! he-gave Yahweh Elohim-of·you to·faces-of·you » the·land ascend-you ! tenant-you ! as·which he- m spoke Yahweh Elohim-of fathers-of·you to·you must-not -be you-are-fearing and·must-not -be you-are-being-dismayed 
1:22 and·you (p) -are- com ing-near to·me all-of·you (p) and·you (p) -are-saying we-shall-send mortals to·faces-of·us and·they-shall-reconnoiter for·us » the·land and·they-shall- c bring-back »·us word » the·way which we-shall-ascend in·her and·» the·cities which we-shall-come to·them 
1:23 and·he-is- be ing-good in·eyes-of·me the·word and·I-am-taking from·you (p) two ten mortals man one to· the ·tribe 
1:24 and·they-are-facing- about and·they-are-ascending the·mountain·ward and·they-are-coming unto watercourse-of Eshcol and·they-are- m spying »·her 
1:25 and·they-are-taking in·hand-of·them from·fruit-of the·land and·they-are- c bring ing-down to·us and·they-are- c bringing-back »·us word and·they-are-saying good the·land which Yahweh Elohim-of·us giving to·us 
1:26 and·not you (p) -would to·to-ascend-of and·you (p) -are- c defying » bidding-of Yahweh Elohim-of·you (p) 
1:27 and·you (p) -are- n grumbling in·tents-of·you (p) and·you (p) -are-saying in·hatred-of Yahweh »·us he- c brought -forth·us from·land-of Egypt to·to-give-of »·us in·hand-of the·Amorite to·to- c exterminate-of·us 
1:28 whither ? we ones-ascending brothers-of·us they- c melt » heart-of·us to·to-say-of people great and· be ing-high from·us cities great-ones and·defended-ones in· the ·heavens and·moreover sons-of Anakim we-saw there 
1:29 and·I-am-saying to·you (p) not you (p) -shall- be -terrifi ed and·not you (p) -shall-fear from·them 
1:30 Yahweh Elohim-of·you (p) the·one-going to·faces-of·you (p) he he-shall- n fight for·you (p) as·all which he-did with ·you (p) in·Egypt to·eyes-of·you (p) 
1:31 and·in· the ·wilderness which you-saw which he-carried·you Yahweh Elohim-of·you as·which he-is-carrying man » son-of·him in·all-of the·way which you (p) -went until to-come-of·you (p) unto the·place ri the·this 
1:32 and·in· the ·matter the·this there -is-no·you (p) ones- c believing in·Yahweh Elohim-of·you (p) 
1:33 the·one-going to·faces-of·you (p) in· the ·way to·to-explore-of for·you (p) place ri to·to-encamp-of·you (p) in· the ·fire night to·to- c show-of·you (p) in· the ·way which you (p) -shall-go in·her and·in· the ·cloud by-day 
1:34 and·he-is-hearing Yahweh » sound-of words-of·you (p) and·he-is- be ing-wrathful and·he-is- n swearing to·to-say-of 
1:35 should-not- be he-shall-see man in· the ·mortals the·these the·generation the·evil the·this » the·land the·good which I- n swore to·to-give-of to·fathers-of·you (p) 
1:36 except Caleb son-of Jephunneh he he-shall-see·her and·to·him I-shall-give » the·land which he-trod in·her and·to·sons-of·him because which he- m follow ed-fully after Yahweh 
1:37 moreover in·me he- s was -angry Yahweh in·due-to·you (p) to·to-say-of even you not you-shall-enter there 
1:38 Joshua son-of Nun the·one-standing to·faces-of·you he he-shall-enter there·ward »·him m encourage-you ! that he he-shall- c allot·her » Israel 
1:39 and·tot-of·you (p) whom you (p) -said to·plunder he-shall-become and·sons-of·you (p) who not they-know the·day good and·evil they they-shall-enter there·ward and·to·them I-shall-give·her and·they they-shall-tenant·her 
1:40 and·you (p) face- about- you (p)  ! to·you (p) and·journey-you (p)  ! the·wilderness·ward way-of sea-of weed 
1:41 and·you (p) -are-answering and·you (p) -are-saying to·me we-sinned to·Yahweh we we-shall-ascend and·we-shall- n fight as·all which he- m instructed·us Yahweh Elohim-of·us and·you (p) -are-girding man » implements-of war-of·him and·you (p) -are- c be ing-rash to·to-ascend-of the·mountain·ward 
1:42 and·he-is-saying Yahweh to·me say-you ! to·them not you (p) -shall-ascend and·not you (p) -shall- n fight that there -is-no·me in·within-of·you (p) and·not you (p) -shall-be-stricken to·faces-of ones- be ing-enemies-of·you (p) 
1:43 and·I-am- m speaking to·you (p) and·not you (p) -listened and·you (p) -are- c defying » bidding-of Yahweh and·you (p) -are- c be ing-arrogant and·you (p) -are-ascending the·mountain·ward 
1:44 and·he-is- com ing-forth the·Amorite the·one-dwelling in· the ·mountain the·he to·to-meet-of·you (p) and·they-are-pursuing »·you (p) as·which they-are-doing the·bees and·they-are- c pounding »·you (p) in·Seir as-far-as Hormah 
1:45 and·you (p) -are-returning and·you (p) -are-lamenting to·faces-of Yahweh and·not he-listened Yahweh in·voice-of·you (p) and·not he- c gave -ear to·you (p) 
1:46 and·you (p) -are-dwelling in·Kadesh days many-ones as· the ·days which you (p) -dwelt 

Deuteronomy 2
2:1 and·we-are-facing- about and·we-are-journeying the·wilderness·ward way-of sea-of weed as·which he- m spoke Yahweh to·me and·we-are- be ing-around » mountain-of Seir days many-ones 
2:2 and·he-is-saying Yahweh to·me to·to-say-of 
2:3 much to·you (p) to- be -around-of » the·mountain the·this face- about- you (p)  ! to·you (p) north·ward 
2:4 and·» the·people m instruct-you ! to·to-say-of you (p) ones-passing in·boundary-of brothers-of·you (p) sons-of Esau the·ones-dwelling in·Seir and·they-shall-fear from·you (p) and·you (p) -are - n on -guard very 
2:5 must-not -be you (p) -are-stirring- up - your selves in·them that not I-shall-give to·you (p) from·land-of·them unto tread-of sole-of foot that tenancy to·Esau I-gave » mountain-of Seir 
2:6 food you (p) -shall-purchase from· with ·them in· the ·silver and·you (p) -eat and·even waters you (p) -shall-bargain from· with ·them in· the ·silver and·you (p) -drink 
2:7 that Yahweh Elohim-of·you he- m blessed·you in·all-of deed-of hand-of·you he-knows to-go-of·you » the·wilderness the·great the·this this forty year Yahweh Elohim-of·you with·you not you-lacked thing 
2:8 and·we-are-passing from· with brothers-of·us sons-of Esau the·ones-dwelling in·Seir from·way-of the·gorge from·Elath and·from·Ezion~Geber and·we-are-facing- about and·we-are-passing way-of wilderness-of Moab 
2:9 and·he-is-saying Yahweh to·me must-not -be you-are-distressing » Moab and·must-not -be you-are-stirring- up - your self in·them battle that not I-shall-give to·you from·land-of·him tenancy that to·sons-of Lot I-gave » Ar tenancy 
2:10 the·Emim to·faces they-dwelt in·her people great and·many and· be ing-high as· the ·Anakim 
2:11 Rephaim they-are-being-accounted indeed they as· the ·Anakim and·the·Moabites they-are-calling to·them Emim 
2:12 and·in·Seir they-dwelt the·Horites to·faces and·sons-of Esau they-are-evicting·them and·they-are- c exterminating·them from·faces-of·them and·they-are-dwelling instead-of·them as·which he-did Israel to·land-of tenancy-of·him which he-gave Yahweh to·them 
2:13 now arise-you (p)  ! and·cross-you (p)  ! for·you (p) » watercourse-of Zered and·we-are-crossing » watercourse-of Zered 
2:14 and·the·days which we-went from·Kadesh~Barnea until which we-crossed » watercourse-of Zered thirty and·eight year until to-come-to-end-of all-of the·generation mortals-of the·war from·within-of the·camp as·which he- n swore Yahweh to·them 
2:15 and·moreover hand-of Yahweh she-became in·them to·to-discomfit-of·them from·within-of the·camp until to-come-to-end-of·them 
2:16 and·he-is-becoming as·which they-came-to-end all-of mortals-of the·war to·to-die-of from·within-of the·people 
2:17 and·he-is- m speaking Yahweh to·me to·to-say-of 
2:18 you passing the·day » boundary-of Moab » Ar 
2:19 and·you- come -near be fore sons-of Ammon must-not -be you-are-distressing·them and·must-not -be you-are-stirring- up - your self in·them that not I-shall-give from·land-of sons-of Ammon to·you tenancy that to·sons-of Lot I-gave·her tenancy 
2:20 land-of Rephaim she-is-being-accounted indeed s he Rephaim they-dwelt in·her to·faces and·the·Ammonites they-are-calling to·them Zumzummim 
2:21 people great and·many and· be ing-high as· the ·Anakim and·he-is- c exterminating·them Yahweh from·faces-of·them and·they-are-evicting·them and·they-are-dwelling instead-of·them 
2:22 as·which he-did for·sons-of Esau the·ones-dwelling in·Seir which he- c exterminated » the·Horite from·faces-of·them and·they-are-evicting·them and·they-are-dwelling instead-of·them until the·day the·this 
2:23 and·the·Avvim the·ones-dwelling in·courts as-far-as Gaza Caphtorim the·ones- com ing-forth from·Caphtor they- c exterminated·them and·they-are-dwelling instead-of·them 
2:24 arise-you (p)  ! journey-you (p)  ! and·cross-you (p)  ! » watercourse-of Arnon see-you ! I-give in·hand-of·you » Sihon king-of Heshbon the·Amorite and·» land-of·him c start-you ! evict-you ! and· s struggle-you ! in·him battle 
2:25 the·day the·this I-shall- c start to-give-of awe-of·you and·fear-of·you on faces-of the·peoples under all-of the·heavens which they-shall-hear report-of·you and·they- are -disturbed and·they-travail from·faces-of·you 
2:26 and·I-am-sending messengers from·wilderness-of Kedemoth to Sihon king-of Heshbon words-of peace to·to-say-of 
2:27 I-shall-pass in·land-of·you in· the ·way in· the ·way I-shall-go not I-shall-withdraw right and·left 
2:28 food in· the ·silver you-shall- c retail·me and·I-eat and·waters in· the ·silver you-shall-give to·me and·I-drink but I-shall-pass in·feet-of·me 
2:29 as·which they-did for·me sons-of Esau the·ones-dwelling in·Seir and·the·Moabites the·ones-dwelling in·Ar until which I-shall-cross » the·Jordan to the·land which Yahweh Elohim-of·us giving to·us 
2:30 and·not he-complied Sihon king-of Heshbon to- c let -pass-of·us in·him that he- c made -obstinate Yahweh Elohim-of·you » spirit-of·him and·he-made-resolute » heart-of·him so-that to-give-of·him in·hand-of·you as·day the·this 
2:31 and·he-is-saying Yahweh to·me see-you ! I- c started to-give-of to·faces-of·you » Sihon and·» land-of·him c start-you ! evict-you ! to·to-tenant-of » land-of·him 
2:32 and·he-is- com ing-forth Sihon to·to-meet-of·us he and·all-of people-of·him for· the ·battle Jahaz·ward 
2:33 and·he-is-giving·him Yahweh Elohim-of·us to·faces-of·us and·we-are- c smiting »·him and·» son-of·him sons-of·him and·» all-of people-of·him 
2:34 and·we-are-seizing » all-of cities-of·him in· the ·time the· s he and·we-are- c dooming » every-of city death-doomeds and·the·women and·the·tot not we- c let -remain survivor 
2:35 but the·beast we-plundered for·us and·loot-of the·cities which we-seized 
2:36 from·Aroer which on ridge-of watercourse-of Arnon and·the·city which in· the ·watercourse and·as-far-as the·Gilead not she-was bc town which she- was -impregnable from·us » the·all he-gave Yahweh Elohim-of·us to·faces-of·us 
2:37 but to land-of sons-of Ammon not you- came -near any-of side-of watercourse-of Jabbok and·cities-of the·mountain and·all which he- m instructed Yahweh Elohim-of·us 

Deuteronomy 3
3:1 and·we-are-facing- about and·we-are-ascending way-of the·Bashan and·he-is- com ing-forth Og king-of the·Bashan to·to-meet-of·us he and·all-of people-of·him for· the ·battle Edrei 
3:2 and·he-is-saying Yahweh to·me must-not -be you-are-fearing »·him that in·hand-of·you I-gave »·him and·» all-of people-of·him and·» land-of·him and·you-do to·him as·which you-did to·Sihon king-of the·Amorite who dwelling in·Heshbon 
3:3 and·he-is-giving Yahweh Elohim-of·us in·hand-of·us moreover » Og king-of the·Bashan and·» all-of people-of·him and·we-are- c smiting·him until so-as-not he- c remained to·him survivor 
3:4 and·we-are-seizing » all-of cities-of·him in· the ·time the· s he not she-was bc town which not we-took from· with ·them sixty city all-of district-of Argob kingdom-of Og in· the ·Bashan 
3:5 all-of these cities fortressed-ones wall lofty double- doors and·bar to·aside-of from·cities-of the·village to- c be -many very 
3:6 and·we-are- c dooming »·them as·which we-did to·Sihon king-of Heshbon to- c doom every-of city death-doomeds the·women and·the·tot 
3:7 and·all-of the·beast and·loot-of the·cities we-plundered for·us 
3:8 and·we-are-taking in· the ·time the· s he » the·land from·hand-of two-of kings-of the·Amorite who in·across-of the·Jordan from·watercourse-of Arnon as-far-as mountain-of Hermon 
3:9 Sidonians they-are-calling to·Hermon Sirion and·the·Amorite they-are-calling to·him Shenir 
3:10 all-of cities-of the·level and·all-of the·Gilead and·all-of the·Bashan as-far-as Salchah and·Edrei cities-of kingdom-of Og in· the ·Bashan 
3:11 that but Og king-of the·Bashan he- n remained from·rest-of the·Rephaim behold ! divan-of·him divan-of iron ?·not s he in·Rabbah-of sons-of Ammon nine cubits length-of·her and·four-of cubits width-of·her in·cubit-of man 
3:12 and·» the·land the·this we-took-over in· the ·time the· s he from·Aroer which on watercourse-of Arnon and·half-of mountain-of the·Gilead and·cities-of·him I-gave to·Reubenite and·to· the ·Gadite 
3:13 and·rest-of the·Gilead and·all-of the·Bashan kingdom-of Og I-gave to· the ·half-of tribe-of the·Manasseh all-of district-of the·Argob to·all-of the·Bashan the·he he-is-being-called land-of Rephaim 
3:14 Jair son-of Manasseh he-took » all-of district-of Argob as-far-as boundary-of the·Geshurite and·the·Maacathite and·he-is-calling »·them on name-of·him » the·Bashan living -place s-of Jair until the·day the·this 
3:15 and·to·Machir I-gave » the·Gilead 
3:16 and·to·Reubenite and·to· the ·Gadite I-gave from the·Gilead and·as-far-as watercourse-of Arnon middle-of the·watercourse and·boundary and·as-far-as Jabbok the·watercourse boundary-of sons-of Ammon 
3:17 and·the·gorge and·the·Jordan and·boundary from·Chinnereth and·as-far-as sea-of the·gorge sea-of the·salt below slopes-of the·Pisgah sun rise·ward 
3:18 and·I-am- m instructing »·you (p) in· the ·time the· s he to·to-say-of Yahweh Elohim-of·you (p) he-gave to·you (p) » the·land the·this to·to-tenant-of·her ones-being-outfitted you (p) -shall-cross- over to·faces-of brothers-of·you (p) sons-of Israel all-of sons-of valor 
3:19 but women-of·you (p) and·tot-of·you (p) and·cattles-of·you (p) I-know that cattle much to·you (p) they-shall-dwell in·cities-of·you (p) which I-gave to·you (p) 
3:20 until which he-shall- c give -rest Yahweh to·brothers-of·you (p) as·you (p) and·they-tenant moreover they » the·land which Yahweh Elohim-of·you (p) giving to·them in·across-of the·Jordan and·you (p) -return man to·tenancy-of·him which I-gave to·you (p)

Deuteronomy 7
7:1 that he-shall- c bring·you Yahweh Elohim-of·you to the·land which you entering there·ward to·to-tenant-of·her and·he-eases- out nations many-ones from·faces-of·you the·Hittite and·the·Girgashite and·the·Amorite and·the·Canaanite and·the·Perizzite and·the·Hivite and·the·Jebusite seven nations grand-ones and·staunch-ones from·you

Deuteronomy 8

21:1 that he-is-being-found one- mortally -wounded in· the ·ground which Yahweh Elohim-of·you giving to·you to·to-tenant-of·her hav ing-fall en in· the ·field not he-is-known who ? he- c smote·him

Deuteronomy 26
26:1 and·he-becomes that you-are-coming to the·land which Yahweh Elohim-of·you giving to·you allotment and·you-tenant·her and·you-dwell in·her 
26:2 and·you-take from·first-of all-of fruit-of the·ground which you-shall- c bring from·land-of·you which Yahweh Elohim-of·you giving to·you and·you-place in· the ·basket and·you-go to the·place ri which he-shall-choose Yahweh Elohim-of·you to·to-make-tabernacle-of name-of·him there 
26:3 and·you-come to the·priest who he-shall-become in· the ·days the·they and·you-say to·him I- c tell the·day to·Yahweh Elohim-of·you that I-came to the·land which he- n swore Yahweh to·fathers-of·us to·to-give-of to·us 
26:4 and·he-takes the·priest the·basket from·hand-of·you and·he- c leaves·him to·faces-of altar-of Yahweh Elohim-of·you 
26:5 and·you-respond and·you-say to·faces-of Yahweh Elohim-of·you Aramean be ing-lost father-of·me and·he-is- go ing-down Egypt·ward and·he-is-sojourning there in·death-doomeds few and·he-is-becoming there to·nation great staunch and·numerous

Deuteronomy 27

Deuteronomy 30

Deuteronomy 33

Deuteronomy 34
34:1 and·he-is-ascending Moses from·gorges-of Moab to mountain-of Nebo summit-of the·Pisgah which on faces-of Jericho and·he-is- c showing·him Yahweh » all-of the·land » the·Gilead as-far-as Dan 
34:2 and·» all-of Naphtali and·» land-of Ephraim and·Manasseh and·» all-of land-of Judah as-far-as the·sea the·behind 
34:3 and·» the·Negev and·» the·basin valley-of Jericho City-of~the·palms as-far-as Zoar 
34:4 and·he-is-saying Yahweh to·him this the·land which I- n swore to·Abraham to·Isaac and·to·Jacob to·to-say-of to·seed-of·you I-shall-give·her I- c let -see·you in·eyes-of·you and·there·ward not you-shall-cross 
34:5 and·he-is-dying there Moses servant-of Yahweh in·land-of Moab on bidding-of Yahweh 
34:6 and·he-is-entombing »·him in· the ·ravine in·land-of Moab opposite Beth~Peor and·not he-knows man » tomb-of·him until the·day the·this 
34:7 and·Moses son-of hundred and·twenty year in·to-die-of·him not she- was -dim eye-of·him and·not he-fled sap-of-him 
34:8 and·they-are-lamenting sons-of Israel » Moses in·gorges-of Moab thirty day and·they-are-coming-to-end days-of lamentation-of mourning-of Moses 
34:9 and·Joshua son-of Nun he- was -filled spirit-of wisdom that he-supported Moses » hands-of·him on·him and·they-are-listening to·him sons-of Israel and·they-are-doing as·which he- m instructed Yahweh » Moses 
34:10 and·not he-arose prophet further in·Israel as·Moses whom he-knew·him Yahweh faces to faces 
34:11 to·all-of the·signs and·the·miracles which he-sent·him Yahweh to·to-do-of in·land-of Egypt to·Pharaoh and·to·all-of servants-of·him and·to·all-of land-of·him 
34:12 and·to·all-of the·hand the·steadfast and·to·all-of the·fear the·great which he-did Moses to·eyes-of all-of Israel

Joshua 9
9:1 and·he-is-becoming as·to-hear-of all-of the·kings who in·across-of the·Jordan in· the ·mountain and·in· the ·low- foothill and·in·every-of port-of the·sea the·great to fore front the·Lebanon the·Hittite and·the·Amorite the·Canaanite the·Perizzite the·Hivite and·the·Jebusite

Joshua 10

Joshua 12
12:1 and·these kings-of the·land whom they- c smote sons-of Israel and·they-are-tenanting » land-of·them in·across-of the·Jordan sun rise·ward the·sun from·watercourse-of Arnon as-far-as mountain-of Hermon and·all-of the·gorge sun rise·ward 
12:2 Sihon king-of the·Amorite the·one-dwelling in·Heshbon ruling from·Aroer which on shore-of watercourse-of Arnon and·middle-of the·watercourse and·half-of the·Gilead and·as-far-as Jabbok the·watercourse boundary-of sons-of Ammon 
12:3 and·the·gorge as-far-as sea-of Chinnereth east·ward and·as-far-as sea-of the·gorge sea-of the·salt east·ward way-of Beth~the-Jeshimoth and·from·south under slopes-of the·Pisgah 
12:4 and·boundary-of Og king-of the·Bashan from·rest-of the·Rephaim the·one-dwelling in·Ashtaroth and·in·Edrei

Joshua 22
22:1 then he-is-calling Joshua to·Reubenite and·to· the ·Gadite and·to· the ·half-of stock-of Manasseh 
22:2 and·he-is-saying to·them you (p) you (p) -kept » all which he- m instructed »·you (p) Moses servant-of Yahweh and·you (p) -are-listening in·voice-of·me to·all which I- m instructed »·you (p) 
22:3 not you (p) -forsook » brothers-of·you (p) this days many-ones until the·day the·this and·you (p) -kept » charge-of instruction-of Yahweh Elohim-of·you (p) 
22:4 and·now he- c gave -rest Yahweh Elohim-of·you (p) to·brothers-of·you (p) as·which he- m spoke to·them and·now face- about- you (p)  ! and·go-you (p)  ! for·you (p) to·tents-of·you (p) to land-of holding-of·you (p) which he-gave to·you (p) Moses servant-of Yahweh in·across-of the·Jordan

22:8 and·he-is-saying to·them to·to-say-of in·substances abundant-ones return-you (p)  ! to tents-of·you (p) and·in·cattle much very in·silver and·in·gold and·in·copper and·in·iron and·in·raiments to- c be -many very apportion-you (p)  ! loot-of ones- be ing-enemies-of·you (p) with brothers-of·you (p)

Judges 6
6:1 and·they-are-doing sons-of Israel the·evil in·eyes-of Yahweh and·he-is-giving·them Yahweh in·hand-of Midian seven years 
6:2 and·she-is- be ing-strong hand-of Midian on Israel from·faces-of Midian they-made do for·them sons-of Israel » the·dens which in· the ·mountains and·» the·caves and·» the·fastnesses 
6:3 and·he-became when he-sowed Israel and·he- came -up Midian and·Amalek and·sons-of east and·they- came -up on·him

Judges 12

Ruth 4

1Samuel 5

2Kings 18
18:1 and·he-is-becoming in·year-of three to·Hoshea son-of Elah king-of Israel he-be came -king Hezekiah son-of Ahaz king-of Judah 
18:2 son-of twenty and·five year he-was bc in·to-be come -king-of·him and·twenty and·nine year he-reigned in·Jerusalem and·name-of mother-of·him Abi daughter-of Zechariah 
18:3 and·he-is-doing the·upright in·eyes-of Yahweh as·all which he-did David father-of·him 
18:4 he he- c took-away » the·high-places and·he- m broke » the·monuments and·he-cut- down » the· fetish-of -happiness and·he- m pounded serpent-of the·copper which he-made do Moses that until the·days the·they they-were bc sons-of Israel ones- m fuming -incense to·him and·he-is-calling to·him Nehushtan 
18:5 in·Yahweh Elohim-of Israel he-trusted and·after·him not he-was bc like·him in·all-of kings-of Judah and·who they-were bc to·faces-of·him 
18:6 and·he-is-clinging in·Yahweh not he-withdrew from·after·him and·he-is-keeping instructions-of·him which he- m instructed Yahweh » Moses 
18:7 and·he-became Yahweh with·him in·all which he-is- go ing-forth he-is- c act ing-intelligently and·he-is-revolting in·king-of Assyria and·not he-served·him 
18:8 he he- c smote » Philistines as-far-as Gaza and·» boundaries-of·her from·tower-of ones-preserving unto city-of fortress 
18:9 and·he-is-becoming in· the ·year the·fourth to· the ·king Hezekiah she the·year the·seventh to·Hoshea son-of Elah king-of Israel he- came -up Shalmaneser king-of Assyria on Samaria and·he-is-besieging on·her 
18:10 and·they-are-seizing·her from·end-of three years in·year-of six to·Hezekiah she year-of nine to·Hoshea king-of Israel she-is-seized Samaria 
18:11 and·he-is- c deporting king-of Assyria » Israel Assyria·ward and·he-is- c guiding·them in·Halah and·in·Habor stream-of Gozan and·cities-of Medes 
18:12 on which not they-listened in·voice-of Yahweh Elohim-of·them and·they-are-trespassing » covenant-of·him » all-of which he- m instructed Moses servant-of Yahweh and·not they-listened and·not they-did 
18:13 and·in·four ten year to· the ·king Hezekiah he- came -up Sennacherib king-of Assyria on all-of cities-of Judah the·fortressed-ones and·he-is-grasping·them 
18:14 and·he-is-sending Hezekiah king-of Judah to king-of Assyria Lachish·ward to·to-say-of I-sinned turn-back-you ! from·on·me » which you-shall-give on·me I-shall-bear and·he-is-placing king-of Assyria on Hezekiah king-of Judah three-of hundreds talent-of silver and·thirty talent-of gold 
18:15 and·he-is-giving Hezekiah » all-of the·silver the·one-being-found house-of Yahweh and·in·treasuries-of house-of the·king 
18:16 in· the ·time the·she he- m cut-away Hezekiah » doors-of temple-of Yahweh and·» the·doorposts which he- m overlaid Hezekiah king-of Judah and·he-is-giving·them to·king-of Assyria 
18:17 and·he-is-sending king-of Assyria » army-commander and·» grandee eunuch and·» grandee cup-bearer from Lachish to the·king Hezekiah in·army massive Jerusalem and·they-are- go ing-up and·they-are-coming Jerusalem and·they-are- go ing-up and·they-are-coming and·they-are-standing in·trench-of the·reservoir the·uppermost which in·highway-of field-of one-laundering 
18:18 and·they-are-calling for the·king and·he-is- com ing-forth to·them Eliakim son-of Hilkiah who over the·house hold and·Shebna the·scribe and·Joah son-of Asaph the·one- c recording 
18:19 and·he-is-saying to·them grandee cup-bearer say-you (p)  ! please ! to Hezekiah thus he-says the·king the·great king-of Assyria what ? the·trust the·this which you-trust 
18:20 you-say yea word-of lips counsel and·mastery for· the ·war now on whom ? you-trust that you-revolt in·me 
18:21 now behold ! you-trust for·you on staff-of the·reed the·one-being-bruised the·this on Egypt which he-is- n supporting man on·him and·he-enters in·palm-of·him and·he-pierces·her so Pharaoh king-of Egypt to·all-of the·ones-trusting on·him 
18:22 and·that you (p) -shall-say to·me to Yahweh Elohim-of·us we-trust ?·not he who he- c took-away Hezekiah » high-places-of·him and·» altars-of·him and·he-is-saying to·Judah and·to·Jerusalem to·faces-of the·altar the·this you (p) -shall- s worship in·Jerusalem 
18:23 and·now s negotiate-you ! please ! with lord-of·me with king-of Assyria and·I-shall-give to·you two -thousands horses if you-are- be ing-able to·to-give-of for·you ones-riding on·them 
18:24 and·how ? you-shall- c reverse » faces-of viceroy-of one-of servants-of lord-of·me the·small-ones and·you-are-trusting for·you on Egypt for·chariot and·for·horsemen 
18:25 now ?·from·apart-from Yahweh I- came -up on the·place ri the·this to·to- c ruin-of·him Yahweh he-said to·me go -up-you ! on the·land the·this and· c ruin-you·her ! 
18:26 and·he-is-saying Eliakim son-of Hilkiah and·Shebna and·Joah to grandee cup-bearer m speak-you ! please ! to servants-of·you Aramaic that ones-hearing we and·must-not -be you-are- m speaking with·us Judean in·ears-of the·people who on the·wall 
18:27 and·he-is-saying to·them grandee cup-bearer ?·on lords-of·you and·to·you he-sent·me lord-of·me to·to- m speak-of » the·words the·these ?·not on the·mortals the·ones-sitting on the·wall to·to-eat-of » Ms excrements-of·them Ms filth-of·them and·to·to-drink-of » urines-of·them waters-of feet-of·them with·you (p) 
18:28 and·he-is-standing grandee cup-bearer and·he-is-calling in·voice loud Judean and·he-is- m speaking and·he-is-saying hear-you (p)  ! word-of the·king the·great king-of Assyria 
18:29 thus he-says the·king must-not -be he-is- c luring to·you (p) Hezekiah that not he-is- be ing-able to·to- c rescue-of »·you (p) from·hand-of·him 
18:30 and·must-not -be he-is- c mak ing-trust »·you (p) Hezekiah to Yahweh to·to-say-of to- c rescue he-shall- c rescue·us Yahweh and·not she-shall-be-given » the·city the·this in·hand-of king-of Assyria 
18:31 must-not -be you (p) -are-listening to Hezekiah that thus he-says king-of Assyria make do -you (p)  ! with ·me blessing and· come -forth-you (p)  ! to·me and·eat-you (p)  ! man vine-of·him and·man fig- tree -of·him and·drink-you (p)  ! man waters-of cistern-of·him 
18:32 until to-come-of·me and·I-take »·you (p) to land as·land-of·you (p) land-of grain and·grape-juice land-of bread and·vineyards land-of olive- tree -of clarified- oil and·honey and·live-you (p)  ! and·not you (p) -shall-die and·must-not -be you (p) -are-listening to Hezekiah that he-is- c inciting »·you (p) to·to-say-of Yahweh he-shall- c rescue·us 
18:33 ?·to- c rescue they- c rescued Elohim-of the·nations man » land-of·him from·hand-of king-of Assyria 
18:34 where ? Elohim-of Hamath and·Arphad where ? Elohim-of Sepharvaim Hena and·Ivvah that they- c rescued » Samaria from·hand-of·me 
18:35 who ? in·all-of Elohim-of the·lands who they- c rescued » land-of·them from·hand-of·me that he-shall- c rescue Yahweh » Jerusalem from·hand-of·me 
18:36 and·they- c were -silent the·people and·not they-answered »·him word that instruction-of the·king she to·to-say-of not you (p) -shall-answer·him 
18:37 and·he-is-coming Eliakim son-of Hilkiah who over the·house hold and·Shebna the·scribe and·Joah son-of Asaph the·one- c recording to Hezekiah ones-being-torn-of garments and·they-are- c telling to·him words-of grandee cup-bearer 

2Kings 19
19:1 and·he-is-becoming as·to-hear-of the·king Hezekiah and·he-is-tearing » garments-of·him and·he-is-covering- him self in· the ·sackcloth and·he-is-entering house-of Yahweh 
19:2 and·he-is-sending » Eliakim who over the·house hold and·Shebna the·scribe and·» old-ones-of the·priests ones- be ing- s cover ed in· the ·sackcloths to Isaiah the·prophet son-of Amoz 
19:3 and·they-are-saying to·him thus he-says Hezekiah day-of distress and·correction and·spurning the·day the·this that they-come sons unto breaking- forth and·vigor there -is-no to·to- give -birth-of 
19:4 perhaps he-shall-listen Yahweh Elohim-of·you » all-of words-of grandee cup-bearer whom he-sent·him king-of Assyria lords-of·him to·to- m reproach-of Elohim living-one and·he- c corrects in· the ·words which he-heard Yahweh Elohim-of·you and·you-lift- up prayer about the·remnant the·one-being-found 
19:5 and·they-are-coming servants-of the·king Hezekiah to Isaiah 
19:6 and·he-is-saying to·them Isaiah thus you (p) -shall-say to lords-of·you (p) thus he-says Yahweh must-not -be you-are-fearing from·faces-of the·words which you-heard which they- m taunted lads-of king-of Assyria »·me 
19:7 behold·me ! giving in·him spirit and·he-hears report and·he-returns to·land-of·him and·I-cause- to -fall·him in· the ·sword in·land-of·him 
19:8 and·he-is-turning-back grandee cup-bearer and·he-is-finding » king-of Assyria n fighting on Libnah that he-heard that he-decamped from·Lachish 
19:9 and·he-is-hearing to Tirhakah king-of Cush to·to-say-of behold ! he- went -forth to·to- n fight-of with ·you and·he-is-returning and·he-is-sending messengers to Hezekiah to·to-say-of 
19:10 thus you (p) -shall-say to Hezekiah king-of Judah to·to-say-of must-not -be he-is- c luring·you Elohim-of·you whom you trusting in·him to·to-say-of not she-shall-be-given Jerusalem in·hand-of king-of Assyria 
19:11 behold ! you you-heard » which they-did kings-of Assyria to·all-of the·lands to·to- c doom-of·them and·you you-shall-be-rescued 
19:12 ?·they- c rescued »·them Elohim-of the·nations which they- m ruined fathers-of·me » Gozan and·» Haran and·Rezeph and·sons-of Eden who in·Tel-Assar 
19:13 where·him ? king-of Hamath and·king-of Arphad and·king to· the ·city Sepharvaim Hena and·Ivvah 
19:14 and·he-is-taking Hezekiah » the·scrolls from·hand-of the·messengers and·he-is-reading·them and·he-is- go ing-up house-of Yahweh and·he-is-spreading·him Hezekiah to·faces-of Yahweh 
19:15 and·he-is- s praying Hezekiah to·faces-of Yahweh and·he-is-saying Yahweh Elohim-of Israel one-dwelling the·cherubim you he the·Elohim to·alone-of·you to·all-of kingdoms-of the·earth you you-made do » the·heavens and·» the·earth 
19:16 c stretch-out-you ! Yahweh ear-of·you and·hear-you ! unclose-you ! Yahweh eyes-of·you and·see-you ! and·hear-you ! » words-of Sennacherib which he-sent·him to·to- m reproach-of Elohim living-one 
19:17 truly Yahweh they- c drained kings-of Assyria » the·nations and·» land-of·them 
19:18 and·they-gave » Elohim-of·them in· the ·fire that not Elohim they but rather deed-of hands-of human wood and·stone and·they-are- m destroying·them 
19:19 and·now Yahweh Elohim-of·us c save-you·us ! please ! from·hand-of·him and·they-shall-know all-of kingdoms-of the·earth that you Yahweh Elohim to·alone-of·you 
19:20 and·he-is-sending Isaiah son-of Amoz to Hezekiah to·to-say-of thus he-says Yahweh Elohim-of Israel which you- s prayed to·me to Sennacherib king-of Assyria I-heard 
19:21 this the·word which he- m spoke Yahweh on·him she-despises to·you she-derides to·you virgin-of daughter-of Zion behind·you head she- c wags daughter-of Jerusalem 
19:22 » whom ? you- m reproached and·you- m taunted and·on whom ? you- c rais ed-high voice and·you-are-lifting -up height eyes-of·you on holy-one-of Israel 
19:23 in·hand-of messengers-of·you you- m reproached Lords and·you-are-saying in·chariot-of in·multitude-of chariot-of·me I I-ascended height-of mountains flanks-of Lebanon and·I-am-cutting -down stature-of cedars-of·him choice-of firs-of·him and·I-am-entering lodging-of outmost- part -of·him (?) wildwood-of crop- land -of·him 
19:24 I I-scooped and·I-drank waters alien-ones and·I-am- c draining in·sole-of footings-of·me all-of waterways-of lower-Egypt 
19:25 ?·not you-heard to·from·afar »·her I-made do to·from·days-of aforetime and·I-formed·her now I- c brought·her and·you-are-becoming to·to- c decimate-of mounds ones-being-crumbled cities fortressed-ones 
19:26 and·ones-dwelling-of·them short-ones-of hand they- are -dismayed and·they-are- be ing-asham ed they-became herbage-of field and·green-of vegetation grass-of house tops and·blasting to·faces-of raised -grain 
19:27 and·to-sit-of·you and·to -go -forth-of·you and·to-come-of·you I-know and·» to- s perturb-of·you to·me 
19:28 because to- s perturb-of·you to·me and·tranquil-one-of·you he-ascended in·ears-of·me and·I-place gaff-of·me in·nose-of·you and·bit-of·me in·lips-of·you and·I- c reverse·you in· the ·way which you-came in·her 
19:29 and·this for·you the·sign to-eat the·year self-sown and·in· the ·year the·second spontaneous-growth and·in· the ·year the·third sow-you (p)  ! and·reap-you (p)  ! and·plant-you (p)  ! vineyards and·eat-you (p)  ! fruit-of·them 
19:30 and·she-adds deliverance-of house-of Judah the·one- n remaining root to·downward and·he-makes do fruit to·up·ward 
19:31 that from·Jerusalem she-shall- go -forth remnant and·deliverance from·mountain-of Zion zeal-of Yahweh-of - hosts she-shall-do this 
19:32 therefore thus he-says Yahweh to king-of Assyria not he-shall-enter to the·city the·this and·not he-shall- c shoot there arrow and·not he-shall- m confront·her shield and·not he-shall-pour-out on·her earthwork 
19:33 in· the ·way which he-is-coming in·her he-shall-return and·to the·city the·this not he-shall-enter averment-of Yahweh 
19:34 and·I-protect to the·city the·this to·to- c save-of·her on-account-of·me and·on-account-of David servant-of·me 
19:35 and·he-is-becoming in· the ·night the·he and·he-is- go ing-forth messenger-of Yahweh and·he-is- c smiting in·camp-of Assyria hundred eighty and·five thousand and·they-are- c rising-early in· the ·morning and·behold ! all-of·them corpses ones-being-dead 
19:36 and·he-is-decamping and·he-is-going and·he-is-returning Sennacherib king-of Assyria and·he-is-dwelling in·Nineveh 
19:37 and·he-is-becoming he s worshiping house-of Nisroch Elohim-of·him and·Adrammelech and·Sharezer - sons-of·him they- c smote·him in· the ·sword and·they they- n escaped land-of Ararat and·he-is-reigning Esar-Haddon son-of·him instead-of·him 

2Kings 20
20:1 in· the ·days the·they he- was -ill Hezekiah to·to-die-of and·he-is-coming to·him Isaiah son-of Amoz the·prophet and·he-is-saying to·him thus he-says Yahweh m instruct-you ! to·house hold -of·you that dying you and·not you-shall-live 
20:2 and·he-is- c turn ing-around » faces-of·him to the·sidewall and·he-is- s praying to Yahweh to·to-say-of 
20:3 oh ! Yahweh remember-you ! please ! » which I- s walked to·faces-of·you in·faithfulness and·in·heart equitable and·the·good in·eyes-of·you I-did and·he-is-weeping Hezekiah weeping great 
20:4 and·he-is-becoming Isaiah not he- went -forth the·city court the·middle and·word-of Yahweh he-became to·him to·to-say-of 
20:5 turn-back-you ! and·you-say to Hezekiah governor-of people-of·me thus he-says Yahweh Elohim-of David father-of·you I-heard » prayer-of·you I-saw » tear-of·you behold·me ! healing to·you in· the ·day the·third you-shall- go -up house-of Yahweh 
20:6 and·I- c add on days-of·you five-of ten year and·from·palm-of king-of Assyria I-shall- c rescue·you and·» the·city the·this and·I-protect on the·city the·this on-account-of·me and·on-account-of David servant-of·me

20:10 and·he-is-saying Hezekiah he-is- n light for· the ·shadow to·to-decline-of ten-of steps not that he-shall-return the·shadow backward ten-of steps 
20:11 and·he-is-calling Isaiah the·prophet to Yahweh and·he-is- c reversing » the·shadow in· the ·steps which she-descended in·stairs-of Ahaz backward ten-of steps 
20:12 in· the ·era the·she he-sent Berodach~Baladan son-of Baladan king-of Babylon scrolls and·present to Hezekiah that he-heard that he- was -ill Hezekiah

20:16 and·he-is-saying Isaiah to Hezekiah hear-you ! word-of Yahweh 
20:17 behold ! days ones-coming and·he-is-carried -off all-of which in·house-of·you and·which they-treasured fathers-of·you until the·day the·this Babylon·ward not he-shall-be-left thing he-says Yahweh

2Kings 21
21:1 son-of two ten year Manasseh in·to-be come -king-of·him and·fifty and·five year he-reigned in·Jerusalem and·name-of mother-of·him Hephzi-Bah 
21:2 and·he-is-doing the·evil in·eyes-of Yahweh as·abhorrences-of the·nations which he- c evicted Yahweh from·faces-of sons-of Israel 
21:3 and·he-is-returning and·he-is-building » the·high-places which he- m destroyed Hezekiah father-of·him and·he-is- c setting-up altars for· the ·Baal and·he-is-making do fetish-of -happiness as·which he-did Ahab king-of Israel and·he-is-bowing-down- him self to·all-of host-of the·heavens and·he-is-serving »·them 
21:4 and·he-built altars in·house-of Yahweh which he-said Yahweh in·Jerusalem I-shall-place » name-of·me 
21:5 and·he-is-building altars to·all-of host-of the·heavens in·two-of courts-of house-of Yahweh 
21:6 and·he-caused- to -pass » son-of·him in· the ·fire and·he- m consult ed-clouds and·he- m practic ed-augury and·he-did medium and·wizards he- c did -much to·to-do-of the·evil in·eyes-of Yahweh to·to- c provoke-to -vexation-of 
21:7 and·he-is-placing » carving-of the· fetish-of -happiness which he-made do in· the ·house which he-said Yahweh to David and·to Solomon son-of·him in· the ·house the·this and·in·Jerusalem which I-chose from·all-of tribes-of Israel I-shall-place » name-of·me for·eon 
21:8 and·not I-shall-again to·to- c make -wander-of foot-of Israel from the·ground which I-gave to·fathers-of·them but if they-are-observing to·to-do-of as·all which I- m instructed·them and·to·all-of the·law which he- m instructed »·them servant-of·me Moses 
21:9 and·not they-listened and·he-is- c lead ing-astray·them Manasseh to·to-do-of » the·evil from the·nations which he- c exterminated Yahweh from·faces-of sons-of Israel 
21:10 and·he-is- m speaking Yahweh in·hand-of servants-of·him the·prophets to·to-say-of 
21:11 because which he-did Manasseh king-of Judah the·abhorrences the·these he- c did -evil from·all which they-did the·Amorite who to·faces-of·him and·he-is-causing- to -sin even » Judah in·ordure- idol s-of·him 
21:12 therefore thus he-says Yahweh Elohim-of Israel behold·me ! c bringing evil on Jerusalem and·Judah which all-of ones-hearing-of·him one-hearing-of·her they-shall-tingle two-of ears-of·him 
21:13 and·I-stretch-out over Jerusalem » tape-of Samaria and·» plummet-of house-of Ahab and·I-wipe -out » Jerusalem as·which he-is-wiping » the·pan he-wipes and·he-turns on faces-of·her 
21:14 and·I-abandon » remnant-of allotment-of·me and·I-give·them in·hand-of ones- be ing-enemies-of·them and·they-become for·plunder and·for·robbery to·all-of ones- be ing-enemies-of·them 
21:15 because which they-did » the·evil in·eyes-of·me and·they-were bc ones- c provok ing -to -vexation »·me from the·day which they- came -forth fathers-of·them from·Egypt and·until the·day the·this 
21:16 and·moreover blood innocent he-shed Manasseh to- c be -much very until which he- m filled » Jerusalem edge to·edge to·aside from·sin-of·him which he-caused- to -sin » Judah to·to-do-of the·evil in·eyes-of Yahweh

21:18 and·he-is-lying- down Manasseh with fathers-of·him and·he-is-being-entombed in·garden-of house-of·him in·garden-of Uzza and·he-is-reigning Amon son-of·him instead-of·him 
21:19 son-of twenty and·two year Amon in·to-be come -king-of·him and·two years he-reigned in·Jerusalem and·name-of mother-of·him Meshullemeth daughter-of Haruz from Jotbah

1Chronicles 15
15:1 and·he-is-making do for·him houses in·city-of David and·he-is- c preparing place ri for·coffer-of the·Elohim and·he-is-pitching for·him tent 
15:2 then he-said David not to·to-carry-of » coffer-of the·Elohim except only the·Levites that in·them he-chose Yahweh to·to-carry-of » coffer-of Yahweh and·to·to- m minister-of·him unto eon 
15:3 and·he-is- c assembling David » all-of Israel to Jerusalem to·to- c bring -up-of » coffer-of Yahweh to place ri -of·him which he- c prepared for·him 
15:4 and·he-is-gathering- together David » sons-of Aaron and·» the·Levites 
15:5 to·sons-of Kohath Uriel the·chief and·brothers-of·him hundred and·twenty 
15:6 to·sons-of Merari Asaiah the·chief and·brothers-of·him two- hundreds and·twenty 
15:7 to·sons-of Gershom Joel the·chief and·brothers-of·him hundred and·thirty 
15:8 to·sons-of Elizaphan Shemaiah the·chief and·brothers-of·him two- hundreds 
15:9 to·sons-of Hebron Eliel the·chief and·brothers-of·him eighty 
15:10 to·sons-of Uzziel Amminadab the·chief and·brothers-of·him hundred and·two ten 
15:11 and·he-is-calling David to·Zadok and·to·Abiathar the·priests and·to·Levites to·Uriel Asaiah and·Joel Shemaiah and·Eliel and·Amminadab 
15:12 and·he-is-saying to·them you (p) heads-of the·fathers to·Levites sanctify- your selves ! you (p) and·brothers-of·you (p) and·you (p) - c bring -up » coffer-of Yahweh Elohim-of Israel to I- c prepared for·him 
15:13 that to·from·in· the ·first not you (p) he-breached- forth Yahweh Elohim-of·us in·us that not we-inquired·him as· the ·custom 
15:14 and·they-are-sanctifying- them selves the·priests and·the·Levites to·to- c bring -up-of » coffer-of Yahweh Elohim-of Israel 
15:15 and·they-are-carrying sons-of the·Levites » coffer-of the·Elohim as·which he- m instructed Moses as·word-of Yahweh in·shoulder-of·them in· the ·slider- bar s on·them 
15:16 and·he-is-saying David to·chiefs-of the·Levites to·to- c install-of » brothers-of·them the·ones- m singing in·instruments-of song zithers and·harps and·cymbals ones- c mak ing-heard to·to- c raise -high-of in·voice to·rejoicing 
15:17 and·they-are- c installing the·Levites » Heman son-of Joel and·from brothers-of·him Asaph son-of Berechiah and·from sons-of Merari brothers-of·them Ethan son-of Kushaiah 
15:18 and·with·them brothers-of·them the·ones-second Zechariah Ben and·Jaaziel and·Shemiramoth and·Jehiel and·Unni Eliab and·Benaiah and·Maaseiah and·Mattithia and·Eliphelehu and·Mikneiah and·Obed~Edom and·Jeiel the·gate keeper s 
15:19 and·the·ones- m singing Heman Asaph and·Ethan in·cymbals copper to·to- c make -heard

15:22 and·Kenaniah chief-of the·Levites in·load to-admonish in· the ·load that c us ing-intelligence he 
15:23 and·Berechiah and·Elkanah gate keeper s for· the ·coffer

15:25 and·he-is-becoming David and·old-ones-of Israel and·chiefs-of the·thousands the·ones-going to·to- c bring -up-of » coffer-of covenant-of Yahweh from house-of Obed-Edom in·rejoicing 
15:26 and·he-is-becoming in·to-help-of the·Elohim » the·Levites ones-carrying-of coffer-of covenant-of Yahweh and·they-are-sacrificing seven young-bulls and·seven rams 
15:27 and·David being- c garbed in·robe-of fine-linen and·all-of the·Levites the·ones-carrying » the·coffer and·the·ones- m singing and·Kenaniah the·chief-of the·load the·ones- m singing and·on David ephod-of linen

1Chronicles 16
