1Chronicles 17
17:1 and·he-is-becoming as·which he-sits David in·house-of·him and·he-is-saying David to Nathan the·prophet behold ! I dwelling in·house-of the·cedars and·coffer-of covenant-of Yahweh beneath sheets 
17:2 and·he-is-saying Nathan to David all which in·heart-of·you do-you ! that the·Elohim with·you 
17:3 and·he-is-becoming in· the ·night the·he and·he-is-becoming word-of Elohim to Nathan to·to-say-of 
17:4 go-you ! and·you-say to David servant-of·me thus he-says Yahweh not you you-shall-build for·me the·house to·to-dwell-of 
17:5 that not I-dwelt in·house from the·day which I- c brought -up » Israel until the·day the·this and·I-am-becoming from·tent to tent and·from·tabernacle 
17:6 in·all which I- s walked in·all-of Israel ?·word I- m spoke with one-of ones-judging-of Israel whom I- m instructed to·to-shepherd-of » people-of·me to·to-say-of to·what ? not you (p) -built for·me house-of cedars 
17:7 and·now thus you-shall-say to·servant-of·me to·David thus he-says Yahweh-of hosts I I-took·you from the·homestead from after the·flock to·to-become-of governor over people-of·me Israel 
17:8 and·I-shall-be bc with·you in·all which you-go and·I-shall-cut- off » all-of ones- be ing-enemies-of·you from·faces-of·you and·I-make do for·you name as·name-of the·great-ones who in· the ·earth 
17:9 and·I-place place ri for·people-of·me Israel and·I-plant·him and·he-tabernacles under·him and·not he-shall- be -disturb ed further and·not they-shall- c add sons-of iniquity to·to- m wear-out-of·him as·which in· the ·first 
17:10 and·to·from·days which I- m instructed ones-judging over people-of·me Israel and·I- c make -submissive » all-of ones- be ing-enemies-of·you and·I-am- c telling to·you and·house he-shall-build for·you Yahweh 
17:11 and·he-becomes that they-are-full days-of·you to·to-go-of with fathers-of·you and·I- c raise- up » seed-of·you after·you who he-shall-become from·sons-of·you and·I- c establish » kingdom-of·him 
17:12 he he-shall-build for·me house and·I- m establish » throne-of·him unto eon 
17:13 I I-shall-become for·him to·father and·he he-shall-become for·me to·son and·kindness-of·me not I-shall- c withdraw from·with·him as·which I- c withdrew from·whom he-was bc to·faces-of·you 
17:14 and·I- c install·him in·house-of·me and·in·kingdom-of·me unto the·eon and·throne-of·him he-shall-become being-established unto eon 
17:15 as·all-of the·words the·these and·as·all-of the·vision the·this so he- m spoke Nathan to David 
17:16 and·he-is-coming the·king David and·he-is-sitting to·faces-of Yahweh and·he-is-saying who ? I Yahweh Elohim and·who ? house-of·me that you- c brought·me as-far-as hither 
17:17 and·she-is- be ing-small this in·eyes-of·you Elohim and·you-are- m speaking on house-of servant-of·you for·from·afar and·you-see·me as·exploring-of the·human the·ascent Yahweh Elohim 
17:18 what ? he-shall- c add further David to·you for·glory » servant-of·you and·you » servant-of·you you-know 
17:19 Yahweh in·sake servant-of·you and·as·heart-of·you you-did » all-of the·greatness the·this to·to- c make -know n -of » all-of the·greatnesses 
17:20 Yahweh there -is-no like·you and· there -is-no Elohim except·you in·all whom we-heard in·ears-of·us 
17:21 and·who ? as·people-of·you Israel nation one in· the ·earth which he-went the·Elohim to·to-ransom-of for·him people to·to-place-of for·you name greatnesses and· deed s-being-feared to·to- m drive-out-of from·faces-of people-of·you which you-ransomed from·Egypt nations 
17:22 and·you-are-giving » people-of·you Israel for·you to·people unto eon and·you Yahweh you-became to·them to·Elohim 
17:23 and·now Yahweh the·word which you- m spoke on servant-of·you and·on house-of·him he-shall-be- n faithful unto eon and·do-you ! as·which you- m spoke 
17:24 and·he-shall-be- n faithful and·he-shall-be-great name-of·you unto eon to·to-say-of Yahweh-of hosts Elohim-of Israel Elohim to·Israel and·house-of David servant-of·you being-established to·faces-of·you 
17:25 that you Elohim-of·me you-revealed » ear-of servant-of·you to·to-build-of for·him house on·so he-found servant-of·you to·to- s pray-of to·faces-of·you 
17:26 and·now Yahweh you he the·Elohim and·you-are- m speaking on servant-of·you the·goodness the·this

1Chronicles 18
18:1 and·he-is-becoming after so and·he-is- c smiting David » Philistines and·he-is- c mak ing-submissive·them and·he-is-taking » Gath and·outskirts-of·her from·hand-of Philistines 
18:2 and·he-is- c smiting » Moab and·they-are-becoming Moab servants to·David ones-carrying-of present 
18:3 and·he-is- c smiting David » Hadadezer king-of Zobah Hamath·ward in·to-go-of·him to·to- c station-of hand-of·him in·stream-of Euphrates 
18:4 and·he-is-seizing David from·him thousand-of chariot and·seven-of thousands horsemen and·twenty thousand-of man footman and·he-is- m hamstringing David » all-of the·chariot- horse and·he-is- c reserving from·him hundred chariot 
18:5 and·he-is-coming Aram-of~Damascus to·to-help-of to·Hadadezer king-of Zobah and·he-is- c smiting David in·Aram twenty and·two thousand man 
18:6 and·he-is-placing David in·Aram-of~Damascus and·he-is-becoming Aram to·David servants ones-carrying-of present and·he-is- c saving Yahweh to·David in·all which he-went 
18:7 and·he-is-taking David » cuirasses-of the·gold which they-were bc on servants-of Hadadezer and·he-is- c bringing·them Jerusalem 
18:8 and·from·Tibhath and·from·Cun cities-of Hadadezer he-took David copper much very in·her he-made do Solomon » sea-of the·copper and·» the·columns and·» furnishings-of the·copper 
18:9 and·he-is-hearing Tou king-of Hamath that he- c smote David » all-of army-of Hadadezer king-of Zobah 
18:10 and·he-is-sending » Hadoram son-of·him to the·king David to·to-ask-of to·to-ask-of to·him to·well-being and·to·to- m bless-of·him on which he- n fought in·Hadadezer and·he-is- c smiting·him that man-of wars-of Tou he-was bc Hadadezer and·all-of articles-of gold and·silver and·copper 
18:11 moreover »·them he- c sanctified the·king David to·Yahweh with the·silver and·the·gold which he-carried -off from·all-of the·nations from·Edom and·from·Moab and·from·sons-of Ammon and·from·Philistines and·from·Amalek 
18:12 and·Abishai son-of Zeruiah he- c smote » Edom in·Ravine-of~the·Salt eight ten thousand 
18:13 and·he-is-placing in·Edom garrisons and·they-are-becoming all-of Edom servants to·David and·he-is- c saving Yahweh » David in·all which he-went 
18:14 and·he-is-reigning David over all-of Israel and·he-was bc doing judgment and·justice to·all-of people-of·him 
18:15 and·Joab son-of Zeruiah over the·host and·Jehoshaphat son-of Ahilud one- c recording

1Chronicles 19
19:1 and·he-is-becoming after so and·he-is-dying Nahash king-of sons-of Ammon and·he-is-reigning son-of·him instead-of·him 
19:2 and·he-is-saying David I-shall-do kindness with Hanun son-of Nahash that he-did father-of·him with·me kindness and·he-is-sending David messengers to·to- m console-of·him on father-of·him and·they-are-coming servants-of David to land-of sons-of Ammon to Hanun to·to- m console-of·him 
19:3 and·they-are-saying chiefs-of sons-of Ammon to·Hanun ?· m glorifying David » father-of·you in·eyes-of·you that he-sent to·you ones- m consoling ?·not in·order -to to·to-investigate-of and·to·to- over turn-of and·to·to- m spy-of the·land they-came servants-of·him to·you 
19:4 and·he-is-taking Hanun » servants-of David and·he-is- m shaving·them and·he-is-cutting » coats-of·them in· the ·middle unto the·buttocks and·he-is- m sending- away ·them

19:16 and·he-is-seeing Aram that they-were-stricken to·faces-of Israel and·they-are-sending messengers and·they-are- c bring ing-forth » Aram who from·across the·stream and·Shophach chief-of host-of Hadadezer to·faces-of·them 
19:17 and·he-is-being- c told to·David and·he-is-gathering » all-of Israel and·he-is-crossing the·Jordan and-he-is-coming to·them and·he-is-arraying to·them and·he-is-arraying David to·to-meet-of Aram battle and·they-are- n fighting with·him

19:19 and·they-are-seeing servants-of Hadadezer that they-were-stricken to·faces-of Israel and·they-are- c mak ing-peace with David and·they-are-serving·him and·not he- was -willing Aram to·to- c save-of » sons-of Ammon further 

1Chronicles 20

20:2 and·he-is-taking David » crown-of king-of·them from·on head-of·him and·he-is-finding·her weight-of talent-of gold and·in·her stone precious and·she-is-becoming on head-of David and·loot-of the·city he- c brought -forth to- c be -much very

1Chronicles 26
26:1 for·apportionments to·gate keeper s to· the ·Korahites Meshelemiah son-of Kore from sons-of Asaph

26:3 Elam the·fifth Jehohanan the·sixth Eliehoenai the·seventh

2Chronicles 2
2:1 and·he-is-saying Solomon to·to-build-of house for·name-of Yahweh and·house for·kingdom-of·him 
2:2 and·he-is-numbering Solomon seventy thousand man burden and·eighty thousand man hewing in· the ·mountain and·ones-making-oversee over·them three-of thousands and·six-of hundreds 
2:3 and·he-is-sending Solomon to Huram king-of Tyre to·to-say-of as·which you-did with David father-of·me and·you-are-sending to·him cedars to·to-build-of for·him house to·to-dwell-of in·him 
2:4 behold ! I building house for·name-of Yahweh Elohim-of·me to·to- c sanctify-of to·him to·to-cause- to -fume-of to·faces-of·him incense-of spices and·array-of continual and·ascent- offering s to· the ·morning and·to· the ·evening to· the ·sabbaths and·to· the ·new- moon s and·to·appointed- time s-of Yahweh Elohim-of·us for·eon this on Israel 
2:5 and·the·house which I building great that great Elohim-of·us from·all-of the·Elohim 
2:6 and·who ? he-is-retaining vigor to·to-build-of to·him house that the·heavens and·heavens-of the·heavens not they-are-containing·him and·who ? I which I-shall-build to·him house except only to·to-cause- to -fume-of to·faces-of·him 
2:7 and·now send-you ! to·me man wise to·to-make do -of in· the ·gold and·in· the ·silver and·in· the ·copper and·in· the ·iron and·in· the ·purple and·vermillion and·amethyst and·knowing to·to- m engrave-of engravings with the·wise- men who with·me in·Judah and·in·Jerusalem whom he- c prepared David father-of·me 
2:8 and·send-you ! to·me timbers-of cedars firs and·algum- wood s from·the·Lebanon that I I-know which servants-of·you ones-knowing to·to-cut-of timbers-of Lebanon and·behold ! servants-of·me with servants-of·you 
2:9 and·to·to- c prepare-of to·me timbers to· the ·abundance that the·house which I building great and·to- c be-marvelous 
2:10 and·behold ! to· the ·ones-chopping to·ones-cutting-of the·trees I-give wheats ones-smitten-of to·servants-of·you cors twenty thousand and·barleys cors twenty thousand and·wine baths twenty thousand and·oil baths twenty thousand 
2:11 and·he-is-saying Huram king-of Tyre in·writing and·he-is-sending to Solomon in·to-love-of Yahweh » people-of·him he-gave·you over·them king 
2:12 and·he-is-saying Huram being-blessed Yahweh Elohim-of Israel who he-made do » the·heavens and·» the·earth who he-gave to·David the·king son wise knowing-of intelligence and·understanding who he-shall-build house for·Yahweh and·house for·kingdom-of·him 
2:13 and·now I-send man wise knowing-of understanding to·Huram~Abi 
2:14 son-of woman from daughters-of Dan and·father-of·him man Tyrian knowing to·to-make do -of in· the ·gold and·in· the ·silver in· the ·copper in· the ·iron in· the ·stones and·in· the ·woods in· the ·purple in· the ·amethyst and·in· the ·fine-linen and·in· the ·vermillion and·to·to- m engrave-of any-of engraving and·to·to-devise-of any-of design which he-shall-be-given to·him with wise -men -of·you and·wise- men -of lord-of·me David father-of·you 
2:15 and·now the·wheats and·the·barleys the·oil and·the·wine which he-said lord-of·me he-shall-send to·servants-of·him 
2:16 and·we we-shall-cut trees from the·Lebanon as·all-of need-of·you and·we-shall- c bring·them to·you rafts on sea Joppa and·you you-shall- c bring -up »·them Jerusalem 
2:17 and·he-is-numbering Solomon all-of the·mortals the·sojourners who in·land-of Israel after the·numbering which he-numbered·them David father-of·him and·they-are-being-found hundred and·fifty thousand and·three-of thousands and·six-of hundreds 
2:18 and·he-is-doing from·them seventy thousand burden and·eighty thousand hewing in· the ·mountain and·three-of thousands and·six-of hundreds ones-making-oversee to·to- c make- serve-of » the·people 

2Chronicles 3
3:1 and·he-is- c starting Solomon to·to-build-of » house-of Yahweh in·Jerusalem in·mountain-of the·Moriah which he- n appeared to·David father-of·him which he- c prepared in·place ri -of David in·threshing-site-of Ornan the·Jebusite 
3:2 and·he-is- c starting to·to-build-of in· the ·month the·second in· the ·second in·year-of four to·reign-of·him 
3:3 and·these to-be- c laid -foundation-of Solomon to·to-build-of » house-of the·Elohim the·length cubits in· the ·measure the·former cubits sixty and·width cubits twenty 
3:4 and·the·vaulted- portico which on faces-of the·length on faces-of width-of the·house cubits twenty and·the·elevation hundred and·twenty and·he-is- m overlaying·him from·inside gold pure 
3:5 and·» the·house the·great he- m overspread wood-of firs and·he-is- m overspreading·him gold good and·he-is- c sett ing-up on·him palm- tree s and·braids 
3:6 and·he-is- m overlaying » the·house stone precious for·beauty and·the·gold gold-of Parvaim 
3:7 and·he-is- m overspreading » the·house the·rafters the·thresholds and·sidewalls-of·him and·doors-of·him gold and·he- m engraved cherubim on the·sidewalls 
3:8 and·he-is-making do » inside-of holiness-of the·holinesses length-of·him on faces-of width-of the·house cubits twenty and·width-of·him cubits twenty and·he-is- m overspreading·him gold good to·talents six-of hundreds 
3:9 and·weight for·nails to·shekels fifty gold and·the·upper- chamber s he- m overspread gold 
3:10 and·he-is-making do in·inside-of holiness-of the·holinesses cherubim two deed-of sculptures and·they-are- m overlaying »·them gold 
3:11 and·wings-of the·cherubim length-of·them cubits twenty wing-of the·one to·cubits five c touching to·sidewall-of the·house and·the·wing the·other cubits five c touching to·wing-of the·cherub the·other 
3:12 and·wing-of the·cherub the·one cubits five c touching to·sidewall-of the·house and·the·wing the·other cubits five clinging-one to·wing-of the·cherub the·other 
3:13 wings-of the·cherubim the·these ones-spreading -out cubits twenty and·they ones-standing on feet-of·them and·faces-of·them to· the ·inside 
3:14 and·he-is-making do » the·curtain amethyst and·purple and·vermillion and·fine-linen and·he-is- c sett ing-up on·him cherubim 
3:15 and·he-is-making do to·faces-of the·house columns two cubits thirty and·five length and·the·column-cap which on top-of·him cubits five 
3:16 and·he-is-making do braids in· the ·oracle and·he-is-giving on top-of the·columns and·he-is-making do pomegranates hundred and·he-is-giving in· the ·braids 
3:17 and·he-is- c setting-up » the·columns on faces-of the·temple one from·right and·one from·the·left and·he-is-calling name-of the·right the·right Jachin and·name-of the·left Boaz 

2Chronicles 4
4:1 and·he-is-making do altar-of copper twenty cubit length-of·him and·twenty cubit width-of·him and·ten cubits rise-of·him 
4:2 and·he-is-making do » the·sea being- c cast ten in· the ·cubit from·lip-of·him to lip-of·him round round-about and·five in· the ·cubit rise-of·him and· measuring- tape-of thirty in· the ·cubit he-is-surrounding »·him round-about 
4:3 and·likeness-of oxen beneath to·him round-about round-about ones-surrounding »·him ten in· the ·cubit ones- c encompassing » the·sea round-about two rows the·ox ones-being-cast in·casting-of·him 
4:4 standing on two ten ox three ones-facing north·ward and·three ones-facing sea·ward and·three ones-facing south·ward and·three ones-facing east·ward and·the·sea on·them from·to·up·ward and·all-of behinds-of·them inside·ward 
4:5 and·thickness-of·him handbreadth and·lip-of·him as·deed-of lip-of cup bud-of anemone c holding-fast baths three-of thousands he-is- c containing 
4:6 and·he-is-making do lavers ten and·he-is-giving five from·right and·five from·left to·to-wash-of in·them » deed-of the·ascent- offering they-are- c expelling in·them and·the·sea to·to-wash-of for· the ·priests in·him 
4:7 and·he-is-making do » lampstands-of the·gold ten as·custom-of·them and·he-is-giving in· the ·temple five from·right and·five from·left 
4:8 and·he-is-making do tables ten and·he-is- c leaving in· the ·temple five from·right and·five from·left and·he-is-making do sprinkling- bowl s-of gold hundred 
4:9 and·he-is-making do court-of the·priests and·the·ledge the·great and·doors for· the ·ledge and·doors-of·them he- m overlaid copper 
4:10 and·» the·sea he-gave from·flank-of the·right east·ward from· be fore south·ward 
4:11 and·he-is-making do Huram » the·pots and·» the·shovels and·» the·sprinkling- bowl s and·he-is- m finishing Huram Huram to·to-do-of » the·work which he-did for· the ·king Solomon in·house-of the·Elohim 
4:12 columns two and·the·globes and·the·capitals on top-of the·columns two and·the·meshings two to·to- m cover-of » two-of globes-of the·capitals which on top-of the·columns 
4:13 and·» the·pomegranates four-of hundreds for·two-of the·meshings two rows pomegranates for· the ·meshing the·one to·to- m cover-of » two-of globes-of the·capitals which on faces-of the·columns 
4:14 and·» the·bases he-made do and·» the·lavers he-made do on the·bases 
4:15 » the·sea one and·» the·ox two ten beneath·him 
4:16 and·» the·pots and·» the·shovels and·» the·fleshhooks and·» all-of utensils-of·them he-made do Huram~Abi for· the ·king Solomon for·house-of Yahweh copper being-scoured 
4:17 in·basin-of the·Jordan he-cast·them the·king in·thick- mud -of the·ground between Succoth and·between Zeredatha 
4:18 and·he-is-making do Solomon all-of the·utensils the·these to· the ·abundance very that not he-was-investigated weight-of the·copper 
4:19 and·he-is-making do Solomon » all-of the·utensils which house-of the·Elohim and·» altar-of the·gold and·» the·tables and·on·them bread-of the·presences 
4:20 and·» the·lampstands and·lamps-of·them to·to- m consume-of·them as· the ·custom to·faces-of the·oracle gold being-plated 
4:21 and·the·bud and·the·lamps and·the·snuffers gold he solid (p) -of gold 
4:22 and·the·snippers and·the·sprinkling- bowl s and·the·spoons and·the·firepans gold being-plated and·portal-of the·house doors-of·him the·inner-ones to·holiness-of the·holinesses and· double- doors-of the·house to· the ·temple gold 

2Chronicles 5
5:1 and·she-is- be ing-accomplish ed all-of the·work which he-did Solomon for·house-of Yahweh and·he-is- c bring ing-in Solomon » holinesses-of David father-of·him and·» the·silver and·» the·gold and·» all-of the·utensils he-gave in·treasuries-of house-of the·Elohim 
5:2 then he-is- c assembling Solomon » old-ones-of Israel and·» all-of heads-of the·stocks princes-of the·fathers to·sons-of Israel to Jerusalem to·to- c bring -up-of » coffer-of covenant-of Yahweh from·city-of David she Zion 
5:3 and·they-are-being-assembled to the·king all-of man-of Israel in· the ·celebration he the·month the·seventh 
5:4 and·they-are-coming all-of old-ones-of Israel and·they-are-carrying the·Levites » the·coffer 
5:5 and·they-are- c bring ing-up » the·coffer and·» tent-of appointment and·» all-of utensils-of the·holiness which in· the ·tent they- c brought -up »·them the·priests the·Levites 
5:6 and·the·king Solomon and·all-of congregation-of Israel the·ones-being-congregated on·him to·faces-of the·coffer ones-making-sacrifices flock and·herd which not they-are-being-numbered and·not they-are-being-counted from·multitude 
5:7 and·they-are- c bringing the·priests » coffer-of covenant-of Yahweh to place ri -of·him to oracle-of the·house to holiness-of the·holinesses to under wings-of the·cherubim 
5:8 and·they-were bc the·cherubim ones-spreading -out wings over place ri -of the·coffer and·they-are- m covering the·cherubim over the·coffer and·over poles-of·him from·to·up·ward 
5:9 and·they-are- c sticking-out the·poles and·they-are-being-seen heads-of the·poles from the·coffer on faces-of the·oracle and·not they-are-being-seen the·outside·ward and·he-is bc there unto the·day the·this 
5:10 there -is-no in· the ·coffer but two-of the·tablets which he-gave Moses in·Horeb which he-cut- a-covenant Yahweh with sons-of Israel in·to- come -forth-of·them from·Egypt 
5:11 and·he-is-becoming in·to- come -forth-of the·priests from the·sanctuary that all-of the·priests the·ones-being-found they-hallowed- them selves there -is-no to·to-keep-of to·appportionments 
5:12 and·the·Levites the·ones- m singing to·all-of·them to·Asaph to·Heman to·Jeduthun and·to·sons-of·them and·to·brothers-of·them ones-being- m clothed fine-linen in·cymbals and·in·zithers and·harps ones-standing east to· the ·altar and·with·them priests to·hundred and·twenty ones- c blow ing-bugles ones- c blow ing-bugles in· the ·bugles 
5:13 and·he-was bc as·one to·the·ones- m blow ing-bugles to·the·ones- m blow ing-bugles and·to· the ·ones- m singing to·to- c make -heard sound one to·to- m praise-of and·to·to- c acclaim-of to·Yahweh and·as·to- c raise-up-of voice in· the ·bugles and·in·cymbals and·in·instruments-of the·song and·in·to- m praise-of to·Yahweh that good that for·eon kindness-of·him and·the·house he- was -filled cloud house-of Yahweh 
5:14 and·not they- were -able the·priests to·to-stay-of to·to- m minister-of from·faces-of the·cloud that he-filled glory-of Yahweh » house-of the·Elohim 

2Chronicles 6
6:1 then he-said Solomon Yahweh he-said to·to-tabernacle-of in· the ·murkiness 
6:2 and·I I-built house-of residence for·you and·site to·to-dwell-of·you eons 
6:3 and·he-is- c turn ing-around the·king » faces-of·him and·he-is- m blessing » all-of assembly-of Israel and·all-of assembly-of Israel standing 
6:4 and·he-is-saying being-blessed Yahweh Elohim-of Israel who he- m spoke in·mouth-of·him with David father-of·me and·in·hands-of·him he- m fulfilled to·to-say-of 
6:5 from the·day which I- c brought -forth » people-of·me from·land-of Egypt not I-chose in·city from·all-of tribes-of Israel to·to-build-of house to·to-be bc -of name-of·me there and·not I-chose in·man to·to-become-of governor over people-of·me Israel 
6:6 and·I-am-choosing in·Jerusalem to·to-be bc -of name-of·me there and·I-am-choosing in·David to·to-be bc -of over people-of·me Israel 
6:7 and·he-is-becoming with heart-of David father-of·me to·to-build-of house for·name-of Yahweh Elohim-of Israel 
6:8 and·he-is-saying Yahweh to David father-of·me inasmuch which he-was bc with heart-of·you to·to-build-of house for·name-of·me you- c did -good that he-became with heart-of·you 
6:9 but you not you-shall-build the·house that son-of·you the·one- com ing-forth from·loins-of·you he he-shall-build the·house for·name-of·me 
6:10 and·he-is- c carrying-out Yahweh » word-of·him which he- m spoke and·I-am-rising instead-of David father-of·me and·I-am-sitting on throne-of Israel as·which he- m spoke Yahweh and·I-am-building the·house for·name-of Yahweh Elohim-of Israel 
6:11 and·I-am-placing there » the·coffer which there covenant-of Yahweh which he-cut with sons-of Israel 
6:12 and·he-is-standing to·faces-of altar-of Yahweh in- front-of all-of assembly-of Israel and·he-is-spreading palms-of·him 
6:13 that he-made do Solomon platform-of copper and·he-is-giving·him in·midst-of the·ledge five cubits length-of·him and·five cubits width-of·him and·cubits three rise-of·him and·he-is-standing on·him and·he-is-kneeling on knees-of·him in- front-of all-of assembly-of Israel and·he-is-spreading palms-of·him the·heavens·ward 
6:14 and·he-is-saying Yahweh Elohim-of Israel there -is-no like·you Elohim in· the ·heavens and·in· the ·earth keeping the·covenant and·the·kindness to·servants-of·you the·ones-going to·faces-of·you in·all-of heart-of·them 
6:15 who you-kept to·servant-of·you David father-of·me » which you- m spoke to·him and·you-are- m speaking in·mouth-of·you and·in·hand-of·you you- m fulfilled as· the ·day the·this 
6:16 and·now Yahweh Elohim-of Israel keep-you ! to·servant-of·you David father-of·me » which you- m spoke to·him to·to-say-of not he-shall-be-cut- off to·you man from·to·faces-of·me sitting on throne-of Israel but if they-are-keeping sons-of·you » way-of·them to·to-go-of in·law-of·me as·which you-went to·faces-of·me 
6:17 and·now Yahweh Elohim-of Israel he-shall- n come -true word-of·you which you- m spoke to·servant-of·you to·David 
6:18 that ?·truly he-shall-dwell Elohim with the·human on the·earth behold ! heavens and·heavens-of the·heavens not they-are- m containing·you indeed that the·house the·this which I-built 
6:19 and·you-face- about to prayer-of servant-of·you and·to supplication-of·him Yahweh Elohim-of·me to·to-listen-of to the·jubilation and·to the·prayer which servant-of·you s praying to·faces-of·you 
6:20 to·to-be bc -of eyes-of·you ones-being- n open to the·house the·this by-day and·night to the·place ri which you-said to·to-place-of name-of·you there to·to-listen-of to the·prayer which he-is- s praying servant-of·you to the·place ri the·this 
6:21 and·you-listen to supplications-of servant-of·you and·people-of·you Israel which they-are- s praying to the·place ri the·this and·you you-are-hearing from·place ri -of to-dwell-of·you from the·heavens and·you-listen and·you-pardon 
6:22 if he-is-sinning man to·associate-of·him and·he-lifts- up in·him imprecation to·to- c imprecate-of·him and·he-comes imprecation to·faces-of altar-of·you in· the ·house the·this 
6:23 and·you you-are-hearing from the·heavens and·you-do and·you-judge » servants-of·you to·to- c recompense-of to·wicked-one to·to-give-of way-of·him in·head-of·him and·to·to- c justify-of righteous-one to·to-give-of to·him as·righteousness-of·him 
6:24 and·if he-is-being-struck people-of·you Israel to·faces-of one- be ing-enemy that they-are-sinning to·you and·they-return and·they- c acclaim » name-of·you and·they- s pray and·they- s supplicate to·faces-of·you in· the ·house the·this 
6:25 and·you you-are-hearing from the·heavens and·you-pardon to·sin-of people-of·you Israel and·you- c restore·them to the·ground which you-gave to·them and·to·fathers-of·them 
6:26 in·to-be-restrained-of the·heavens and·not he-is bc rain that they-are-sinning to·you and·they- s pray to the·place ri the·this and·they- c acclaim » name-of·you from·sin-of·them they-are-turning-back that you-are- c mak ing-humble·them 
6:27 and·you you-are-hearing the·heavens and·you-pardon to·sin-of servants-of·you and·people-of·you Israel that you-are- c directing·them to the·way the·good which they-shall-go in·her and·you-give rain on land-of·you which you-gave to·people-of·you to·allotment 
6:28 famine that he-is-becoming in· the ·land plague that he-is-becoming blast and·mildew locust and·beetle that he-is-becoming that he-is- c distressing to·him ones- be ing-enemies-of·him in·land-of gates-of·him any-of contagion and·any-of illness 
6:29 any-of prayer any-of supplication which he-is-becoming to·any-of the·human and·to·all-of people-of·you Israel who they-are-knowing man contagion-of·him and·pain-of·him and·he-spreads- out palms-of·him to the·house the·this 
6:30 and·you you-are-hearing from the·heavens site-of to-dwell-of·you and·you-pardon and·you-give to· the ·man as·all-of ways-of·him which you-are-knowing » heart-of·him that you to·alone-of·you you-know » heart-of sons-of the·human 
6:31 so-that they-shall-fear·you to·to-go-of in·ways-of·you all-of the·days which they ones-alive on sur faces-of the·ground which you-gave to·fathers-of·us 
6:32 and·moreover to the·foreign-one who not from·people-of·you Israel he and·he-comes from·land afar on-account-of name-of·you the·great and·hand-of·you the·steadfast and·arm-of·you the·one-being-stretched-out and·they-come and·they- s pray to the·house the·this 
6:33 and·you you-are-hearing from the·heavens from·site-of to-dwell-of·you and·you-do as·all which he-is-calling to·you the·foreign-one so-that they-shall-know all-of peoples-of the·earth » name-of·you and·to·to-fear-of »·you as·people-of·you Israel and·to·to-know-of that name-of·you he-is-called over the·house the·this which I-built 
6:34 that he-is- go ing-forth people-of·you to· the ·battle on ones- be ing-enemies-of·him in· the ·way which you-are-sending·them and·they- s pray to·you way-of the·city the·this which you-chose in·her and·the·house which I-built for·name-of·you 
6:35 and·you-hear from the·heavens » prayer-of·them and·» supplication-of·them and·you-do judgment-of·them 
6:36 that they-are-sinning to·you that there -is-no human who not he-is-sinning and·you-are-angry in·them and·you-give·them to·faces-of one- be ing-enemy and·they-capture·them ones-capturing-of·them to land afar or near 
6:37 and·they- c turn-back to heart-of·them in· the ·land which they-are- n held -captive there and·they-return and·they- s supplicate to·you in·land-of captivity-of·them to·to-say-of we-sinned we- c did -depravity and·we-are-wicked 
6:38 and·they-return to·you in·all-of heart-of·them and·in·all-of soul-of·them in·land-of captivity-of·them which they- took -captive »·them and·they- s pray way-of land-of·them which you-gave to·fathers-of·them and·the·city which you-chose and·to· the ·house which I-built for·name-of·you 
6:39 and·you-hear from the·heavens from·site-of to-dwell-of·you » prayer-of·them and·» supplications-of·them and·you-do judgment-of·them and·you-pardon to·people-of·you who they-sinned to·you 
6:40 now Elohim-of·me they-shall-be bc please ! eyes-of·you ones-being- n open and·ears-of·you attentive-ones to·prayer-of the·place ri the·this 
6:41 and·now rise-you ! Yahweh Elohim to·rest ing-place -of·you you and·coffer-of strength-of·you priests-of·you Yahweh Elohim they-shall- be- clothe d salvation and·kindly-ones-of·you they-shall-rejoice in· the ·goodness 
6:42 Yahweh Elohim must-not -be you-are- c turning-back faces-of anointed-ones-of·you remember-you ! to·kindnesses-of David servant-of·you 

2Chronicles 7
7:1 and·as·to- m finish-of Solomon to·to- s pray-of and·the·fire she-descended from·the·heavens and·she-is-devouring the·ascent- offering and·the·sacrifices and·glory-of Yahweh he-filled » the·house 
7:2 and·not they- were -able the·priests to·to-enter-of to house-of Yahweh that he-filled glory-of Yahweh » house-of Yahweh 
7:3 and·all-of sons-of Israel ones-seeing in·to-descend-of the·fire and·glory-of Yahweh on the·house and·they-are-bowing nostrils earth·ward on the·pavement and·they-are- s worshiping and·to- c acclaim-of to·Yahweh that good that for·eon kindness-of·him 
7:4 and·the·king and·all-of the·people ones-sacrificing sacrifice to·faces-of Yahweh

2Chronicles 19

2Chronicles 28

2Chronicles 32
32:1 after the·things and·the·faithfulness the·these he-came Sennacherib king-of Assyria and·he-is-invading in·Judah and·he-is-encamping on the·cities the·fortressed-ones and·he-is-saying to·to-rend-of·them for·him

2Chronicles 34

Nehemiah 2
2:1 and·he-is-becoming in·month-of Nisan year-of twenty to·Artaxerxes the·king wine to·faces-of·him and·I-am-taking-up » the·wine and·I-am-giving to· the ·king and·not I-was bc bad to·faces-of·him 
2:2 and·he-is-saying to·me the·king for -what-reason faces-of·you bad-ones and·you there -is-no·you being-ill there -is-no this except only badness-of heart and·I-am-fearing to- c be -much very 
2:3 and·I-am-saying to· the ·king the·king for·eon he-shall-live for -what-reason not they-shall-be-bad faces-of·me which the·city house-of tombs-of fathers-of·me deserted and·gates-of·her they- were -devoured in· the ·fire

Nehemiah 7
7:1 and·he-is-becoming as·which she-was-built the·wall and·I-am- c installing the·doors and·they-are-being-mustered the·gate keeper s and·the·ones- m singing and·the·Levites

Esther 1
1:1 and·he-is-becoming in·days-of Ahasuerus he Ahasuerus the·one-reigning from·India and·unto Cush seven and·twenty and·hundred province 
1:2 in· the ·days the·they as·to-sit-of the·king Ahasuerus on throne-of kingdom-of·him which in·Susa the·castle

Esther 2
2:1 after the·things the·these as·to-subside-of fury-of the·king Ahasuerus he-remembered » Vashti and·» which she-did and·» which he-was-severed on·her 
2:2 and·they-are-saying lads-of the·king ones- m ministering-of·him they-shall- m seek for· the ·king maidens virgins good-ones-of appearance

Esther 3
3:1 after the·things the·these he- m magnified the·king Ahasuerus » Haman son-of Hammedatha the·Agagite and·he-is- m elevating·him and·he-is-placing » covered- seat -of·him from·on all-of the·chiefs who with ·him

Esther 4

Esther 5

Job 1
1:1 man he-was bc in·land-of Uz Job name-of·him and·he-was bc the·man the·he flawless and·upright and·fearing-of Elohim and·withdrawing from·evil 
1:2 and·they-are-being-born to·him seven sons and·three daughters

1:4 and·they-go sons-of·him and·they-make do feast house-of man day-of·him and·they-send and·they-call to·three-of sisters-of·them sisters-of·them to·to-eat-of and·to·to-drink-of with·them

1:19 and·behold ! wind great she-came from·across-of the·wilderness and·he-is-touching in·four-of corners-of the·house and·he-is-falling on the·youths and·they-are-dying and·I-am- n escaping but I to·alone-of·me to·to- c tell-of to·you

2:1 and·he-is-becoming the·day and·they-are-coming sons-of the·Elohim to·to-station- them selves-of on Yahweh and·he-is-coming moreover the·adversary in·midst-of·them to·to-station- him self-of on Yahweh

Job 3
3:1 after so he-opened Job » mouth-of·him and·he-is- m slighting » day-of·him 
3:2 and·he-is-responding Job and·he-is-saying 
3:3 he-shall-perish day I-was-being-born in·him and·the·night he-said he-is- m engendered master 
3:4 the·day the·he he-shall-become darkness must-not -be he-is-inquiring·him Eloah from·above and·must-not -be she-is- c shining on·him lightbeam 
3:5 they-shall-redeem·him darkness and·shadow-of-death she-shall-tabernacle over·him cloud they-shall- m frighten·him fervidnesses-of day 
3:6 the·night the·he he-shall-take·him gloom must-not -be he-is-being-one in·days-of year in·number-of months must-not -be he-is-entering 
3:7 behold ! the·night the·he he-shall-become stark must-not -be she-is-coming jubilation in·him 
3:8 they-shall-blaspheme·him ones-cursing-of day the·equipped-ones to- m rouse-of dragon 
3:9 they-shall- be -darken ed stars-of gloaming-of·him he-shall- m expect to·light and· there -is-no and·must-not -be he-is-seeing in·eyelids-of dawn 
3:10 that not he-closed doors-of belly-of·me and·he-is- c concealing toil from·eyes-of·me 
3:11 to·what ? not from·womb I-am-dying from·belly I- come -forth and·I-am-expiring 
3:12 for -what-reason they- m anticipate·me knees and·what ? breasts that I-am-sucking 
3:13 that now I-lie- down and·I-am-being-quiet and·I-sleep then he-is-being-rest to·me 
3:14 with kings and·ones-counseling-of earth the·ones-building deserted- tomb s for·them 
3:15 or with chiefs gold to·them the·ones- m filling houses-of·them silver 
3:16 or as·abortion being-buried not I-was bc as·unweaned- children not they-saw light 
3:17 there wicked-ones they-leave-off disturbance and·there they-are-resting wearied-ones-of vigor 
3:18 together prisoners they-are-tranquil not they-hear voice-of one-exacting 
3:19 small-one and·great-one there he and·servant free from·lords-of·him 
3:20 to·what ? he-is-giving to·toiler light and·lives to·bitter-ones-of soul

3:22 the·rejoicing-ones to exultation they-are-being-elated that they-are-finding tomb 
3:23 to·master who way-of·him she-is-concealed and·he-is- c screening Eloah about·him

Job 4

4:8 as·which I-saw ones-plowing-of lawlessness and·ones-sowing-of toil they-are-reaping·him

Job 5
5:1 call-you ! please ! ?· there- is one-answering-of·you and·to whom ? from·holy-ones you-shall-face 
5:2 that to·fool he-shall-kill vexation and·the·one-enticing she-shall- c put-to -death jealousy 
5:3 I I-saw fool c tak ing-root and·I-am-blaspheming homestead-of·him suddenly 
5:4 they-are-being-far sons-of·him from·safety and·they-are- s be ing-crush ed in· the ·gate and· there -is-no one- c rescuing 
5:5 who harvest-of·him hungry-one he-is-eating and·to from·pricking- thorn s he-is-taking·him and·he-gasps one-famished estate-of·them 
5:6 that not he-is- com ing-forth from·soil lawlessness and·from·ground not he-is-sprouting toil 
5:7 that human to·toil he-is-born and·sons-of sirocco they-are- c go ing-aloft to-fly-of 
5:8 nevertheless I I-am-inquiring to El and·to Elohim I-am-placing matter-of·me 
5:9 one-doing great- thing s and· there -is-no investigation thing s-being- n marvelous unto there -is-no numbering 
5:10 the·one-giving rain on sur faces-of earth and·sending waters on sur faces-of outsides 
5:11 to·to-place-of lowly-ones to·height and·the·ones-being-somber they-are-impregnable safety 
5:12 anulling devisings-of crafty-ones and·not they-are-making do hands-of·them reality 
5:13 seizing wise-ones in·craftiness-of·them and·counsel-of ones-being-twisted she-is-hastened

5:15 and·he-is- c saving from·sword from·mouth-of·them and·from·hand-of unyielding-one needy-one

28:24 one-pillaging father-of·him and·mother-of·him and·one·saying there -is-no transgression partner he to·man one- c be ing-corrupt 
28:25 to-be-inflated-of soul he-is- m stirring- up quarrel and·one-trusting on Yahweh he-shall- m be -sleek 
28:26 one-trusting in·heart-of·him he one-stupid and·one-going in·wisdom he he-shall- m escape 
28:27 one-giving to· the ·one-being-destitute there -is-no lack and·one- c obscuring eyes-of·him many-of curses 
28:28 in·to-rise-of wicked-ones he-shall-be-concealed human and·in·to-perish-of·them they-shall-increase righteous-ones

1:8 all-of the·words wearisome-ones not he-is- be ing-able man to·to- m speak-of not she-is- be ing-satisfi ed eye to·to-see-of and·not she-is-being-filled ear from·to-hear-of

1:11 there -is-no remembrance to· the ·former-ones and·moreover to· the ·after-ones who·they-shall-become not he-shall-become to·them remembrance with who·they-shall-become to· the ·after ward 
1:12 I assembler I-became king over Israel in·Jerusalem

Ecclesiastes 4

Ecclesiastes 5

Song of Solomon 1
1:1 song-of the·songs which to·Solomon 
1:2 he-shall-kiss·me from·kisses-of mouth-of·him that good-ones affections-of·you from·wine 
1:3 for·scent attars-of·you good-ones attar she-is-being- c emptied name-of·you on·so damsels they-love·you 
1:4 draw-you·me ! after·you we-shall-run he- c brings·me the·king chambers-of·him we-shall-exult and·we-shall-rejoice in·you we-shall- c commemorate affections-of·you from·wine upright-ones they-love·you 
1:5 dusky I and·comely daughters-of Jerusalem as·tents-of Kedar as·sheets-of Solomon 
1:6 must-not -be you (p) -are-staring- at ·me which·I dusky which·she-glanced-at·me the·sun sons-of mother-of·me they-were- n hot in·me they-placed·me one-being-custodian (f) » the·vineyards vineyard-of·me which·to·me not I- had -custody 
1:7 c tell-you ! to·me whom·she-loves soul-of·me where ? you-are-grazing where ? you-are- c reclining in· the ·noons which·to·what ? I-am-becoming as·one-being-muffled (f) on droves-of partners-of·you 
1:8 if not you-are-knowing for·you the·lovely-one in· the ·women go -forth-you ! for·you in·heels-of the·flock and·graze-you ! » kids-of·you on tabernacles-of the·ones- be ing-shepherds 
1:9 to·mare-of·me in·chariots-of Pharaoh I- m liken·you shepherdess-of·me 
1:10 they-are-comely cheeks-of·you in· the ·bead-rows neck-of·you in· the ·threaded-gems 
1:11 bead-rows-of gold we-shall-make do for·you with specks-of the·silver 
1:12 still which·the·king in·divan-of·him spikenard-of·me he-gave scent-of·him 
1:13 pouch-of the·myrrh darling-of·me to·me between breasts-of·me he-is-lodging 
1:14 cluster-of the·henna-blossom darling-of·me to·me in·vineyards-of En~Gedi 
1:15 behold·you ! lovely shepherdess-of·me behold·you ! lovely eyes-of·you doves 
1:16 behold·you ! lovely darling-of·me indeed pleasant indeed couch-of·us flourishing

Isaiah 1
1:1 vision-of Isaiah son-of Amoz which he-perceived on Judah and·Jerusalem in·days-of Uzziah Jotham Ahaz Hezekiah kings-of Judah 
1:2 hear-you (p)  ! heavens and· c give -ear-you ! earth that Yahweh he- m speaks sons I- m magnified and·I- m exalted and·they they-transgress in·me 
1:3 he-knows bull one-being-owner-of·him and·donkey crib-of possessors-of·him Israel not he-knows people-of·me not he- s considers 
1:4 woe ! nation one-sinning people heavy-of depravity seed-of ones- c do ing-evil sons ones- c bring ing-ruin they-forsake » Yahweh they- m spurn » holy-one-of Israel they-are-estranged back ward 
1:5 on what ? you (p) -shall-be- c smitten further you (p) -are- c adding stubbornness all-of head to·illness and·all-of heart languishing 
1:6 from·sole-of foot and·unto head there -is-no in·him flawlessness injury and·welt and·smiting raw not they-are-pressed-out and·not they-are- m bound-up and·not she-is-made-tender in· the ·oil 
1:7 land-of·you (p) desolation cities-of·you (p) ones-being-burned-of fire ground-of·you (p) to·front-of·you (p) alien-ones ones-devouring »·her and·desolation as· over turning-of alien-ones 
1:8 and·she-is-left daughter-of Zion as·booth in·vineyard as·lodge in·cucumber- patch as·city being-besieged 
1:9 unless Yahweh-of hosts he- c left to·us survivor as·few as·Sodom we-become to·Gomorrah we-are-likened 
1:10 hear-you (p)  ! word-of Yahweh captains-of Sodom c give -ear-you (p)  ! law-of Elohim-of·us people-of Gomorrah 
1:11 to·what ? to·me multitude-of sacrifices-of·you (p) he-is-saying Yahweh I-am-surfeited ascent- offering s-of rams and·fat-of fatlings and·blood-of young-bulls and·he-lambs and·he-goats not I-desire 
1:12 that you (p) -are-coming to·to- n appear-of faces-of·me who ? he- m sought this from·hand-of·you (p) to-tramp-of courts-of·me 
1:13 not you (p) -shall- c add to- c bring-of present-of futility incense abhorrence she to·me new -moon and·sabbath to-call-of meeting not I-am- be ing-able lawlessness and·restraint 
1:14 new- moon s-of·you (p) and·appointed- time s-of·you (p) she-hates soul-of·me they-become on·me to·encumbrance I-am-tired to-bear-of 
1:15 and·in·to- m spread-of·you (p) palms-of·you (p) I-shall- c obscure eyes-of·me from·you (p) even that you (p) -are- c increasing prayer there -is-no·me hearing hands-of·you (p) bloods they-are-full 
1:16 wash-you (p)  ! purge-yourselves ! c take-away-you (p)  ! evil-of actions-of·you (p) from· in- front-of eyes-of·me leave-off-you (p)  ! to- c do -evil-of 
1:17 learn-you (p)  ! to- c do -good inquire-you (p)  ! judgment make-happy-you (p)  ! soured judge-you (p)  ! orphan contend-you (p)  ! widow 
1:18 go-you (p)  ! please ! and·we-shall- n correct he-is-saying Yahweh if they-are-becoming sins-of·you (p) as· the ·double- dipped-scarlet s as· the ·snow they-shall- c be -white if they-are- c be ing-red as· the ·crimson as· the ·wool they-shall-become 
1:19 if you (p) -are-willing and·you (p) -listen good-of the·land you (p) -shall-eat 
1:20 and·if you (p) -are- m refusing and·you (p) - c rebel sword you (p) -shall-be-devoured that mouth-of Yahweh he- m spoke 
1:21 how ! she-became to·prostitute town being- n faithful full-of judgment righteousness he-is-lodging in·her and·now ones- m murdering 
1:22 silver-of·you he-became to·drosses grog-of·you being-adulterated in· the ·waters 
1:23 chiefs-of·you ones- be ing-stubborn and·partners-of thieves all-of·him loving bribe and·pursuing payments orphan not they-are-judging and·contention-of widow not he-is-coming to·them 
1:24 therefore averment-of the·lord Yahweh-of hosts sturdy-one-of Israel woe ! I-shall-be-comforted from·foes-of·me and·I-shall-be-avenged from·ones-being-enemies-of·me 
1:25 and·I-shall- c restore hand-of·me on·you and·I-shall-refine as· the ·purifier drosses-of·you and·I-shall- c take-away all-of tin- alloy s-of·you 
1:26 and·I-shall- c restore ones-judging-of·you as·in· the ·first and·ones-counseling-of·you as·in· the ·start after so he-shall-be-called to·you city-of the·righteousness town being- n faithful 
1:27 Zion in·judgment she-shall-be-ransomed and· be ing-restor ed -ones-of·her in·righteousness 
1:28 and·breaking-of ones-transgressing and·sinful-ones together and·ones-forsaking-of Yahweh they-shall- be -finish ed 
1:29 that they-shall- be - a shame d from·oaks which you (p) -coveted and·you (p) -shall-be-abashed from·the·gardens which you (p) -chose 
1:30 that you (p) -shall-become as·terebinth being-decayed-of leaf-of·her and·as·garden which waters there -is-no to·her 
1:31 and·he-becomes the·safeguarded to·tinder and·contrivance-of·him to·spark and·they-consume two-of·them together and· there -is-no one- m quenching 

Isaiah 2
2:1 the·word which he-perceived Isaiah son-of Amoz on Judah and·Jerusalem 
2:2 and·he-becomes in·last-of the·days being-established he-shall-be bc mountain-of house-of Yahweh in·summit-of the·mountains and·being-lifted- up from·hills and·they-stream to·him all-of the·nations 
2:3 and·they-go peoples many and·they-say go-you (p)  ! and·we-shall-ascend to mountain-of Yahweh to house-of Elohim-of Jacob and·he-shall- c direct·us from·ways-of·him and·we-shall-go in·paths-of·him that from·Zion she-shall- go -forth law and·word-of Yahweh from·Jerusalem 
2:4 and·he-judges between the·nations and·he- c corrects to·peoples many and·they- m pound swords-of·them to·mattocks and·spears-of·them to·pruners not he-shall-lift nation to nation sword and·not they-shall-learn further war 
2:5 house-of Jacob go-you (p)  ! and·we-shall-go in·light-of Yahweh 
2:6 that you-abandoned people-of·you house-of Jacob that they-are-full from·east and·ones- consult ing-clouds as· the ·Philistines and·in·children-of foreign-ones they-are- c slapping- hands

Isaiah 9

15:7 on·so surplus he-made do and·noted- thing -of·them over watercourse-of the·oleanders they-shall-bear·them

Isaiah 24
24:1 behold ! Yahweh mak ing-void the·land and·evacuating-of·her and·he- m contorts sur faces-of·her and·he- c scatters ones-dwelling-of·her

42:20 you-see to-see much and·not you-are-observing to-unclose ears and·not he-is-listening

42:22 and·he people being-plundered and·being-robbed to- c be -snare d in· the ·holes all-of·them and·in·houses-of detentions they-are- c hidden they-became to·plunder and· there -is-no one- c rescuing robbery and· there -is-no one-saying c restore-you !

Isaiah 48

48:9 on-account-of name-of·me I-shall-be-long- suffer ing anger-of·me and·praise-of·me I-shall-repress to·you to·so-as-not to-cut- off -of·you

48:11 on-account-of·me on-account-of·me I-shall-do that how ? he-shall-be-profaned and·glory-of·me to·another not I-shall-give

48:14 be-convened-you (p)  ! all-of·you (p) and·listen-you (p)  ! who ? in·them he- c told » these Yahweh he-loves·him he-shall-do desire-of·him in·Babylon and·arm-of·him Chaldeans 
48:15 I I I- m speak indeed I-call·him I- c bring·him and·he- c prospers way-of·him

55:3 c stretch-out-you (p)  ! ear-of·you (p) and·go-you (p)  ! to·me hear-you (p)  ! and·she-shall-live soul-of·you (p) and·I-shall-cut to·you (p) covenant-of eon kindnesses-of David the·ones-being- n faithful

Isaiah 62

62:6 over walls-of·you Jerusalem I- c give -supervision ones-guarding all-of the·day and·all-of the·night continually not they-shall-hush the·ones- c reminding » Yahweh must-not -be stillness for·you (p)

62:8 he- n swore Yahweh in·right- hand -of·him and·in·arm-of strength-of·him if I-shall-give » grain-of·you further food to·ones- be ing-enemies-of·you and·if they-shall-drink sons-of foreigner grape-juice-of·you which you-labored in·him 
62:9 that ones- m gathering-of·him they-shall-eat·him and·they- m praise » Yahweh and·ones- m gather ing-together-of·him they-shall-drink·him in·courts-of holiness-of·me

Jeremiah 1
1:1 words-of Jeremiah son-of Hilkiah from the·priests who in·Anathoth in·land-of Benjamin

Jeremiah 3

6:13 that from·small-one-of·them and·unto great-one-of·them all-of·him one-being-greedy-of gain and·from·prophet and·unto priest all-of·him one-doing falsehood 
6:14 and·they-are- m healing » breaking-of people-of·me on one-being-made-light-of to·to-say-of peace peace and· there -is-no peace

Jeremiah 11
11:1 the·word which he-became to Jeremiah from· with Yahweh to·to-say-of 
11:2 hear-you (p)  ! » words-of the·covenant the·this and·you- m speak·them to man-of Judah and·on ones-dwelling-of Jerusalem 
11:3 and·you-say to·them thus he-says Yahweh Elohim-of Israel being-cursed the·man who not he-is-listening » words-of the·covenant the·this 
11:4 which I- m instructed » fathers-of·you (p) in·day-of to- c bring -forth-of·me »·them from·land-of Egypt from·crucible-of the·iron to·to-say-of listen-you (p)  ! in·voice-of·me and·you (p) -do »·them as·all which I-shall- m instruct »·you (p) and·you (p) -become to·me for·people and·I I-shall-become to·you (p) for·Elohim 
11:5 so-that to- c carry-out-of » the·oath which I- n swore to·fathers-of·you (p) to·to-give-of to·them land gushing-of milk and·honey as· the ·day the·this and·I-am-answering and·I-am-saying amen Yahweh 
11:6 and·he-is-saying Yahweh to·me call-you ! » all-of the·words the·these in·cities-of Judah and·in·streets-of Jerusalem to·to-say-of hear-you (p)  ! » words-of the·covenant the·this and·you (p) -do »·them 
11:7 that to- c testify I- c testified in·fathers-of·you (p) in·day-of to- c bring -up·me »·them from·land-of Egypt and·until the·day the·this to- c rise - early and·to- c testify to·to-say-of listen-you (p)  ! in·voice-of·me 
11:8 and·not they-listened and·not they- c stretched-out » ear-of·them and·they-are-going man in·control-of heart-of·them the·evil and·I-am- c bringing on·them » all-of words-of the·covenant the·this which I- m instructed to·to-do-of and·not they-did 
11:9 and·he-is-saying Yahweh to·me he-is-found conspiracy in·man-of Judah and·in·ones-dwelling-of Jerusalem 
11:10 they-returned on depravities-of fathers-of·them the·first-ones who they- m refused to·to-listen-of » words-of·me and·they they-went after Elohim other-ones to·to-serve-of·them they- c annulled house-of Israel and·house-of Judah » covenant-of·me which I-cut with fathers-of·them 
11:11 therefore thus he-says Yahweh behold·me ! c bringing to·them evil which not they-shall-be-able to·to- go -forth-of from·her and·they-cry-out to·me and·not I-shall-listen to·them 
11:12 and·they-go cities-of Judah and·ones-dwelling-of Jerusalem and·they-cry-out to the·Elohim whom they ones- m fuming -incense to·them and·to- c save not they-shall- c save to·them in·era-of evil-of·them 
11:13 that number-of cities-of·you they-became Elohim-of·you Judah and·number-of streets-of Jerusalem you (p) -placed altars to·the·shame ful - thing altars to·to- m fume -incense -of to· the ·Baal 
11:14 and·you must-not -be you-are- s praying about the·people the·this and·must-not -be you-are-lifting- up about·them jubilation and·prayer that there -is-no·me listening in·time-of to-call-of·them to·me about evil-of·them 
11:15 what ? to·darling-of·me in·house-of·me to-do-of·her the·mischief the·many-ones and·flesh-of sanctuary they-are-passing from·on·you that evil-of·you then you-are-being-joyous 
11:16 olive -tree flourishing lovely-of fruit-of shape he-called Yahweh name-of·you to·sound-of declaration great he- c ravages fire on·her and·they- are- smash ed branches-of·him 
11:17 and·Yahweh-of hosts the·one-planting »·you he- m spoke on·you evil in·due-to evil-of house-of Israel and·house-of Judah which they-did for·them to·to- c provoke-to -vexation-of·me to·to- m fume -incense -of to· the ·Baal 
11:18 and·Yahweh he- c informed·me and·I-am-knowing then he- c showed·me actions-of·them 
11:19 and·I as·he-lamb domestic- animal he-is-being- c fetched to·to-slaughter-of and·not I-knew that on·me they-devised devisings we-shall- c ruin tree in·bread-of·him and·we-shall-cut -off ·him from·land-of living-ones and·name-of·him not he-shall-be-remembered further 
11:20 and·Yahweh-of hosts one-judging-of righteousness one-testing kidneys and·heart I-shall-see vengeance-of·you from·them that to·you I-revealed » contention-of·me 
11:21 therefore thus he-says Yahweh on mortals-of Anathoth the·ones- m seeking » soul-of·you to·to-say-of not you-shall- n prophesy in·name-of Yahweh and·not you-shall-die in·hand-of·us 
11:22 therefore thus he-says Yahweh-of hosts behold·me ! checking on·them the·choice -youth s they-shall-die in· the ·sword sons-of·them and·daughters-of·them they-shall-die in· the ·famine 
11:23 and·remnant not she-shall-become to·them that I-shall- c bring evil to mortals-of Anathoth year-of visitation-of·them 

Jeremiah 12
12:1 righteous you Yahweh that I-am-contending to·you yea judgments I-am- m speaking with ·you for -what-reason way-of wicked-ones she-prospers they- are-at- ease all-of ones- be ing-treacherous-of treachery 
12:2 you-planted·them moreover they- m take -root they-are-going moreover they-make fruit near you in·mouth-of·them and·far from·kidneys-of·them 
12:3 and·you Yahweh you-know·me you-are-seeing·me and·you-test heart-of·me with ·you c pull-away-you·them ! as·flock to·slaughter and· c hallow-you·them ! for·day-of killing 
12:4 until when ? she-shall-mourn the·land and·herbage-of every-of the·field he-shall-dry -up from·evil-of ones-dwelling-of in·her she- is- swept-off beasts and·flyer that they-say not he-shall-see » hereafter-of·us 
12:5 that with footmen you-ran and·they-are- c tiring·you and·how ? you-shall- s compete with the·horses and·in·land-of peace you trusting and·how ? you-shall-do in·swell-of the·Jordan 
12:6 that even brothers-of·you and·house-of father-of·you even they they- are -treacherous in·you even they they-call after·you fulsomely must-not -be you-are- c trusting in·them that they-are- m speaking to·you good- thing s 
12:7 I-forsook » house-of·me I-abandoned » allotment-of·me I-gave » darling-of soul-of·me in·palm-of ones-being-enemies-of·her 
12:8 she-became to·me allotment-of·me as·lion in· the ·wildwood she-gave on·me in·voice-of·her on·so I-hate·her 
12:9 ?·to- c pounce-of hyena allotment-of·me for·me ?·bird-of-prey round-about on·her go-you (p)  ! gather-you (p)  ! every-of animal-of the·field c arrive-you (p)  ! to·food 
12:10 ones- be ing-shepherds many-ones they- m ruined vineyard-of·me they- m trampled » portion-of·me they-gave » portion-of coveted-of·me to·wilderness-of desolation 
12:11 he-places·her to·desolation she-mourns on·me desolation she-is- n desolate all-of the·land that there -is-no man placing on heart 
12:12 on all-of ridges in· the ·wilderness they-came ones-devastating that sword to·Yahweh one-devouring from·end-of land and·unto end-of the·land there -is-no peace for·all-of flesh 
12:13 they-sowed wheats and·thorns they-reaped they- n travail not they-are- c benefitting and·be-ashamed-you (p)  ! from·incomes-of·you (p) from·heat-of anger-of Yahweh 
12:14 thus he-says Yahweh on all-of neighbors-of·me the·evil-ones the·ones-touching in· the ·allotment which I- c allotted » people-of·me » Israel behold·me ! plucking-up-of·them from·on ground-of·them and·» house-of Judah I-shall-pluck-up from·midst-of·them 
12:15 and·he-becomes after to-pluck-up-of·me »·them I-shall-return and·I- m have -compassion- on ·them and·I- c restore·them man to·allotment-of·him and·man to·land-of·him 
12:16 and·he-becomes if to-learn they-are-learning » ways-of people-of·me to·to- n swear-of in·name-of·me life-of Yahweh as·which they- m taught » people-of·me to·to- n swear-of in· the ·Baal and·they-are-built in·midst-of people-of·me 
12:17 and·if not they-are-listening and·I-pluck-up » the·nation the·he to-pluck-up and·to- m destroy averment-of Yahweh 

Jeremiah 13

13:2 and·I-am-buying » the·belt as·word-of Yahweh and·I-am-placing on waists-of·me 
13:3 and·he-is-becoming word-of Yahweh to·me second- time to·to-say-of

13:11 that as·which he-is-clinging the·belt to waists-of man so I-caused- to -cling to·me » all-of house-of Israel and·» all-of house-of Judah averment-of Yahweh to·to-become-of to·me for·people and·for·name and·for·praise and·for·beauty and·not they-listened

Jeremiah 14
14:1 which he-became word-of Yahweh to Jeremiah on matters-of the·dearths 
14:2 she-mourns Judah and·gates-of·her they-are- m feeble they-are-somber to· the ·land and·yelling-of Jerusalem she-ascends 
14:3 and·nobles-of·them they-send inferiors-of·them inferiors-of·them for· the ·waters they-come on pools not they-find waters they-return vessels-of·them empty they- are - a shame d and·they-are- c confounded and·they-hood head-of·them 
14:4 in·sake the·ground she-is-cracked that not he-became downpour in· the ·earth they- are - a shame d farmers they-hood head-of·them 
14:5 that even hind in· the ·field she- giv es-birth and·to-forsake that not he-became vegetation 
14:6 and·wild-donkeys they-stand on ridges they-snuff-up wind as· the ·jackals they- are -exhausted eyes-of·them that there -is-no herbage 
14:7 if depravities-of·us they-respond in·us Yahweh do-you ! on-account-of name-of·you that they- are -many backslidings-of·us to·you we-sinned 
14:8 expectation-of Israel one- c saving-of·him in·era-of distress to·what ? you-are-becoming as· the ·sojourner in· the ·land and·as·one-being-caravan- man he-turns-aside to·to-lodge-of 
14:9 to·what ? you-are-becoming as·man being-stupified as·masterful -man not he-is- be ing-able to·to- c save-of and·you in·within-of·us Yahweh and·name-of·you over·us he-is-called must-not -be you-are- c leaving·us 
14:10 thus he-says Yahweh to· the ·people the·this so they-loved to·to-rove-of feet-of·them not they-kept-back and·Yahweh not he-accepts·them now he-shall-remember depravity-of·them and·he-shall-check sins-of·them 
14:11 and·he-is-saying Yahweh to·me must-not -be you-are- s praying about the·people the·this for·good 
14:12 that they-are-fasting there -is-no·me listening to jubilation-of·them and·that they-are- c offer ing-up ascent- offering and·present- offering there -is-no·me accepting-of·them that in· the ·sword and·in· the ·famine and·in· the ·plague I m finishing »·them 
14:13 and·I-am-saying alas ! my-Lord Yahweh behold ! the·prophets ones-saying to·them not you (p) -shall-see sword and·famine not he-shall-become to·you (p) that peace-of truth I-shall-give to·you (p) in· the ·place ri the·this 
14:14 and·he-is-saying Yahweh to·me falsehood the·prophets ones- n prophesying in·name-of·me not I-sent·them and·not I- m instructed·them and·not I- m spoke to·them vision-of falsehood and·divination and·forbidden- idol and·forbidden -idol and·deceit-of and·deceit-of heart-of·them they ones- s prophesying to·you (p) 
14:15 therefore thus he-says Yahweh on the·prophets the·ones- n prophesying in·name-of·me and·I not I-sent·them and·they ones-saying sword and·famine not he-shall-become in· the ·land the·this in· the ·sword and·in· the ·famine they-shall-come-to-end the·prophets the·they 
14:16 and·the·people whom they ones- n prophesying to·them they-shall-become ones-being- c flung in·streets-of Jerusalem from·faces-of the·famine and·the·sword and· there -is-no one- m entombing to·them they women-of·them and·sons-of·them and·daughters-of·them and·I-pour-out on·them » evil-of·them 
14:17 and·you-say to·them » the·word the·this they-shall- run- down eyes-of·me tear night and·by-day and·must-not -be they-are- be ing-still ed that breaking great she-is-broken virgin-of daughter-of people-of·me smiting being- n ill very 
14:18 if I- go -forth the·field and·behold ! ones-wounded-of sword and·if I-come the·city and·behold ! ailments-of famine that moreover prophet moreover priest they- go-as -merchant to land and·not they-know 
14:19 ?·to-reject you-rejected » Judah or in·Zion she-loathes soul-of·you for -what-reason you- c smite·us and· there -is-no for·us healing to- m expect for·peace and· there -is-no good and·for·time-of healing and·behold ! fright 
14:20 we-acknowledge Yahweh wickedness-of·us depravity-of fathers-of·us that we-sinned to·you 
14:21 must-not -be you-are-spurning on-account-of name-of·you must-not -be you-are- m disgracing throne-of glory-of·you remember-you ! must-not -be you-are- c annulling covenant-of·you with ·us 
14:22 ?· there- is in·vanities-of the·nations ones- c bring ing-downpour and·or the·heavens they-shall-give showers ?·not you he Yahweh Elohim-of·us and·we-are- m expecting to·you that you you-do » all-of these 

Jeremiah 15
15:1 and·he-is-saying Yahweh to·me if he-is-standing Moses and·Samuel to·faces-of·me there -is-no soul-of·me to the·people the·this send- away -you ! from·on faces-of·me and·they-shall- go -forth 
15:2 and·he-becomes that they-shall-say to·you whither ? we-shall- go -forth and·you-say to·them thus he-says Yahweh who for· the ·death to· the ·death and·who for· the ·sword to· the ·sword and·who for· the ·famine to· the ·famine and·who for· the ·captivity to· the ·captvity 
15:3 and·I-visit on·them four families averment-of Yahweh » the·sword to·to-kill-of and·» the·dogs to·to-pull-in-pieces-of and·» flyer-of the·heavens and·» beast-of the·earth to·to-devour-of and·to·to- c ruin-of 
15:4 and·I-give·them to·commotion to·commotion to·all-of kingdoms-of the·earth in·due-to Manasseh son-of Hezekiah king-of Judah on which he-did in·Jerusalem 
15:5 that who ? he-shall-spare on·you Jerusalem and·who ? he-shall-condole for·you and·who ? he-shall-withdraw to·to-ask-of to·well-being to·you 
15:6 you you-abandoned »·me averment-of Yahweh back ward you-are-going and·I-shall- c stretch-out » hand-of·me on·you and·I-shall- c ruin·you I-am-tired to- n regret-of 
15:7 and·I-shall-winnow·them in·winnower in·gates-of the·land I- m bereave I- m destroy » people-of·me from·ways-of·them not they-returned 
15:8 they- are -serried to·me widows-of·him from·sand-of seas I- c bring to·them on mother choice -young-man one-devastating in· the ·noons I- c cast -down on·her suddenly rousing and·flurries 
15:9 she-is- m feeble one- giv ing-birth-of the·seven she-expires soul-of·her she-sets he-sets sun-of·her in·still by-day she-is-ashamed and·she- is -abashed and·remnant-of·them to· the ·sword I-shall-give to·faces-of ones- be ing-enemies-of·them averment-of Yahweh 
15:10 alack ! to·me mother-of·me that you- gave -birth·me man-of contention and·man-of quarrel to·all-of the·land not I-lent and·not they-lent in·me all-of·him making-light-of·me 
15:11 he-says Yahweh if not I-regard·you I-make-upright·you for·good if not I- c intercede in·you in·era-of evil and·in·era-of distress » the·one-being-enemy 
15:12 ?·he-shall-smash iron iron from·north and·copper 
15:13 estate-of·you and·treasures-of·you to·plunder I-shall-give not in·price and·in·all-of sins-of·you and·in·all-of boundaries-of·you 
15:14 and·I- c transfer » ones- be ing-enemies-of·you in·land not you-know that fire she- is- kindled in·anger-of·me over·you (p) she-shall-be- c kept - a glow 
15:15 you you-know Yahweh remember-you·me ! and·note-you·me ! and· n avenge-you ! for·me from·ones-persecuting-of·me must-not -be to·slow-of anger-of·you you-are-taking- away ·me know-you ! to-bear-of·me on·you reproach 
15:16 they-are-found words-of·you and·I-am-eating·them and·he-is-becoming words-of·you word-of·you to·me to·elation and·to·rejoicing-of heart-of·me that he-is-called name-of·you over·me Yahweh Elohim-of hosts 
15:17 not I-sat in·deliberation-of ones-sportmaking and·I-am-being-joyous from·faces-of hand-of·you solitary I-sat that menace you- m filled·me 
15:18 to·what ? he-became pain-of·me permanence and·smiting-of·me mortal she- m refuses to-be-healed-of to-become you-are-becoming to·me like liar-of waters not they-are- to-be- trusted 
15:19 therefore thus he-says Yahweh if you-are-turning-back and·I-shall-restore·you to·faces-of·me you-shall-stand and·if you-are- c bring ing-forth precious from·one-being-glutton as·mouth-of·me you-shall-become they-shall-return they to·you and·you not you-shall-return to·them 
15:20 and·I-give·you to· the ·people the·this to·wall-of copper fortressed-one and·they- n fight to·you and·not they-shall-prevail to·you that with ·you I to·to- c save-of·you and·to·to- c rescue-of·you averment-of Yahweh 
15:21 and·I- c rescue·you from·hand-of evil-ones and·I-ransom·you from·palm-of terrifying-ones 

Jeremiah 16
16:1 and·he-is-becoming word-of Yahweh to·me to·to-say-of 
16:2 not you-shall-take for·you woman and·not they-shall-become to·you sons and·daughters in· the ·place ri the·this 
16:3 that thus he-says Yahweh on the·sons and·on the·daughters the·born-ones in· the ·place ri the·this and·on mothers-of·them the·ones- giv ing-birth »·them and·on fathers-of·them the·ones- c generating »·them in· the ·land the·this 
16:4 deaths-of ailments they-shall-die not they-shall-be- be wailed and·not they-shall-be-entombed to·manure on sur faces-of the·ground they-shall-become and·in· the ·sword and·in· the ·famine they-shall- be -finish ed and·she-becomes carcass-of·them to·food for·flyer-of the·heavens and·for·beast-of the·earth 
16:5 that thus he-says Yahweh must-not -be you-are-entering house-of vociferant- mourning and·must-not -be you-are-going to·to-wail-of and·must-not -be you-are-condoling to·them that I-terminated » peace-of·me from· with the·people the·this averment-of Yahweh » the·kindness and·» the·compassions 
16:6 and·they-die great-ones and·small-ones in· the ·land the·this not they-shall-be-entombed and·not they-shall-wail for·them and·not he-shall-slash- him self and·not he-is-shall-be- making- n bald for·them 
16:7 and·not they-shall-share to·them on mourning to·to- m comfort-of·him on one- be ing-dead and·not they-shall- c give -drink »·them cup-of consolations on father-of·him and·on mother-of·him

Jeremiah 21
21:1 the·word which he-became to Jeremiah from· with Yahweh in·to-send-of to·him the·king Zedekiah » Pashhur son-of Malchijah and·» Zephaniah son-of Maaseiah the·priest to·to-say-of

21:4 thus he-says Yahweh Elohim-of Israel behold·me ! c turn ing-around » implements-of the·war which in·hand-of·you (p) which you (p) ones- n fighting in·them with king-of Babylon and· with the·Chaldeans the·ones-besieging on·you (p) from·outside to· the ·wall and·I-gather »·them to midst-of the·city the·this

30:12 that thus he-says Yahweh mortal to·breaking-of·you being- n ill smiting-of·you 
30:13 there -is-no one-adjudicating adjudication-of·you for·malady remedies-of application there -is-no for·you

30:15 what ? you-are-crying-out over breaking-of·you mortal pain-of·you on vastness-of depravity-of·you they- are -serried sins-of·you I-do these to·you 
30:16 therefore all-of ones-devouring-of·you they-shall-be-devoured and·all-of foes-of·you all-of·them in· the ·captivity they-shall-go and·they-become ones-robbing-of·you to·robbery and·all-of ones-plundering-of·you I-shall-give for·plunder

30:18 thus he-says Yahweh behold·me ! reversing captivity-of tents-of Jacob and·tabernacles-of·him I-shall- m have -compassion and·she-is-built city on ruin-rise-of·her and·citadel on customary- place -of·him he-shall-sit

33:21 moreover covenant-of·me she-shall-be- c annulled with David servant-of·me from·to-become-of to·him son reigning on throne-of·him and· with the·Levites the·priests ones- m ministering-of·me 
33:22 which not he-shall-be - numbered host-of the·heavens and·not he-shall-be-measured sand-of the·sea so I-shall- c increase » seed-of David servant-of·me and·» the·Levites ones- m ministering-of »·me 
33:23 and·he-is-becoming word-of Yahweh to Jeremiah to·to-say-of 
33:24 ?·not you-discerned what ? the·people the·this they- m speak to·to-say-of two-of the·families which he-chose Yahweh in·them and·he-is-rejecting·them and·» people-of·me they-are-spurning from·to-be bc -of further nation to·faces-of·them 
33:25 thus he-says Yahweh if not covenant-of·me by-day and·night statutes-of heavens and·earth not I-placed 
33:26 moreover seed-of Jacob and·David servant-of·me I-shall-reject from·to-take-of from·seed-of·him ones-ruling to seed-of Abraham Isaac and·Jacob that I-shall-return I-shall- c reverse » captivity-of·them and·I- m have -compassion- on ·them 

Jeremiah 34

Jeremiah 38
38:1 and·he-is-hearing Shephatiah son-of Mattan and·Gedaliah son-of Pashhur and·Jucal son-of Shelemiah and·Pashur son-of Malchijah » the·words which Jeremiah m speaking to all-of the·people to·to-say-of 
38:2 thus he-says Yahweh the·one-dwelling in· the ·city the·this he-shall-die in· the ·sword in· the ·famine and·in· the ·plague and·the·one- go ing-forth to the·Chaldeans he-shall-live and·he-lives and·she-becomes to·him soul-of·him for·loot and·he-lives 
38:3 thus he-says Yahweh to-be-given she-shall-be-given the·city the·this in·hand-of army-of king-of Babylon and·he-seizes·her 
38:4 and·they-are-saying the·chiefs to the·king he-shall-be- c put-to -death please ! » the·man the·this that on·so he making-slack » hands-of mortals-of the·war the·ones- n remaining in· the ·city the·this and·» hands-of all-of the·people to·to- m speak-of to·them as· the ·words the·these that the·man the·this there- is-no·him inquiring to·well-being for· the ·people the·this but rather to·evil 
38:5 and·he-is-saying the·king Zedekiah behold ! he in·hand-of·you (p) that there -is-no the·king he-shall-prevail with ·you (p) matter

Jeremiah 39
39:1 in· the ·year the·ninth to·Zedekiah king-of Judah in· the ·month the·tenth he-came Nebuchadrezzar king-of Babylon and·all-of army-of·him to Jerusalem and·they-are-besieging on·her

Jeremiah 43
43:1 and·he-is-becoming as·to- m finish-of Jeremiah to·to- m speak-of to all-of the·people » all-of words-of Yahweh Elohim-of·them which he-sent·him Yahweh Elohim-of·them to·them » all-of the·words the·these 
43:2 and·he-is-saying Azariah son-of Hoshaiah and·Johanan son-of Kareah and·all-of the·mortals the·arrogant-ones ones-saying to Jeremiah falsehood you m speaking not he-sent·you Yahweh Elohim-of·us to·to-say-of not you (p) -shall-enter Egypt to·to-sojourn-of there 
43:3 that Baruch son-of Neriah c inciting »·you in·us so-that to-give-of »·us in·hand-of the·Chaldeans to·to- c put-to- death-of »·us and·to·to- c deport-of »·us Babylon 
43:4 and·not he-listened Johanan son-of Kareah and·all-of chiefs-of the·armies and·all-of the·people in·voice-of Yahweh to·to-dwell-of in·land-of Judah 
43:5 and·he-is-taking Johanan son-of Kareah and·all-of chiefs-of the·armies » all-of remnant-of Judah who they-returned from·all-of the·nations which they-were-expelled there to·to-sojourn-of in·land-of Judah 
43:6 » the·masters and·» the·women and·» the·tot and·» daughters-of the·king and·» every-of the·soul whom he- c left Nebuzaradan grandee-of executioners with Gedaliah son-of Ahikam son-of Shaphan and·» Jeremiah the·prophet and·» Baruch son-of Neriah 
43:7 and·they-are-entering land-of Egypt that not they-listened in·voice-of Yahweh and·they-are-coming as-far-as Tahpanhes 
43:8 and·he-is-becoming word-of Yahweh to Jeremiah in·Tahpanhes to·to-say-of 
43:9 take-you ! in·hand-of·you stones great-ones and·you-bury·them in·clay-flooring in· the ·brickwork which in·portal-of house-of Pharaoh in·Tahpanhes to·eyes-of mortals Jews 
43:10 and·you-say to·them thus he-says Yahweh-of hosts Elohim-of Israel behold·me ! sending and·I-take » Nebuchadrezzar king-of Babylon servant-of·me and·I-place throne-of·him from·above to· the ·stones the·these which I-buried and·he-stretches-out » state-tapestry-of·him one-being-seemly-of·him over·them 
43:11 and·she-comes and·he-comes and·he- c smites » land-of Egypt whom for· the ·death to· the ·death and·whom for· the ·captivity to· the ·captvity and·whom for· the ·sword to· the ·sword 
43:12 and·I- c ravage fire in·houses-of Elohim-of Egypt and·he-burns·them and·he-captures·them and·he-muffles » land-of Egypt as·which he-is-muffling the·one-being-shepherd » cloak-of·him and·he- go es-forth from·there in·peace 
43:13 and·he- m breaks -down » monuments-of House-of~sun which in·land-of Egypt and·» houses-of Elohim-of Egypt he-shall-burn in· the ·fire

Jeremiah 46

Jeremiah 47

48:31 on·so over Moab I-shall- c howl and·for·Moab all-of·him I-shall-cry-out to mortals-of Kir-Heres he-shall-soliloquize

48:33 and·she-is-terminated rejoicing and·exultation from·crop- land and·from·land-of Moab and·wine from·winevats I-caused- to- cease not he-is-treading whooping whooping not whooping 
48:34 from·outcry-of Heshbon unto Elealeh unto Jahaz they-give voice-of·them from·Zoar unto Horonaim Eglath-Shelishiyah that even waters-of Nimrim to·desolations they-are-becoming 
48:35 and·I- c eradicate to·Moab averment-of Yahweh one- c offer ing-up high-place and·one- c fuming -incense to·Elohim-of·him 
48:36 on·so heart-of·me for·Moab as· the ·flutes he-is-clamoring and·heart-of·me for mortals-of Kir-Heres as· the ·flutes he-is-clamoring on·so surplus-of he-made do they-perish 
48:37 that every-of head baldness and·every-of beard being-diminished on all-of hands slashes and·on waists sackcloth 
48:38 on all-of house tops-of Moab and·in·squares-of·her all-of·him wailing that I-broke » Moab as·vessel there -is-no delight in·him averment-of Yahweh 
48:39 how ! she-is-cracked c howl-you (p)  ! how ! he- c faces -about nape Moab he-is-ashamed and·he-becomes Moab to· object-of- sport and·to·dismay to·all-of round-about·him

48:42 and·he-is-exterminated Moab from·people that on Yahweh he- c magnified- himself

48:44 the·one-fleeing he- c made -flee from·faces-of the·afraidness he-shall-fall to the·pit and·the·one-ascending from the·pit he-shall-be-seized in· the ·snare that I-shall- c bring to·her to Moab year-of visitation-of·them averment-of Yahweh

Jeremiah 51

51:17 he-is- n brutish every-of human from·knowledge he- is- c put-to -shame every-of one-refining from·carving that falsehood molten- image -of·him and·not spirit in·them 
51:18 vanity they deed-of aberrations in·era-of visitation-of·them they-shall-perish

Jeremiah 52
52:1 son-of twenty and·one year Zedekiah in·to-be come -king-of·him and·one-of ten year he-reigned in·Jerusalem and·name-of mother-of·him Hamutal Hamutal daughter-of Jeremiah from·Libnah 
52:2 and·he-is-doing the·evil in·eyes-of Yahweh as·all which he-did Jehoiakim

52:4 and·he-is-becoming in· the ·year the·ninth to·to-reign-of·him in· the ·month the·tenth in· the ·ten to· the ·month he-came Nebuchadrezzar king-of Babylon he and·all-of army-of·him on Jerusalem and·they-are-encamping on·her and·they-are-building on·her siege-work round-about 
52:5 and·she-is-coming the·city in· the ·siege until one-of ten year to· the ·king Zedekiah 
52:6 in· the ·month the·fourth in·nine to· the ·month and·he-is-unyielding the·famine in· the ·city and·not he-was bc bread for·people-of the·land 
52:7 and·she-is-being-rent the·city and·all-of mortals-of the·war they-are- runn ing-away and·they-are- go ing-forth from·the·city night way-of gate between the· two -walls which on garden-of the·king and·Chaldeans on the·city round-about and·they-are-going way-of the·gorge

Lamentations 2
2:1 how ! he-is- c cover ing- with -thick- cloud in·anger-of·him my-Lord » daughter-of Zion he- c flung from·heavens earth beauty-of Israel and·not he-remembered stool-of feet-of·him in·day-of anger-of·him

2:4 he-bended bow-of·him as·one- be ing-enemy being-stationed right- hand -of·him as·foe and·he-is-killing all-of ones-coveted-of eye in·tent-of daughter-of Zion he-poured-out as· the ·fire fury-of·him

2:6 and·he-is-violating as· the ·garden hedge-of·him he- m ruined place -of-appointment-of·him he-made-forget Yahweh in·Zion appointed- time and·sabbath and·he-is-spurning in·menace-of anger-of·him king and·priest 
2:7 he-cast-off my-Lord altar-of·him he- m disowned sanctuary-of·him he- c surrendered in·hand-of one- be ing-enemy walls-of citadels-of·her voice they-gave in·house-of Yahweh as·day-of appointed- time 
2:8 he-designed Yahweh to·to- c ruin-of wall-of daughter-of Zion he-stretched-out tape not he- c turned-back hand-of·him from·to- m dismantle-of and·he-is- c mak ing-mourn rampart and·wall together they-are- m enfeebled

2:10 they-are-sitting to· the ·earth they-are- be ing-silent old-ones-of daughter-of Zion they- c bring -up soil on head-of·them they-gird sackcloths they- c bow -down to· the ·earth head-of·them virgins-of Jerusalem 
2:11 they- are -exhausted in· the ·tears eyes-of·me they-are-daubed bowels-of·me he-is-poured-out to· the ·earth liver-of·me over breaking-of daughter-of people-of·me in·to- n droop-of unweaned- child and·one- be ing-suckling in·squares-of town

Ezekiel 10

10:3 and·the·cherubim ones-standing from·right-of to· the ·house in·to-enter-of·him the·man and·the·cloud he-fills » the·court the·inner 
10:4 and·he-is- ris ing-high glory-of Yahweh from·on the·cherub over sill-of the·house and-he-is-being-filled the·house with the·cloud and·the·court she- is -full » brightness-of glory-of Yahweh

10:7 and·he-is-putting- forth the·cherub » hand-of·him from·between to· the ·cherubim to the·fire which among the·cherubim and·he-is-lifting and·he-is-giving to both-hands-of one-being-clothed-of the·linens and·he-is-taking and·he-is- go ing-forth

10:10 and·appearances-of·them likeness one to·four-of·them as·which he-is-becoming the·wheel in·midst-of the·wheel 
10:11 in·to-go-of·them to four-of quarters-of·them they-are-going not they-are- turn ing-about in·to-go-of·them that the·place ri which he-is-facing the·head after·him they-are-going not they-are- turn ing-about in·to-go-of·them

10:15 and·they-are-being- rais ed-high the·cherubim she the·animal which I-saw in·stream-of Chebar 
10:16 and·in·to-go-of the·cherubim they-are-going the·wheels beside·them and·in·to-lift- up -of the·cherubim » wings-of·them to·to- rise -high-of from·on the·earth not they-are- turn ing-about the·wheels even they from·beside·them 
10:17 in·to-stand-of·them they-are-standing and·in·to- rise -high-of·them they-are-being- rais ed-high with ·them that spirit-of the·animal in·them

48:29 this the·land which you (p) -shall- c cast- lots from·allotment for·tribes-of Israel and·these apportionments-of·them averment-of my-Lord Yahweh 
48:30 and·these exits-of the·city from·edge-of north five-of hundreds and·four-of thousands measurement 
48:31 and·gates-of the·city on names-of tribes-of Israel gates three north·ward gate-of Reuben one gate-of Judah one gate-of Levi one

48:33 and·edge-of south·ward five-of hundreds and·four-of thousands measurement and·gates three gate-of Simeon one gate-of Issachar one gate-of Zebulun one

48:35 round-about eight ten thousand and·name-of the·city from·day Yahweh there·ward

1:1 word-of Yahweh which he-became to Hosea son-of Beeri in·days-of Uzziah Jotham Ahaz Hezekiah kings-of Judah and·in·days-of Jeroboam son-of Joash king-of Israel

2:15 and·I-give to·her » vineyards-of·her from·there and·» vale-of Achor for·portal-of expectation and·she-responds there·ward as·days-of youths-of·her and·as·day-of to- come- up-of·her from·land-of Egypt 
2:16 and·he-becomes in· the ·day the·he averment-of Yahweh you-shall-call man-of·me and·not you-shall-call to·me further possessor-of·me 
2:17 and·I- c take-away » names-of the·Baalim from·mouth-of·her and·not they-shall-be-remembered further in·name-of·them 
2:18 and·I-cut for·them covenant in· the ·day the·he with animal-of the·field and·with flyer-of the·heavens and·moving -animal -of the·ground and·bow and·sword and·battle I-shall-break from the·earth and·I-cause- to- lie -down ·them to·trusting 
2:19 and·I- m betroth·you to·me for·eon and·I- m betroth·you to·me in·righteousness and·in·judgment and·in·kindness and·in·compassions 
2:20 and·I- m betroth·you to·me in·faithfulness and·you-know » Yahweh

Hosea 4

Hosea 12

Amos 1
1:1 words-of Amos who he-became in· the ·herdsmen from·Tekoa which he-perceived on Israel in·days-of Uzziah king-of Judah and·in·days-of Jeroboam son-of Joash king-of Israel two- years to·faces-of the· earth quake 
1:2 and·he-is-saying Yahweh from·Zion he-shall-roar and·from·Jerusalem he-shall-give voice-of·him and·they-mourn oases-of the·ones- be ing-shepherds and·he-dries -up summit-of the·Carmel

1:10 and·I- m send fire in·wall-of Tyre and·she-devours citadels-of·her
