Amos 3
3:1 hear-you (p)  ! » the·word the·this which he- m speaks Yahweh on·you (p) sons-of Israel on all-of the·family which I- c brought -up from·land-of Egypt to·to-say-of 
3:2 but »·you (p) I-know from·all-of families-of the·ground on·so I-shall-visit on·you (p) » all-of depravities-of·you (p) 
3:3 ?·they-shall-go two together unless if they- n make- appointment 
3:4 ?·he-shall-roar lion in· the ·wildwood and·prey there -is-no to·him ?·he-shall-give sheltered- lion voice-of·him from·habitation-of·him unless if he-seized 
3:5 ?·she-shall-fall bird on snare-of the·earth and·trap there -is-no for·her ?·he-shall-spring-up snare from the·ground and·to-seize not he-is-seizing 
3:6 if he-is-being-blown trumpet in·city and·people not they-shall-tremble if she-is-becoming evil in·city and·Yahweh not he-did 
3:7 that not he-shall-do my-Lord Yahweh thing except when he-reveals deliberation-of·him to servants-of·him the·prophets 
3:8 lion he-roars who ? not he-shall-fear my-Lord Yahweh he- m speaks who ? not he-shall- n prophesy 
3:9 c announce-you (p)  ! on citadels-of in·Ashdod and·on citadels-of in·land-of Egypt and·say-you (p)  ! be-gathered-you (p)  ! on mountains-of Samaria and·see-you (p)  ! discomfitures many-ones in·midst-of·her and·extortions in·within-of·her 
3:10 and·not they-know to-do-of correctness averment-of Yahweh the·ones-treasuring violence and·devastation in·citadels-of·them 
3:11 therefore thus he-says my-Lord Yahweh foe and·round-about the·land and·he- c bring s-down from·you strength-of·you and·they-are-plundered citadels-of·you 
3:12 thus he-says Yahweh as·which he-is- c rescuing the·one-being-shepherd from·mouth-of the·lion two-of shanks or separated- portion -of ear so they-shall-be-rescued sons-of Israel the·ones-sitting in·Samaria in·edge-of couch and·in·Damascus divan 
3:13 hear-you (p)  ! and· c testify-you (p)  ! in·house-of Jacob averment-of my-Lord Yahweh Elohim-of the·hosts 
3:14 that in·day-of to-visit-of·me transgressions-of Israel on·him and·I-visit on altars-of Beth-El and·they-are-hacked -down horns-of the·altar and·they-fall to· the ·earth 
3:15 and·I- c smite house-of the·winter on house-of the·summer and·they-perish houses-of the·ivory and·they- are- terminate d houses many-ones averment-of Yahweh 

Amos 4
4:1 hear-you (p)  ! the·word the·this young-cows-of the·Bashan who in·mountain-of Samaria the·ones (f) -extorting poor-ones-of the·ones (f) -bruising needy-ones the·ones (f) -saying to·lords-of·them c bring-you ! and·we-shall-drink 
4:2 he- n swears my-Lord Yahweh in·holiness-of·him that behold ! days ones-coming on·you (p) and·he- m carries -away »·you (p) in·targes and·hindmost-of·you (p) in·briars-of fishing 
4:3 and·breaches you (p) -shall- go -forth woman in- front-of·her and·you (p) -are- c flung to ward·the·Hermon averment-of Yahweh 
4:4 come-you (p)  ! Beth-El and·transgress-you (p)  ! the·Gilgal c increase-you (p)  ! to·to-transgress-of and· c bring-you (p)  ! for· the ·morning sacrifices-of·you (p) for·three-of days tithes-of·you (p) 
4:5 and·to- m fume- incense from·leaven acclamation and·call-you (p)  ! voluntary -vow s c announce-you (p)  ! that so you (p) -love sons-of Israel averment-of my-Lord Yahweh 
4:6 and·moreover I I-give to·you (p) innocency-of teeth in·all-of cities-of·you (p) and·lack-of bread in·all-of places-of·you (p) and·not you (p) -return unto·me averment-of Yahweh 
4:7 and·moreover I I-withhold from·you (p) » the·downpour in·still three months to· the ·harvest and·I- c bring- rain on city one and·on city one not I-am- c bring ing-rain portion one she-is-being-rained -upon and·portion which not she-is- c be ing-rain ed on·her she-is-drying- up 
4:8 and·they-stagger two three cities to city one to·to-drink-of waters and·not they-are- be ing-satisfi ed and·not you (p) -return unto·me averment-of Yahweh 
4:9 I- c smite »·you (p) in· the ·blasting and·in· the ·mildew to- c increase-of gardens-of·you (p) and·vineyards-of·you (p) and·fig -tree s-of·you (p) and·olive -tree s-of·you (p) he-is-devouring the·larva and·not you (p) -return unto·me averment-of Yahweh 
4:10 I- m send in·you (p) plague in·way-of Egypt I-kill in· the ·sword choice- young-men -of·you (p) with captivity-of horses-of·you (p) and·I-am- c mak ing-ascend stink-of camp-of·you (p) and·in·nose-of·you (p) and·not you (p) -return unto·me averment-of Yahweh 
4:11 I- over turn in·you (p) as· over turning-of Elohim » Sodom and·» Gomorrah and·you (p) -are-becoming as·wooden-poker being- c rescued from·burning and·not you (p) -return unto·me averment-of Yahweh 
4:12 therefore thus I-shall-do to·you Israel inasmuch that this I-shall-do to·you be-prepared-you ! to·to-meet-of Elohim-of·you Israel 
4:13 that behold ! one-forming mountains and·one-creating wind and·one- c telling to·human what ? meditation-of·him one-making do -of dawn faintness and·one-treading on high-places-of land Yahweh Elohim-of hosts name-of·him 

Amos 5
5:1 hear-you (p)  ! » the·word the·this which I lifting over·you (p) dirge house-of Israel 
5:2 she-falls not she-shall- c again to-rise-of virgin-of Israel she-is-abandoned on ground-of·her there -is-no one- c raising -up -of·her 
5:3 that thus he-says my-Lord Yahweh the·city the·one- go ing-forth thousand she-shall- c have- remain hundred and·the·one- go ing-forth hundred she-shall- c have- remain ten for·house-of Israel 
5:4 that thus he-says Yahweh to·house-of Israel seek-after-you (p) ·me ! and·live-you (p)  ! 
5:5 and·must-not -be you (p) -are-seeking-after Beth-El and·the·Gilgal not you (p) -shall-come and·Beer~Sheba not you (p) -shall-pass that the·Gilgal to- be -deport ed he-shall- be -deport ed and·Beth-El he-shall-become to·lawlessness 
5:6 inquire-you (p)  ! » Yahweh and·live-you (p)  ! lest he-shall-prosper as· the ·fire house-of Joseph and·she-devours and· there -is-no one- m quenching for·Beth-El 
5:7 the·ones-turning to·wormwood judgment and·righteousness to· the ·earth they-cause- to- rest 
5:8 one-making do -of Pleiades and·Orion and·one-turning to· the ·morning shadow-of-death and·day night he- c darkens the·one-calling to·waters-of the·sea and·he-is-pouring-out·them on sur faces-of the·earth Yahweh name-of·him 
5:9 the·one-causing- to- smile devastation over strong-one and·devastation on fortress he-is-coming 
5:10 they-hate in· the ·gate one- c correcting and·one-speaking flawless they-are- m abhorring 
5:11 therefore because to-trample-of·you (p) on one-poor-of and·load-of cereal you (p) -are-taking from·him houses-of trimmed- stone you (p) -build and·not you (p) -shall-dwell in·them vineyards-of coveted you (p) -plant and·not you (p) -shall-drink » wine-of·them 
5:12 that I-know many-ones transgressions-of·you (p) and·staunch-ones sins-of·you (p) ones-distressing-of righteous-one ones-taking-of propitiatory- shelter and·needy-ones in· the ·gate they- c turn-aside 
5:13 therefore the·one- c be ing-intelligent in· the ·time the·she he-shall-be-still that time evil she 
5:14 inquire-you (p)  ! good and·must-not -be evil so-that you (p) -shall-live and·he-shall-become so Yahweh Elohim-of hosts with ·you (p) as·which you (p) -say 
5:15 hate-you (p)  ! evil and·love-you (p)  ! good and· c put-you (p)  ! in· the ·gate judgment perhaps he-shall-be-gracious Yahweh Elohim-of hosts remnant-of Joseph 
5:16 therefore thus he-says Yahweh Elohim-of hosts my-Lord in·all-of squares wailing and·in·all-of streets they-shall-say woe ! woe ! and·they-call farmer to mourning and·wailing for ones-knowing-of plaint 
5:17 and·in·all-of vineyards wailing that I-shall-pass in·within-of·you he-says Yahweh 
5:18 woe ! the·ones- s yearning -for » day-of Yahweh to·what ? this to·you (p) day-of Yahweh he darkness and·not light 
5:19 as·which he-is-fleeing man from·faces-of the·lion and·he-comes-on·him the·bear and·he-enters the·house and·he-supports hand-of·him on the·sidewall and·he-bites·him the·serpent 
5:20 ?·not darkness day-of Yahweh and·not light and·gloom and·not brightness to·him

5:23 c take-away-you ! from·on·me clamor-of songs-of·you and·melody-of zithers-of·you not I-shall-hear 
5:24 and·he-shall-roll as· the ·waters judgment and·righteousness as·watercourse perennial

Amos 6

6:10 and·he-takes-up·him friend-of·him and·one- m burning-of·him to·to- c bring -forth-of bones from the·house and·he-says to·whom in·recesses-of the·house ?·still with·you and·he-says only and·he-says be-quelled ! that not to·to- c mention-of in·name-of Yahweh

Amos 7
7:1 thus he- c shows·me my-Lord Yahweh and·behold ! forming arching-caterpillars in·start-of to- come- up-of the·aftergrowth and·behold ! aftergrowth after mowings-of the·king 
7:2 and·he-becomes when he- m finished to·to-devour-of » herbage-of the·land and·I-am-saying my-Lord Yahweh pardon-you ! please ! who ? he-shall-raise Jacob that small he 
7:3 he- n regrets Yahweh over this not she-shall-become he-says Yahweh 
7:4 thus he- c shows·me my-Lord Yahweh and·behold ! calling to·to-contend-of in· the ·fire my-Lord Yahweh and·she-is-devouring » abyss great and·she-devours » the·portion 
7:5 and·I-am-saying my-Lord Yahweh forbear-you ! please ! who ? he-shall-raise Jacob that small he 
7:6 he- n regrets Yahweh over this moreover she not she-shall-become he-says my-Lord Yahweh 
7:7 thus he- c shows·me and·behold ! my-Lord being-stationed on wall-of plumbline and·in·hand-of·him plumbline 
7:8 and·he-is-saying Yahweh to·me what ? you seeing Amos and·I-am-saying plumbline and·he-is-saying my-Lord behold·me ! placing plumbline in·within-of people-of·me Israel not I-shall- c add further to-pass-of to·him 
7:9 and·they-are-desolated high-places-of Isaac and·sanctuaries-of Israel they-shall- be -deserted and·I-rise on house-of Jeroboam in· the ·sword 
7:10 and·he-is-sending Amaziah priest-of Beth-El to Jeroboam king-of Israel to·to-say-of he-conspires on·you Amos in·within-of house-of Israel not she-is-being-able the·land to·to- c contain-of » all-of words-of·him 
7:11 that thus he-says Amos in· the ·sword he-shall-die Jeroboam and·Israel to- be -deport ed he-shall- be -deport ed from·on ground-of·him 
7:12 and·he-is-saying Amaziah to Amos vision-seer go-you ! run -away-you ! for·you to land-of Judah and·eat-you ! there bread and·there you-shall- n prophesy 
7:13 and·Beth-El not you-shall- c add further to·to- n prophesy-of that sanctuary-of king he and·house-of kingdom he 
7:14 and·he-is-answering Amos and·he-is-saying to Amaziah not prophet I and·not son-of prophet I that herder I and·one-puncturing-of sycamore-figs 
7:15 and·he-is-taking·me Yahweh from·behind the·flock and·he-is-saying to·me Yahweh go-you ! n prophesy-you ! to people-of·me Israel 
7:16 and·now hear-you ! word-of Yahweh you saying not you-shall- n prophesy on Israel and·not you-shall- c drop -a-word on house-of Isaac 
7:17 therefore thus he-says Yahweh woman-of·you in· the ·city she-shall- commit- prostitution and·sons-of·you and·daughters-of·you in· the ·sword they-shall-fall and·ground-of·you in· the ·line she-shall-be- m apportioned and·you on ground unclean you-shall-die and·Israel to- be -deport ed he-shall- be -deport ed from·on ground-of·him 

Amos 8

8:5 to·to-say-of when ? he-shall-pass the·new -moon and·we-shall- c retail victual s and·the·sabbath and·we-shall-open -out cereal to·to- c make -small-of ephah and·to·to- c make -great-of shekel and·to·to- m distort-of scales-of deceit

8:7 he- n swears Yahweh in·pomp-of Jacob if I-shall-forget to·permanence all-of deeds-of·them 
8:8 ?·over this not she-shall- be -disturb ed the·land and·he-mourns every-of one-dwelling in·her and·she-ascends as· the ·Nile all-of·her and·she-is-disgorged and·she-is-irrigated and·she-is-drowned as·Nile-of Egypt 
8:9 and·he-becomes in· the ·day the·he averment-of my-Lord Yahweh and·I- c bring the·sun in· the ·noons and·I- c darken to· the ·land in·day-of light 
8:10 and·I-turn celebrations-of·you (p) to·mourning and·all-of songs-of·you (p) to·dirge and·I- c bring -up on all-of waists sackcloth and·on every-of head baldness and·I-place·her as·mourning-of only -son and·last-of·her as·day bitter 
8:11 behold ! days ones-coming averment-of my-Lord Yahweh and·I- c send famine in· the ·land not famine for· the ·bread and·not thirst for· the ·waters but rather for·to-hear-of » words-of Yahweh 
8:12 and·they-rove from·sea unto sea and·from·north and·unto sun rise they-shall- m go -to-and-fro to·to- m seek-of » word-of Yahweh and·not they-shall-find 
8:13 in· the ·day the·he they-shall- s swoon the·virgins the·lovely-ones and·the·choice -young-men in· the ·thirst 
8:14 the·ones- n swearing in·guilt-of Samaria and·they-say life-of Elohim-of·you Dan and·life-of way-of Beer-Sheba and·they-fall and·not they-shall-rise further 

Amos 9
9:1 I-see » my-Lord being-stationed over the·altar and·he-is-saying c smite-you ! the·sphere- like-capital and·they-shall-quake the·thresholds and·clip- off- you·them ! in·head-of all-of·them and·hindmost-of·them in· the ·sword I-shall-kill not he-shall-flee -away to·them one-fleeing and·not he-shall- n escape to·them one-seeking- deliverance 
9:2 if they-are-burrowing in·unseen from·there hand-of·me she-shall-take·them and·if they-are-ascending the·heavens from·there I-shall- c bring -down·them 
9:3 and·if they-are- n hiding in·summit-of the·Carmel from·there I-shall- m search and·I-take·them and·if they-are-concealed from· in- front-of eyes-of·me in·floor-of the·sea from·there I-shall- m instruct » the·serpent and·he-bites·them 
9:4 and·if they-are-going in· the ·captivity to·faces-of ones- be ing-enemies-of·them from·there I-shall- m instruct » the·sword and·she-kills·them and·I-place eye-of·me on·them for·evil and·not for·good 
9:5 and·my-Lord Yahweh-of the·hosts the·one-touching in· the ·land and·she-is-dissolving and·they-mourn all-of ones-dwelling-of in·her and·she-ascends as· the ·Nile all-of·her and·she-drowns as· the ·Nile-of Egypt 
9:6 the·one-building in· the ·heavens ascents-of·him ascents-of·him and·structure-of·him over earth he-founds·her the·one-calling to·waters-of the·sea and·he-is-pouring-out·them on sur faces-of the·earth Yahweh name-of·him 
9:7 ?·not as·sons-of Cushites you (p) to·me sons-of Israel averment-of Yahweh ?·not » Israel I- c brought -up from·land-of Egypt and·Philistines from·Caphtor and·Aram from·Kir 
9:8 behold ! eyes-of my-Lord Yahweh in· the ·kingdom the·sinful and·I- c exterminate »·her from·on sur faces-of the·ground only that not to- c exterminate I-shall- c exterminate » house-of Jacob averment-of Yahweh 
9:9 that behold ! I m instructing and·I- c jerk -to-and-fro in·all-of the·nations » house-of Israel as·which he-is-being-jerked -to-and-fro in· the ·sieve and·not he-shall-fall pouch ful earth 
9:10 in· the ·sword they-shall-die all-of sinful-ones-of people-of·me the·ones-saying not she-shall- c come -close and·she-shall- c forestall about·us the·evil 
9:11 in· the ·day the·he I-shall- c raise -up » booth-of David the·one-falling and·I-dike -up » breaches-of·them and·demolished -place s-of·him I-shall- c raise and·I-build·her as·days-of eon 
9:12 so-that they-shall-tenant » remnant-of Edom and·all-of the·nations which he-is-called name-of·me over·them averment-of Yahweh one-do ing this 
9:13 behold ! days ones-coming averment-of Yahweh and·he- n draws- close one-plowing in· the ·one-reaping and·one-treading-of grapes in·one-drawing -forth -of the·seed and·they- c drop the·mountains juice and·all-of the·hills they-shall- s dissolve 
9:14 and·I-reverse » captivity-of people-of·me Israel and·they-build cities ones-being-desolated and·they-dwell and·they-plant vineyards and·they-drink » wine-of·them and·they-make do gardens and·they-eat » fruit-of·them 
9:15 and·I-plant·them on ground-of·them and·not they-shall-be-plucked-up further from·on ground-of·them which I-give to·them he-says Yahweh Elohim-of·you 

Obadiah 1
1:1 vision-of Obadiah thus he-says my-Lord Yahweh to·Edom report we-hear from· with Yahweh and·agent in· the ·nations he-is- m sent rise-you (p)  ! and·we-shall-rise on·her for· the ·battle 
1:2 behold ! small I-gave·you in· the ·nations one-being-despised you exceedingly 
1:3 arrogance-of heart-of·you he- c lures·you one-tabernacling-of in·clefts-of crag height-of dwelling-of·him one-saying in·heart-of·him who ? he-shall- c bring- down·me earth 
1:4 if you-are- c soar ing-aloft as· the ·vulture and·if between stars being-placed nest-of·you from·there I-shall- c bring- down·you averment-of Yahweh 
1:5 if thieves they-come to·you if ones-devastating-of night how ! you-are-stilled ?·not they-shall-steal quota-of·them if ones-picking -grapes they-come to·you ?·not they-shall- c let- remain clean-gleanings 
1:6 how ! they-are-searched Esau they-are-extruded secluded -thing s-of·him 
1:7 unto the·boundary they- m send·you all-of mortals-of covenant-of·you they- c lure·you they-prevail to·you mortals-of peace-of·you bread-of·you they-shall-place malady under·you there -is-no understanding in·him 
1:8 ?·not in· the ·day the·he averment-of Yahweh and·I- c destroy wise- men from·Edom and·understanding from·mountain-of Esau 
1:9 and·they-are-dismayed masterful- men -of·you Teman so-that he-shall-be-cut- off man from·mountain-of Esau from·despatch 
1:10 from·wrong-of brother-of·you Jacob she-shall- m cover·you shame and·you-are-cut -off for·eon 
1:11 in·day-of to-stand-of·you from·aloof in·day-of to-capture-of alien-ones estate-of·him and·foreign-ones they-entered gate-of·him gates-of·him and·over Jerusalem they-handled lot moreover you as·one from·them 
1:12 and·must-not -be you-are-seeing in·day-of brother-of·you in·day-of disaster-of·him and·must-not -be you-are-rejoicing to·sons-of Judah in·day-of to- be- destroy ed -of·them and·must-not -be you-are- c magnifying mouth-of·you in·day-of distress 
1:13 must-not -be you-are-entering in·gate-of people-of·me in·day-of calamity-of·them must-not -be you-are-seeing moreover you in·evil-of·him in·day-of calamity-of·him and·must-not -be you (fp) -are-stretching -forth in·estate-of·him in·day-of calamity-of·him

Micah 4
4:1 and·he-becomes in·latter-of the·days he-shall-become mountain-of house-of Yahweh being-established in·summit-of the·mountains and·he-is-lifted- up he from·hills and·they-stream on·him peoples

5:12 and·I- c cut- off enchantments from·hand-of·you and·ones- m consult ing-clouds not they-shall-become to·you 
5:13 and·I- c cut- off carvings-of·you and·monuments-of·you from·within-of·you and·not you-shall-bow-down- your self further to·deed-of hands-of·you 
5:14 and·I-pluck-up fetish es -of -happiness-of·you from·within-of·you and·I- c exterminate cities-of·you 
5:15 and·I-do in·anger and·in·fury vengeance with the·nations which not they-listen 

Micah 6
6:1 hear-you (p)  ! please ! » which Yahweh saying rise-you ! contend-you ! with the·mountains and·they-shall-hear the·hills voice-of·you

6:7 ?·he-shall-accept Yahweh in·thousands-of rams in·myriads-of watercourses-of oil ?·I-shall-give firstborn-of·me transgression-of·me fruit-of belly-of·me sin-of soul-of·me 
6:8 he- c told to·you human what ? good and·what ? Yahweh requiring from·you that if to-do-of judgment and·to-love-of kindness and·to- c be -meek to-go-of with Elohim-of·you 
6:9 voice-of Yahweh to· the ·city he-is-calling and·reality he-shall-see name-of·you hear-you (p)  ! rod and·who ? he-appointed·her 
6:10 still ?· there- is house-of wicked-one treasures-of wickedness and·ephah-of leanness one-being-menaced 
6:11 ?·I-shall-clear in·scales-of wickedness and·in·purse-of standard- weight s-of deceit

6:13 and·moreover I I- c make- sick to- c smite-of·you to- c desolate on sins-of·you

Micah 7
7:1 forbid ! to·me that I-become as·gatherings-of summer- fruit as·clean-gleanings-of vintage there -is-no cluster to·to-eat-of firstfruit she- m yearns -for soul-of·me

7:3 on the·evil both- palms to·to- c do -thoroughly-of the·chief asking and·the·one-judging in· the ·repayment and·the·great-one speaking woe-of soul-of·him he and·they-are-entwining·her

7:9 turbulence-of Yahweh I-shall-bear that I-sinned to·him until which he-is-contending contention-of·me and·he-does judgment-of·me and-he-shall- c bring- forth·me to· the ·light I-shall-see in·righteousness-of·him 
7:10 and·she-shall-see one-being-enemy (f) -of·me and·she-shall- m cover·her shame the·one-saying to·me where·him ? Yahweh Elohim-of·you eyes-of·me they-shall-see in·her now she-shall-become for·tramping -down as·mud-of streets 
7:11 day to·to-build-of stone- dikes-of·you day the·he he-shall-be-far delineating- limit 
7:12 day he and·unto·you he-shall-come to·from Assyria and·cities-of lower-Egypt and·to·from lower-Egypt and·unto stream and·sea from·sea and·mountain-of the·mountain 
7:13 and·she-becomes the·earth to·desolation on ones-dwelling-of·her from·fruit-of actions-of·them 
7:14 shepherd-you ! people-of·you in·club-of·you flock-of allotment-of·you one-tabernacling solitary wildwood in·midst-of crop -land they-shall-graze Bashan and·Gilead as·days-of eon 
7:15 as·days-of to- go -forth-of·you from·land-of Egypt I-shall- c show·him thing s-being- n marvelous 
7:16 they-shall-see nations and·they-shall- be - a shame d from·all-of mastery-of·them they-shall-place hand on mouth ears-of·them they-shall-be-deaf 
7:17 they-shall- m lick-up soil as· the ·serpent as·ones-skulking-of earth they-shall- be- disturb ed from·enclosures-of·them to Yahweh Elohim-of·us they-shall-be-afraid and·they-shall-fear from·you 
7:18 who ? El like·you one-bearing depravity and·one-passing over transgression for·remnant-of allotment-of·him not he- c holds-fast for·future anger-of·him that he-delights -in kindness he

Habakkuk 3
3:1 prayer to·Habakkuk the·prophet on overtakings 
3:2 Yahweh I-hear report-of·you I-fear Yahweh contrivance-of·you in·within-of years make-live-you·him ! in·within-of years you-are- c mak ing-known in·disturbance to- m have-compassion you-are-remembering 
3:3 Eloah from·Teman he-is-coming and·Holy-One from·mountain-of Paran interlude he- m covers heavens splendor-of·him and·praise-of·him she-fills the·earth 
3:4 and·brightness as· the ·light she-is-becoming gleams from·hand-of·him to·him and·there hiding-of strength-of·him 
3:5 to·faces-of·him he-is-going plague and·he-is- go ing-forth sirocco to·feet-of·him 
3:6 he-stands and·he-is- m measuring earth he-sees and·he-is- c lett ing-loose nations and·they-are- be ing- s scatter ed mountain -range s-of futurity they-bow-down hills-of eon goings-of eon to·him

3:9 naked she-is-being- made- naked bow-of·you oaths rods saying interlude streams you-are- m rending earth 
3:10 they-see·you they-are-travailing mountains storm-of waters he-passes he-gives abyss voice-of·him on-high hands-of·him he-lifts 
3:11 sun moon he-stands residence·ward to·light arrows-of·you they-are- m going to·brightness flashing-of spear-of·you 
3:12 in·menace you-are-marching earth in·anger you-are-threshing nations 
3:13 you- go- forth for·salvation-of people-of·you for·salvation-of » anointed-one-of·you you-transfix head from·house-of wicked-one to-make-naked foundation unto neck interlude 
3:14 you-pierce in·rods-of·him head-of horde-of·him hordes-of·him they-are-tempestuous to·to- c scatter-of·me gladness-of·them like to·to-devour-of humble-one in· the ·concealment 
3:15 you-tread in· the ·sea horses-of·you turbid -mass -of waters many-ones 
3:16 I-heard and·she-is- be ing-disturb ed belly-of·me to·sound they-tingled lips-of·me he-is-entering rottenness in·bones-of·me and·under·me I-am- be ing-disturb ed which I-shall-rest for·day-of distress to·to- come -up-of to·people he-is-raiding·us 
3:17 that fig- tree not she-is-budding and· there -is-no crop in· the ·vines he- m dissimulates yield-of olive and·plantations not he-yields do food he-severs from·fold flock and· there -is-no herd in· the ·paddocks 
3:18 and·I in·Yahweh I-shall-be-joyous I-shall-exult in·Elohim-of salvation-of·me 
3:19 Yahweh my-Lord ability-of·me and·he-shall-place feet-of·me as· the ·hinds and·on high-places-of·me he-is-causing- to- tread·me for· the ·one-making- it- permanent in·accompaniments 

Zephaniah 1
1:1 word-of Yahweh which he-became to Zephaniah son-of Cushi son-of Gedaliah son-of Amariah son-of Hezekiah in·days-of Josiah son-of Amon king-of Judah 
1:2 to-terminate I-shall- c terminate all from·on sur faces-of the·ground averment-of Yahweh 
1:3 I-shall- c terminate human and·beast I-shall- c terminate flyer-of the·heavens and·fishes-of the·sea and·the·stumbling-blocks with the·wicked-ones and·I- c cut- off » the·human from·on sur faces-of the·ground averment-of Yahweh 
1:4 and·I-stretch-out hand-of·me over Judah and·over all-of ones-dwelling-of Jerusalem and·I- c cut- off from the·place ri the·this » remnant-of the·Baal » name-of the·dervishes with the·priests 
1:5 and·» the·ones- s bowing-down on the· house tops to·host-of the·heavens and·» the·ones- s bowing-down the·ones- n swearing to·Yahweh and·the·ones- n swearing in·king-of·them 
1:6 and·» the·ones-being-turned-away from·after Yahweh and·who not they- m seek » Yahweh and·not they-inquire -of ·him 
1:7 be-quelled ! from·faces-of my-Lord Yahweh that near day-of Yahweh that he- c prepares Yahweh sacrifice he- c sanctifies ones-being-called-of·him 
1:8 and·he-becomes in·day-of sacrifice-of Yahweh and·I-visit on the·chiefs and·on sons-of the·king and·on all-of the·ones- be ing-cloth ed clothing foreign 
1:9 and·I-visit on every-of the·one-leaping over the·sill in· the ·day the·he the·ones- m filling house-of lords-of·them violence and·deceit 
1:10 and·he-becomes in· the ·day the·he averment-of Yahweh sound-of cry from·gate-of the·fishes and·howling from the·second- quarter and·breaking great from·the·hills 
1:11 c howl-you (p)  ! ones-dwelling-of the·mortar- shaped-hole that he-is-stilled all-of people-of Canaan they-are-cut -off all-of transporters-of silver 
1:12 and·he-becomes in· the ·season the·she I-shall- m search » Jerusalem in· the ·lamps and·I-visit on the·mortals the·ones- be ing-curdl ed on lees-of·them the·ones-saying in·heart-of·them not he-shall- c do -good Yahweh and·not he-shall- c do -evil 
1:13 and·he-becomes estate-of·them for·robbery and·houses-of·them for·desolation and·they-build houses and·not they-shall-dwell and·they-plant vineyards and·not they-shall-drink » wine-of·them 
1:14 near day-of Yahweh the·great near and·swift exceedingly sound-of day-of Yahweh bitter shrieking there masterful- man 
1:15 day-of rage the·day the·he day-of distress and·constraint day-of devastation and·futile -effort day-of darkness and·gloom day-of cloud and·murkiness

1:18 moreover silver-of·them moreover gold-of·them not he-shall- be -able to·to- c rescue-of·them in·day-of rage-of Yahweh and·in·fire-of jealousy-of·him she-shall-be-devoured all-of the·land that finish yea one-being-hustled he-shall-make do » all-of ones-dwelling-of the·land 

Zephaniah 2

Zephaniah 3
3:1 woe ! one-being-rebellious and·one-being-sullied the·city the·one-tyrannizing 
3:2 not she-listens in·voice not she-takes discipline in·Yahweh not she-trusts to Elohim-of·her not she-draws-near 
3:3 chiefs-of·her in·within-of·her lions ones-roaring ones-judging-of·her wolves-of evening not they-pick-clean for· the ·morning 
3:4 prophets-of·her ones-being-ebullient mortals-of treacheries priests-of·her they- m profane sanctuary they- do- violence -to law 
3:5 Yahweh righteous in·within-of·her not he-is-doing iniquity in· the ·morning in· the ·morning judgment-of·him he-is-giving to· the ·light not he-is-deranged and·not knowing iniquitous-one shame 
3:6 I- c cut- off nations they-are- n made- desolate corners-of·them I- c make -deserted streets-of·them from·without one-passing -by they-are-hunted cities-of·them from·without man from· there -is-no one-dwelling 
3:7 I-said yea you-shall-fear »·me you-shall-take discipline and·not he-shall-be-cut- off habitation-of·her all which I-noted on·her so they- c rose-early they- c made -corrupt all-of practices-of·them 
3:8 therefore m tarry-you (p)  ! for·me averment-of Yahweh for·day-of to-rise-of·me for·testimony that judgment-of·me to·to-gather-of nations to·to-convene-of·me kingdoms to·to-pour-out-of on·them menace-of·me all-of heat-of anger-of·me that in·fire-of jealousy-of·me she-shall-be-devoured all-of the·earth 
3:9 that then I-shall-turn to peoples lip being-pure to·to-call-of all-of·them in·name-of Yahweh to·to-serve-of·him shoulder-blade one 
3:10 from·across to·streams-of Cush entreaters-of·me daughter-of ones-being-scattered-of·me they-shall- c fetch present-of·me 
3:11 in· the ·day the·he not you-shall- be-put-to -shame from·all-of practices-of·you which you-transgressed in·me that then I-shall- c take-away from·within-of·you joyous-ones-of pride-of·you and·not you-shall- c continue to·to-be-haughty-of further in·mountain-of holiness-of·me 
3:12 and·I-cause -to -remain in·within-of·you people humble and·poor-of and·they- take- refuge in·name-of Yahweh 
3:13 remnant-of Israel not they-shall-do iniquity and·not they-shall- m speak lie and·not he-shall-be-found in·mouth-of·them tongue-of deceit that they they-shall-graze and·they-recline and· there -is-no one-causing- to -tremble 
3:14 jubilate-you ! daughter-of Zion c raise-a- shout-you (p)  ! Israel rejoice-you ! and·be-joyous-you ! in·all-of heart daughter-of Jerusalem 
3:15 he- c takes-away Yahweh judgments-of·you he-makes-face-about one- be ing-enemy-of·you king-of Israel Yahweh in·within-of·you not you-shall-fear evil further 
3:16 in· the ·day the·he he-shall-be-said to·Jerusalem must-not -be you-are-fearing Zion must-not -be they-are-slackening hands-of·you 
3:17 Yahweh Elohim-of·you in·within-of·you masterful he-shall- c save he-shall- be -elate d over·you in·rejoicing he-shall-be- c silent in·love-of·him he-shall-exult over·you in·jubilation 
3:18 ones-being-afflicted-of from·appointment I-gather from·you they-become load on·her reproach 
3:19 behold·me ! doing with all-of ones- m humbling-of·you in· the ·season the·she and·I- c save » the·one-limping and·the·one-being-expelled I-shall- m convene and·I-place·them for·praise and·for·name in·every-of the·land-of shame-of·them

Haggai 1

1:15 in·day-of twenty and·four to· the ·month in· the ·sixth in·year-of two to·Darius the·king

Zechariah 1
1:1 in· the ·month the·eighth in·year-of two to·Darius he-became word-of Yahweh to Zechariah son-of Berechiah son-of Iddo the·prophet to·to-say-of 
1:2 he-was-wroth Yahweh on fathers-of·you (p) wrath 
1:3 and·you-say to·them thus he-says Yahweh-of hosts return-you (p)  ! to·me averment-of Yahweh-of hosts and·I-shall-return to·you (p) he-says Yahweh-of hosts 
1:4 must-not -be you (p) -are-becoming as·fathers-of·you (p ) whom they-called to·them the·prophets the·former-ones to·to-say-of thus he-says Yahweh-of hosts return-you (p)  ! please ! from·ways-of·you (p) the·evil-ones and·practices-of·you (p) and·practices-of·you (p) the·evil-ones and·not they-listened and·not they- c attended to·me averment-of Yahweh

1:7 in·day-of twenty and·four to·one-of ten-of month he month-of Shebat in·year-of two to·Darius he-becomes word-of Yahweh to Zechariah son-of Berechiah son-of Iddo the·prophet to·to-say-of 
1:8 I-see the·night and·behold ! man riding on horse red and·he standing between the·myrtles which in· the ·shade and·behind·him horses red-ones yellow-ones and·white-ones 
1:9 and·I-am-saying what ? these lord-of·me and·he-is-saying to·me the·messenger the·one-speaking in·me I I-shall- c show·you what ? they these 
1:10 and·he-is-answering the·man the·one-standing between the·myrtles and·he-is-saying these whom he-sends Yahweh to·to- s walk in· the ·earth 
1:11 and·they-are-answering » messenger-of Yahweh the·one-standing between the·myrtles and·they-are-saying we- s walked in· the ·earth and·behold ! all-of the·earth sitting and·being-quiet-of 
1:12 and·he-is-answering messenger-of Yahweh and·he-is-saying Yahweh-of hosts till when ? you not you-shall- m have -compassion » Jerusalem and·» cities-of Judah which you-menace this seventy year 
1:13 and·he-is-answering Yahweh » the·messenger the·one-speaking in·me words good-ones words comforting-ones 
1:14 and·he-is-saying to·me the·messenger the·one-speaking in·me call-you ! to·to-say-of thus he-says Yahweh-of hosts I- m am -jealous for·Jerusalem and·for·Zion jealousy great 
1:15 and·wrath great I being-wroth on the·nations the·tranquil-ones which I I-was-wroth little and·they they-helped to·evil 
1:16 therefore thus he-says Yahweh I-return to·Jerusalem in·compassions house-of·me he-shall-be-built in·her averment-of Yahweh-of hosts and·tape and·tape he-shall-be-stretched-out on Jerusalem 
1:17 further call-you ! to·to-say-of thus he-says Yahweh-of hosts further they-shall-overflow cities-of·me from·good and·he- m comforts Yahweh further » Zion and·he-chooses still in·Jerusalem

Zechariah 2
2:1 and·I-am-lifting eyes-of·me and·I-am-seeing and·behold ! man and·in·hand-of·him line-of measure 
2:2 and·I-am-saying toward-where ? you going and·he-is-saying to·me to·to-measure-of » Jerusalem to·to-see-of as·what ? width-of·her and·as·what? length-of·her 
2:3 and·behold ! the·messenger the·one-speaking in·me com ing-forth and·messenger another com ing-forth to·to-meet-of·him 
2:4 and·he-is-saying to·him run-you ! m speak-you ! to the·lad this to·to-say-of villages she-shall-dwell Jerusalem from·multitude-of human and·beast in·midst-of·her 
2:5 and·I I-shall-become for·her averment-of Yahweh wall-of fire round-about and·for·glory I-shall-become in·midst-of·her 
2:6 woe ! woe ! and·flee-you (p)  ! from·land-of north averment-of Yahweh that as·four-of winds-of the·heavens I- m spread »·you (p) averment-of Yahweh

Malachi 4
4:1 that behold ! the·day coming consuming as· the ·stove and·they-become all-of arrogant-ones and·every-of one-doing-of wickedness straw and·he- m sets - a flame »·them the·day the·one-coming he-says Yahweh-of hosts which not he-shall-leave to·them root and·bough 
4:2 and·she-radiates to·you (p) fearing-ones-of name-of·me sun-of righteousness and·healing in·wings-of·her and·you (p) - come -forth and·you (p) -frolic as·calves-of stall 
4:3 and·you (p) -tread-down wicked-ones that they-shall-become ash under soles-of feet-of·you (p) in· the ·day which I making do he-says Yahweh-of hosts
